1.content: First, which girl Falls for you?
1.title: Start

111.content:
(You Kuesu) (Your sword from two angles http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20... http://images.wikia.com/mypower/images/f...) (You are dressed like Sasuke in Shippuden)

You are a part of a great Demon slayer clan that was once feared by many Ayakashi. You alone could wield and control the legendary sword known as Arondight, and your agility and skills as a warrior were great, but you had almost no memory of your past. One day, you were walking alone when some kind of claw grabbed you from an alley and pulled you towards the one who possessed the arm. You were quickly thrown to the ground and you tried to draw your sword, but you were forced against the wall with no way to reach your sword. “At long last, the mighty Uchiha family dies.” the Ayakashi said as he began to crush your head. But then, from out of nowhere, a large blast of flame struck the demon and sent him away from you. “Who dares?!” And appearing right in front of you was a very beautiful young woman. She had long, silver hair and wore some kind of black dress. She had a crescent moon on her forehead, beautiful purple eyes, and her breasts were at least a DD. “The Jinguji girl! I will not allow anyone to stop me from killing Yoru, not even you!” he said as his power began to grow. “And I will not let you touch him.” You then rose to your feet and drew your sword. “Look, I think we should work together, whoever you are.” “Oh Yoru, I might not be able to forgive you for forgetting me.” “Look, we can discuss this later, right now we need to take care of this guy.” “Agreed.” You then charged and drew your sword. You jumped into the air and sliced the demon's arm off with no trouble. The girl then followed suit by creating a large fire blast and incinerated him. You knew she was strong, but not this strong. You put your sword away and said “Thanks. I owe you one.” “No. It is the least I can do for my fiancée.” “Wait, what?!” “I see you truly lost a large portion of your memory.” she said as she walked up to you. She then gently placed her hand on your cheek and you could actually feel the emotions she had for you.
111.title: The Adventure Begins

1111.content:
(At this point if you finished part 1 then the last two chapters are a flashback. The next two parts begin here.)

Her feelings for you were absolutly genuine. You felt how she had a deep amount of love for you, but it seemed confusing. You didn't understand why you could feel her feelings nor did you even remember having a fiancée.

"I suppose this will help you remember some things of the past.", she said pulling you closer to her face. She then pressed her lips against yours and gently kissed you with tender care and passion. You then started to have a flashback of a lake and you and some girl.

You remember that she used to have black hair at that time. You two were only children no more than around 8 years old. You remembered how at first you had a crush on her but she didn't return those feeling, at least not yet.

You tried making her laugh on numerous occasions and tried being a bit of a romantic with her. But it was only when you were both at that lake that she finally returned your feeling and kissed you by the lake.

It wasn't the full story but you could definatly tell that she was a friend and your childhood crush. It's safe to say her feelings for you never faded, but perhaps they even were even stronger.

Kuesu broke the kiss feeling like she was high in the clouds having the feeling of your lips on hers. "Do you remember me Yoru?", she asked.

"I do Kuesu. I can't believe that I'd have forgotten you. I'm sorry for that but I have no idea why that happened.", you answered.

"Come with me, I'll explain everything I know ounce you get settled in. After all it's a usual custom for a future husband and wife to be living in the same place isn't it?", she asked.

You nodded in response and walked with her. You felt like a part of you was just released and now you feel free inside. Your feelings for her started to return. You held her hand on the way, to which she blushed in response. She was happy that you still felt the same way about her.
1111.title: Your old Love

11111.content:
The Ayakashi stood there as if he'd been forgotten about. "Hey! Don''t turn you back on me you emo freaks. I will destroy you both with my bare-", Kuesu then dispelled the Ayakashi with a disintegration spell killing it with no effort.

"Now that loose end is tied. Perhaps we could make our way to the hotel?", she asked.

You nodded. You followed her to the hotel where you made it to the best rooms in the entire hotel. The room was huge and fancy. You admired the change of scenery and let yourself get settled in.

"You may sleep in my bed if you like.", Kuesu offered.

You were nervous for a second since you've never slept with anyone before but you wanted to take it a little slow since this is the time where you have reunited with Kuesu. She walked toward you an said, "It's only natural for a future husband and wife to be sleeping in the same bedroom."

"Listen, I want to spend time with you that's for sure. And I trust that us being a future couple was made with good intentions but maybe for a while we should take it slow. Just until I fully understand the whole thing.", you said.

"I understand. Today has altered your path. But let me ask you something. What did that Ayakashi mean when he brought up that Uchiha clan?"

"Oh.. you see my family had placed me under the care of one of the families there for a while. They gave me this sword as a trophy and I am merely an honorary part of that clan. When it the clan was destroyed I spent some time on my own after that. But they allowed me to defend myself against those demons. Which I think was the reason my family sent me there in the first place.", you explained.

"Yoru I'm glad your ere now. Your safe with me now, and you'll never be alone again.", she hugged you.

"I felt the feelings you had when you touched my cheek. I never knew you would've kept loving me after all this time.", you mentioned.

"Yoru, before I met you. I thought nothing was worth living for other than murdering demons. Even when we were engaged I still didn't think you were meant for me. But even when I tried to push you away you still tired, and it made me feel special. Like I had something else to do other than slay demons and such. I never forgot that."

"I just wish I didn't."

"We'll find out one day perhaps but for now our lives will be a bit unpredictable. But for now this will do.", she kissed you again on the lips making you remember parts of what she mentioned. They were precious memories that you hold dear and true.

Indeed there would be time for you to reconnect but now you found each other again and it's all that matters...
11111.title: Story I: Reconcilation

choices: Kuesu comes to rain with you
111111.content:
You woke up after a long nights rest. You got up and started to get dressed and prepared for the day, soon after Kuesu began to wake up and notice you had eaten breakfest and to her surprise had already made something for her. "Morning.", you said.

"Good morning. Mmm freshly baked rice with scrambeled eggs and bacon. How did you know that was-"

"Your favorite? You ate that everyday whenever you and I had slept over at eachothers houses. Something I guessed you would enjoy.", you kindly interupted.

"Guess you picked that up just to impress me in case this exact situation were to come? You would be willing to do anything to get my spirits up when we were younger.", Kuesu said.

"Hmm remember when I dragged you up that hill and I fell into that bush full of thorns? And when I got out of there you tried to help me stop crying and you did that by-"

"By singing that song you always kept singing for an entire month straight. Hahaha...I nearly forgot about that! I remember when that happened, I thought you were soo stupid falling into that bush but I only sung that song only to have you stop crying. Because it was painful to hear.", she finished.

"Guess you weren't so cold hearted as I thought you were back in the day."

"No you misunderstand, you crying was so annoying I'd have rather been impaled than suffer a minute of your crying. I only knew that song cuz you would sing it everyday, even when I wasn't around! It got stuck in my head that I know it as well as you! Gah what was the name of it?", Kuesu asked.

"Well I don't know. That little detail hasn't come back yet, but maybe it will when I get everything back.", you replied.

"A little detail? Please that is crucial! Come on Yoru try and figure it out! I know ithad to be from something I loved as a kid but that won't do much good. Ah well, a mystery that'll have to be solved for another day. Right now I need to practice my swordsman ship. I need to freshen up my skills or else I'll get rusty.", you informed her.

Ypu went up to the hotel roof and swung your sword self training in the way of the sword. You were an excellent sword fighter but you were far from a master, but your style was more out of the box and completly unpredictable so you were a force to be reckoned with. All you needed wasmore experience and soon you would be a master.
111111.title: Refreshing your mind and skill

1111111.content:
"Oh Kuesu I didn't see you standing there.", you saw her.

"Interesting style, but you lack something. Perhaps a little sparing session will help discover it?"

"I don't want to fight you Kuesu ."

"Nonsense, as flattered I am of your compassion for me were both demon slayers and must push ourselves to our limits. Now take up your sword and fight me."

You two fought in a small battle with Kuesu using her spell book to attack and defend herself from you. You spent most of the fight trying to break through her defenses but you managed to find an opening in her technique and held your sword to her face. Kuesu seemed pleased by your sudden advance but she still assumed she'd win.

"Yield. ", you said.

"You didn't beat me, you sacraficed your footing for a killing stroke.", Kuesu laid a trap and summuned an energy prison around you. "I had you at a distance the whole time. I was laying a trap there in case you got too close. Be more aware of what your opponents stradegy.", she explained.

"Good tip, now can you let me out please?"

"Of course.", the energy lowered and turned into dust. "I know what your lacking now with that style of yours."

"Oh? What's that?"

"Your easy to predict. "

She laughed at your reaction seeing how you tried creating a fighting style that was meant to be the opposite. You shrugged of the sourness from all the training and went back inside with Kuesu. She held out her hand wanting you to hold it. You accepted her offer and held her hand which made a few more memories resurface.

You recalled the night after your first kiss with her and she became different to you. Now she clung to your arm all the time and she was comforted by your tender words. "Uhh you can let go of me now."

"No. I will never leave your side."

"But I'm getting a little nervous with you holding my arm so do you mind letting go for just a second? Or not hold on so tightly? "

"No. I won't leave you Yoru. You've run away with my heart, so now it beats for you. I won't let you go.", she said.

"Kuesu! Time to go home now!", her father called.

"I, must let you go for now. But I'll come back to you my future husband. "

The memory felt nice. You changed her for the better perhaps. She never did leave your side after all the time away from her.
1111111.title: Kuesu comes to train with you

11111111.content:
You went back to your room and sat on the couch with Kuesu. She poured some tea for you and began making small talk. "So how have you been doing? "

"Just fine I guess. It was boring having just doing mundane things all the time. All I did was work at school and just work all day.", you said taking a sip.

"It does seem boring. I could have made it more interesting though. I could have been waiting at home for you and treated you to a nice time when you were restless.", she flirted.

"Hehehe I believe you. But enough about me, what's been going on with you? Your hair is different for example."

"On one of my missions the only way I could stop a demon was by using a forbidden spell. Now I have silver hair as a mark."

"I like it this way honestly. It matches your skin and you just look better. "

"You always had a way with words Yoru. Making me blush by taking something I find hurtful and turning it into something pleasant. Truth be told it's what got me to fall in love with you.", she came closer holding your cheek.

"I remember when you clung on to my arm after our kiss. You were so cute. "

"I didn't know how to express my feelings back then. But now I do.", she pulled your face closer until your lips touched again. You leaned in returning her affection and gently pulled her face in further deepening the kiss. You broke it off for air and you looked in eachothers eyes. In the same way you did for the first time in years, the same love you shared since childhood.
11111111.title: You sit down and talk

choices: Couldn't sit back and tried to save her
111111111.content:
The romance ended when an explosion came from the hotel. You rushed outside to see where it was coming from or who may have caused it. No demons from outside the building which meant whoever was targeting the place may be trying to lure the two off you outof the room. Kuesu stopped you from leaving the room, "Stay here. You just got back your skills. It's too risky having you down there."

"If you go jumping into battle, I'll be right beside you."

"Yoru please wait here. We don't know what were up against, if I need assisstance I will call you. I promise.", she pecked you on the cheek and left with her book and a hand gun. You didn't want to disobey her but you took out your sword and tailed her. You kept your distance so she wouldn't notice you but close enough to watch her back.

Soon Kuesu saw that a demon was talking with another one. They spoke in another language so she didn't know what they were saying. She tried seeing who one of them was but one disappeared. The other was a brutish bull from hell and charged through the walls trying to collapse the building on itself.

Kuesu casted a protection barrier on the structure causing the demon bull to knock back. Furious it went looking for who conjured the spell. Kuesu stood her ground and faced it head on. "Are all of you freakish demons so ugly with looking the part of what animal you take form of? Hell I know a girl who at least looks easy on the eyes when she turns into a full blown cat than you.", she mocked.

The demon bull charged at her but ran into another trap. This time a mini tornado that blocked it. But he was too strong and the barrierwas weakening. You saw her in ttrouble but....
111111111.title: Demons attack the hotel!

1111111112.content:
Kuesu took out her gun and as soon as the barrier was gone she was! She telaported behind the demon and shot 8 rounds. The demon bled from the bullet wounds but didn't stop charging. He turned around and dove at Kuesu. She telaported again and the demon ran out the window.

It tried to cling to the building but flew too far off and crashed into the pavement. Kuesu looked over to see it vanish from existance. To her delight it did and it no longer threatened anyone. "You can come out now Yoru I saw you.", she said.

"Sorry I disobeyed your wishes. ", you replied coming out of hiding.

"Least you didn't try jumping in and saving me. I'd be more angry if you did. But you did well covering my back just how I knew you would. But next time listen to me. I don't want you to get hurt."

"Alright. So any ideas why that thing attacked the hotel and not directly at us?"

"It was meeting with someone. Another demon, my guess they were discussing about a secret plan the demons are concoucting. It just tried to bury us all alive so that there were no witnesses. I think us being here was pure coincidence."

"Well in the , meantime were going to have to find somewhere else to live. The upper structure isn't stable."

"I know where to go. I have a small summer house by the edge of town. It'll do for living conditions.", Kuesu suggested.

"Lead the way.", you said.
1111111112.title: Let her handle it

11111111121.content:
You and Kuesu made it to the house she mentioned and frankly it was better than she described. It was indeed small but it was capable of fitting two people very well. Kuesu unlocked the door and turned on the lights. "Yoru do me a favorand turn on the power breaker. I'll get the things in our room.", she asked. You went over to the electrical breaker and switched on the power. Now the house was lit up and everything was all set. "Oh good thanks. I placed your things in a seperate room so you can go to sleep whenever your ready."

"Kuesu? Why did you put all my things in another room? I thought a husband and wife share the same bed? Let alone the same room. "

Kuesu's heart sped up when she heard your reply and blushed, "But I thought you wanted to take it slowly so I thought it was what you wanted."

"I did want it to. But after thinking about it, I don't want to be away from you. After what happened earlier I don't want to waste anytime trying to falling for you all over again.", you said wrapping your arms around her waist.

"Yoru......", she paused in surprise for a moment but the next was turned into passion as she evily grinned. She grabbed your head and smoothered you in her cleabage. "From now on I live for only you, and as you may have noticed I'm the firecly loyal type."

You tried getting yourself out of her grip but she wouldn't let you. You started to lose your breath but thankfully she let you go. "Was that nessicary?"

"Wella was it all that bad? Now that there's nothing to hold me back from showing how I feel, I can make tonight be a little more interesting.", she seductivly hinted.
11111111121.title: Continue

112.content:
(You Kuesu Himari)

One day, you were alone standing at the top of a building looking at the city as the sun began to set. You spent this time alone just as you do the rest of the time. You have kept yourself distant from others due to your powers But you did manage to let one girl named Himari become your friend. She was an Ayakashi who kept calling you master.. Though you had almost no memory of your past. About 20 minutes later, you were walking with Himari near the river when you heard someone following you. You turned around to see a very beautiful woman. She had a crescent moon on her fore head and long silver hair. "It's good to see you again. Yoru-kun." You were surprised by the fact that she knew who you were. Himari drew her sword and prepared for battle. She just smiled and got ready herself. Himari charged at her, but she dodged the strike with ease. "So fast." you thought to yourself. Himari got ready to attack again but she created some kind of barrier keeping you in with her. Himari tried to cut through but to no avail. You were about to use Chaos Control to escape, but she grabbed your face and somehow suppressed your powers. "Now, quit dragging your feet and come with me. That's an order." "Who are you to order me around?" "Your grandfather asked me to look after you." "Grandfather?" "Do not listen to her master!" "W-what do you mean? Why would my grandfather do that?" "I was told that you would join my family. He and my family arranged for us to be married. Can your mind understand that?" "Married?" "You really don't remember anything, do you?" She then began to pull your face closer to her own. "The protective charm placed on you must have been extremely powerful.... But I'll make sure you remember." she said as she kissed you on the lips. You then had a little flash back about her as a young girl and how she kissed you before. "Could she be the girl I thought was Himari?" you thought. She broke the kiss and looked into your eyes. "Y-you're.." "YOU BITCH!" Himari yelled as she cut through the barrier. The girl dodged and you ended up falling backwards. She then caught you and kissed you in front of her. But this time she slipped her tongue into your mouth. "Did you really need to kiss him a second time?" The girl broke the kiss and licked her lips after a transparent line of saliva trailed from your lips to her own. "Second?" she said as you fell on your ass. "Don't be foolish. That was the third. That's probably enough for today. I'm sure he needs time to think things over. I'm staying at the Shin-Takamiya Hotel in the neighboring city. Visit me whenever you feel like it. After all, you are my fiancée, and you can expect me to treat you as such. However, it's a rather high class hotel. Please leave your pet at home. Of course, if your family does not cut its ties with the Ayakashi.... a certain demon slayer may have to destroy it along with the demons.By the way, my name is Kuesu Jinguji. Farewell." she said as more pages from her book surrounded her and she was gone in an instant. You and Himari went to your home shortly after that.
112.title: Meet Kuesu Jinguji

1121.content: Later that night, you were on the roof staring at the moon. You could not get that girl from before out of your mind. “Kuesu Jinguji, what a beautiful woman. But what did she mean by fiancée? And why did my grandfather arrange for the two of us to be married? Well I guess I will find out in time.” you thought to yourself as you got off the roof and went inside. Himari saw the confusion in your eyes and asked what was on your mind. You told her it was nothing. “Master, it was the girl wasn’t it? The things she said and her kiss.” She saw you blush slightly and she knew that was the problem. “If you do choose her, I understand. I am only your bodyguard. Even though you are more than capable of defending yourself.” “Thank you Himari, no matter what, we will be friends to the very end. I will visit her, but not this night.” You saw how late it was and the two of you went to bed.
1121.title: Later

11211.content: The next day, you woke up to the sun shining in your face. You first trained for about an hour. You then put on your armor and let Himari know where you were going. She nodded and you knew where to go. “Chaos Control!” you were instantly transported to the hotel where she was staying. But you were outside the building so you would not freak people out. You then went inside and walked up to the front desk. “Excuse me, I am looking for the room where Ms. Kuesu Jinguji is staying. I am here to visit her.” The desk clerk picked up the phone and dialed Kuesu’s room. “Hello Ms. Kuesu I have someone here who says he knows you. Should I give him the location of your room?” he said. The clerk nodded and hung up the phone. “Sixth floor. She is staying in our expensive suite. You will know when you get there.” “Thanks.” you then walked over to the elevator and went inside it. You pressed the button and went to the 6th floor. You could feel her energy coming from one of the rooms. You walked up to the door and knocked. “Who is it?” she asked. “It’s Yoru.” “Please come in. I would like to see your power of Chaos Control.” “Very well.” you then teleported to the other side of the door. She was pleased to see you again. Only this time at her place. “Welcome Yoru. I am so glad you could come to me. So will you be my husband?” “Listen Kuesu, I know what you say is true about my grandfather, but I need time to get to know you before I make that decision.” “As you wish. I am more than happy to spend more time with you. But my first question for you is this; Did you enjoy the kiss I gave you?” You blushed a little and said “Yes, I did. But for now, I need to see, what this city is like. If you need me, I’ll be on the roof.” You said as you transported yourself to the top of the building.
11211.title: A Visit

112111.content:
(Nightmare)


As you stood at the top of the building’s small spire, you continued to ponder why your grandfather hid all of this from you. Although, you were mostly thinking about one little event; The time Kuesu kissed you. You began to blush slightly as this thought passed though your mind. But what you didn’t know, is that as you continued to think of the sure bliss of that moment, Kuesu appeared behind you. “I can tell you really did enjoy that kiss. Though I wonder, do you remember the first time we kissed?” “I do actually. But the other stuff, I have no memory of. The arranged marriage, my grandfather, none of it.” “Oh, is that so? I do plan on making you remember." She said as she placed her hand around your face once again. But the peace of the moment was interrupted when you heard something coming towards you. You grabbed Kuesu and jumped out of the way. Whatever came at you sliced the small spire and the cut was clean, real clean. You gently set her down and looked for the one who shot that at you. You stood at the top of the spire again and created a small energy barrier around you. As you continued to look for the one who attacked you, you didn’t hear another energy blade coming at you. You thought your energy barrier would stop it, but the bade sliced through the barrier and made a deep slice in your side. You began to fall but you managed to land on your on your feet, but you then fell on your knees as you held your side from the pain. “Yoru! Are you alright?” “I’m fine Kuesu. Now who is the one who broke through my barrier?” “I believe that would be me.” a voice said. You looked up to see none other than Nightmare. “Nightmare! I should have known it was you. Although I am surprised at your new power. You were never that powerful before.” “I am glad that you are impressed. Now I will destroy you and absorb your powers for my own. Ah, who is this? I can see she has taken a s great liking to you. No matter, when I am finished with you, I will kill her as well.” But then you appeared in front of Nightmare with a rage filled look and landed a powerful kick which sent him into a near-by building. Nightmare stood up and looked at you. “You stay away from her! If you ever lay a hand on her, I’ll kill you!” “Yoru.” she said touched by your words. But then, Nightmare chuckled and said “I guess I will leave you two alone this time. But the next time we meet, you will not be so lucky.” he said before he disappeared. You slowly landed on the ground in front of her and asked if she was alright. “I’m fine Yoru-kun. Thank you.” “I’m glad that you are ok.” But then, the pain from Nightmare’s attack along with the blood you lost made you pass out. But Kuesu caught you and your face landed in her breasts.
112111.title: On the Roof

1121111.content: You woke up about an hour later in Kuesu's room. You tried to get up, but the pain in your side was too great. Kuesu saw you were awake and walked over to you. "Are you doing alright Yoru-kun?" "Yeah, but I've been better. I never thought Nightmare could become that powerful. He was never even close to being that powerful before. And I have to asume the others are just as strong. But I will cross that bridge when I get to it. But for now.." you said as you placed your hand on Kuesu's. "..are you sure that you are alright?" "I'm sure. While you were out, I saw what the girl Himari was to you, your friend. Ayakashi or not, I will accept her as a friend as well." "Thank you. I should let her know where I am so she doesn't..." you were interupted by the pain in your side. Kuesu pushed you back down onto the bed. "You need to let those injuries heal first." "Hand me my cell phone please." She handed you your phone and you called Himari. "Hello?" "Himari." "Master, where are you? Are you alright?" "I'm fine Himari. I'm still at Kuesu's. Listen, Nightmare has revealed himself again. But he is much stronger. I will give you the details later." "OK, come home soon master." "Understood." you said before you hung up the phone. Kuesu then cuddled up beside you and you blushed slightly. "Thank you for saving me back there." "It was my pleasure. I will do that as many times as needed." The two of you decided to take a nap until your injuries healed in a few hours.
1121111.title: Wake Up

11211111.content: A few hours later, your injuries were completely healed and you put your armor back on. Kuesu was also awake at that time. You knew you had to head home and inform Himari of Nightmare’s newfound power. “Where are you going?” Kuesu asked wrapping her arms around you. “I need to inform Himari of what has happened. And then, I need to move to the location I chose in case her ever returned. I will come back for you once I have everything set up. I promise you.” Kuesu understood and you used Chaos Control to return to Himari. You then explained to her Nightmare’s power and how it has increased so drastically. She then knew what you had in mind for preparing for Nightmare and his fellow warriors. You created a shadow clone to take Himari and her stuff to the location you chose. You then went back to Kuesu and told her that her stuff would come with her as well. You then put your arm around her and used the Chaos Control again. You were both transported to what looked like a garden in the middle of the city. You then stepped forward into the garden, but instead, you and Kuesu went through a barrier that hid a large fortress. You then created a larger barrier that hid you and any others from being seen in a battle. Kuesu was impressed by the size of your fortress. You both went inside and she saw Himari. The two of them got along pretty well now that Kuesu knew that the two of you were just friends. You showed both of them around the fortress and showed them to the guest room. Though there was only one bed. You did see the problem, but Himari said “Master, I will sleep here. You and Kuesu share your room. It’s fine.” “Are you sure you are ok with this my friend?” “I’m sure.” “Thank you.” You and Kuesu went into your room and you took off your armor. Due to the fact that it was around midnight, you fell asleep rather quickly. Kuesu rested her head on your chest and fell asleep as well.
11211111.title: The Chaos Fortress

112111111.content: The next day, you woke up to the sound of a beating heart. You also felt something soft on your head as well. You had a pretty good idea of what your head was resting on. You opened your eyes and found yourself resting your head on Kuesu's breast. You almost had a blast nose bleed form that and you tried to get out of that posostion, but Kuesu had woken up as well and held you head against her breast. "Good morning Yoru-kun. Did you sleep well?" "Yes I did. Thank you. But did you really have to hold my head against your breast?" "Oh, you didn't like it?" she asked in a teasing pout. "N-no I..quit messing with me!" "Relax, I'm just joking my love." You blushed a little bit an you went to train for a while. You had one goal above all others now. Protect Kuesu. You trained for about four hours before taking a little break.
112111111.title: The Next Day

1121111111.content: As the day continued, you felt your desire to protect Kuesu grew stronger with each passing hour. You noticed Kuesu walking onto the balcony and enjoying the view of the city. You walked up beside her and got caught up in the view as well. Though half the time you were staring at Kuesu’s beautiful face. “Isn’t it beautiful?” “Yeah. Very beautiful.” But you were so busy staring at her, that you did not notice that she caught you staring. You quickly turned away, but it was a little too late. She then placed her hand on your cheek and said “You know I don’t mind you staring at me. I am your fiancée after all. That is, when you allow me to be.” The two of you stared into each other’s eyes for a while and you decided it was time to act. You then took her hand and held it in a way where your fingers locked with each other. You then used your other hand to pull her closer to you which surprised her. “Yoru-kun?” “Kuesu, I have come to a decision.” “Yes, Yoru-kun?” “I have decided to…” but then, you sensed something coming at the two of you. You pushed Kuesu into the bedroom and you were sent flying into the top floor of a skyscraper. The one who did this was some kind of winged demon with enhanced powers. The demon flew off to where you landed and Kuesu followed. She was not too happy about Nightmare sending his forces to attack you at a time where she was about to get her answer from you. You stood up for a moment and saw the creature that did this to you. “So, you are the one who attacked me. I got to say, you couldn’t have picked a worse time to attack me, Nightmare.” The creatures eyes began to glow and Nightmare’s voice. “I see you figured it out. I am now able to control the bodies of my creatures from a distance. I am just using a drone for now. And the best part is that my powers can go into any body I posses.” “I am impressed. I would like to test your new power, IF I was the one fighting you.” “What is that supposed to mean?” You then used your thumb to point to the side. Nightmare looked over and he was attacked by a powerful flame attack. He was sent to the roof just from the force of the blast. Kuesu jumped to the roof and you followed. “Ugh, who the hell attacked me?” “That was me.” Before he could react, Kuesu hit him with another powerful attack and he began feel the burn of her attack. Kuesu the used a nice chunk of her power to completely burn the body Nightmare controlled to ash.

11211111111.content: You walked up to Kuesu and said "Wow. Remind me not to get on your bad side." Kuesu looked at you and said "Now what were you going to say before you were so rudely interrupted?" "You are my fiancée Kuesu. I do love you." Kuesu placed her hands on your face and leaned in to give you a kiss, but you told her to wait a second. "This is not the best place for this. Chaos Control!" You and Kuesu were transported back to the balcony of your bedroom. Kuesu then kissed you with a great amount of passion. You kissed her back and the two of you were making out on the balcony. But due to the amount of power Kuesu used, she got a little dizzy. You could tell and you helped her over to the bed. You were pretty tired yourself and you went to bed as well.

There is no way on Earth that he could gain that much power on his own. He must have gotten it from someoe. But Nightmare is boud by his word that if someone grants him power, he serves them. The only question is who Nightmare is working for." you thought to yourself. As you contined to meditate, you could feel Kuesu watching you. "I know you're back there my love." Kuesu comes from behind the door and enters the room. "I know what you're thinking and I agree. We need to find out who Nightmare is working for." "I know. I am unsure of who has that much power." But Kuesu sat down and leaned against you back-to-back. You enjoyed the time you were having with Kuesu, and you swore you would protect her from whoever is causing all this.

1121111111111.content: Later that day, you continued to figure out who Nightmare worked for, but nothing made sence. The only one you know with that much energy was Android 18. And that's when it hit you, he somehow fused with her and gained all of her power. But you also knew of one last problem. You knew Cell was still searching for Android 18 and since Nightmare fused with her, he would act as Android 18 for Cell's perfect form. You had to find a way to stop Cell from absorbing him. You then began a desperate search for Nightmare to warn him of the threat he has brought upon himself. Kuesu caught up to you and asked what was going on. You then explained the situation and she understood. You created a Chaos clone and sent it with Kuesu to keep an eye on her. You continued your search for a while before feeling a powerful energy. You soon made your way to the source and saw....

11211111111112.content:
(In case you do not remember cell http://images.wikia.com/dragonball/image...)
(Cell)

You found Cell searching in the alleys. "Cell!" you said getting his attention. He looked up and saw you and charged at you with all the speed he had. You barely managed to block it without being sent into a building. "So, Yoru, I see you're here. Now I know the one I seek is here." "You will not absorb Nightmare, not while I'm around." you said getting ready to fight. You knew one thing was still true about Cell even though he absorbed Android 17, that tail is a problem. Though he cant absorb you, he does have a large amount of power in it and can send you deep into the ground if it hits you. You had to avoid it. But Cell knew his tail would be your worries and as the sun was getting into the right position, he knew how he could lose you. He made a quick jab with his tail and you dodged it, but then as you were distracted, he used the solar flare to blind you. He then used his tail to slam you into the ground. Kuesu heard the commotion and knew you were rouble. She rushed off to fnd you as fast as she could. As you were in the crater, you could barely see. But when you regained your vision completely, you saw Cell was gone.

112111111111121.content:
(Flashback. Note; Yoru is in Tien's place in the clip. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bYafdlj2P...)

You got frustrated that you let Cell get away. "Damn it!' you said slamming your fist into the ground. But then, Kuesu and Himari showed up and saw you in the crater. "Master!" "Yoru-kun!" they said at the same time. They rushed over to you and asked if you were OK. "I'm fine girls. But the situation is getting worse by the minute. If Cell absorbs Nightmare, the entire world will be in danger." "Can he really be that powerful?" "Yes. I remember when he absorbed Android 17. His power grew by a massive amount. I can't explain in words, so I will show you what happened when we get home." The girls nodded and helped you get back to the fortress. As the girls helped you into your room, you then used your power to show them eactly what happened. "Memory Theater!' you yelled. The entire room changed and you were sent to the day Cell absorbed Android 17. "What is this?" "We are observing the memory of Cell's transformation. This ability of mine is what I call 'Memory Theater'. We can all see what happened. You can also feel the energy Cell had back then. Watch." As the memeory continued, they saw what Cell looked like before and how strong he was then. But they saw how he absorbed 17 and his transformation. They also felt how powerful he was now and they began to tremble.
112111111111121.title: Memory Theater

113.content:
(You Kuesu) (Your name is Sasuke here and look like him in Naruto Shippuden) (This is a flashback if you choose part 2 or 3)

You are Sasuke Uchiha, the last survivor of the strongest demon slayer clans to ever exist. You are also the strongest member of the clan that ever lived, due to your powers of chaos. You don't remember too much about your past. You swore to get revenge for your clan against the Master (of Evil) and his 10 Terrors, who were sealed aweay by your Mother, Father and Brother. You knew the time would soon arrive where they would rise again. Some of the minions of the underworld have already started to rise, such and the Hideaks, who were foot soldiers of the underworld. One day, you were in England fighting some of the Hideaks and their general. The Hideaks were easy enough, but the general was a different story. He was actually quite strong. You clashed with him for a while before you began to tire. "Sasuke Uchiha, you will die in the name of Blackheart!" the demon said. "I will not fall by your hand. Nor by the hand of Blackheart, the Ten Terrors, or the Master himself. I swear I will avenge my clan, no matter what!" you said as you began to rise. You then called upon the power of lightning and formed the Chidori. "What the hell?" he said with a slight hint of fear in his voice. You then charged at him with great speed and thrusted your arm forward yelling "CHIDORI!!" You landed the attack, but the demon also slammed you with a powerful punch before he died, sending you flying. When you crash landed, you found yourself inside the gates of a large mansion, with a large amount of security apparently. As the guards had guns pointed at your head, you did not have enough power left to create an energy barrier around your body to keep yourself safe. You were pinned. As the guards were about to fire their guns, they were called off by someone. "Stop!" They all pulled their guns back. You looked and tried to see who called them off, but you were losing consciousness fast. Everything got all blurry and you heard the same person say before you passed out "Take him to the infirmary now!"
113.title: Chaos Begins

1131.content:
(Your sword is the same as Sasuke's)

Hours later, you woke up to find yourself inside the mansion’s infirmary. You got up and noticed your entire upper torso was wrapped in bandages. You looked around the room and saw your sword next to the bed. You also noticed that the infirmary was unlike any you have ever seen before. It was almost like a bedroom. “Where am I?” you said to yourself. Just then, you heard the door open and the one who entered was a very beautiful young woman. She had long, silver hair and wore some kind of black dress. She had a crescent moon on her forehead, beautiful purple eyes and her breasts were at least a DD. You had never seen such a beautiful woman before in your entire life. “I see you’re awake. I am sorry my security was so rude. They overreact at times.” “I can’t argue with you there. Now, mind explaining what is going on? Who are you?” The girl giggled a little and said “Just as I remember you Sasuke. You waste no time do you?” You were surprised by the fact this girl knew your name. “How do you know me?” The girl shook her head and said “My goodness, what an unforgivable sin. Forgetting me like that...” she said as she walked over to you. “Allow me to reintroduce myself. My name is Kuesu Jinguji.” As soon as she said that name, some of your memories passed before your eyes. You remember a girl with black hair and a crescent moon on her head a long time ago, long before your clan’s demise. “J-Jinguji?” you said, still trying to remember. “I see, you still are having trouble remembering.” She said as she got next to you. You were unsure if you could trust her, so you jumped out of bed and halfway across the room. Kuesu smiled and got in front of you in an instant. “So fast.” you thought to yourself. She then gently grabbed your face and somehow suppressed your powers. “What the hell, why can’t I summon my strength?” you thought. “Now calm down and listen to me. Your family asked me to look after you.” “My Family? What do you mean?” “I was told by both our families that I would join the Uchiha. They arranged for us to be married.” “Married?!” “You really don’t remember do you?” She then began to pull your face closer to her own. “The troubles you have faced must have been extremely powerful.... But I'll make sure you remember.” she said as she kissed you on the lips. You then had a little flash back about her as a young girl and how the girl from your past kissed you before by the lake near your clan’s home. “Could she be the same girl from back then?” you thought. She broke the kiss and looked into your eyes “Y-You’re…” “I see you are beginning to remember.” She let you got and you felt a flood of memories return to you. What she said is true. All of it. “K-Kuesu, It’s been a long time hasn’t it?” “Yes. I heard what happened to your clan. I am truly sorry.” she said placing her hand on your shoulder. “No, it’s not your fault. I need some air.” you said as you got your clothes back on and went outside.

11311.content: As you stood on the roof looking at the night sky, you were still a little overwhelmed by all the facts you had learned this evening. Even though Kuesu was beautiful, you knew it would take quite some time to accept the fact she was your fiancé. Your thoughts were interrupted by Kuesu as she stood behind you. “Is there something you need Kuesu?” you said turning around. “I was about to ask you that Sasuke.” “You’ll have to forgive me, as you can imagine, this day’s been a little confusing for me.” “I understand Sasuke. And if there is anything you need, no matter what it is, you can come to me.” she said walking up to you and gently placing her hand on your cheek. You placed your hand on hers and gently took it off your face. “I know, but this a whole new thing for me Kuesu. I’ve lived on my own for the last ten years. I am used to being alone.” “Not anymore.” she said as she gave you a quick and gentle kiss. You calmed down in that moment, and you had no idea why. “You’re right. I’m not alone anymore.” “I think you should get some sleep. And whenever you are ready, you can sleep with me.” she said walking off. You blushed a bit when she said that. But you went inside not too long after she left and slept against the wall, something you were very used to.

113111.content: The next morning, you woke up at dawn to find you had some kind of blanket covering you. You figured Kuesu must have placed it there as you slept. You did a little stretching and went outside to train. You practiced your speed with your sword by slicing leaves. You stood outside as the wind blew leaves in front of you. Every single one that got in your sight was sliced in half. As you continued to do this, you heard someone walking up to you. You quickly put your sword away and turned to see Kuesu. “Good morning Kuesu.” “Good morning Sasuke. Did you sleep well?” “Yes, thank you. You know, for the blanket.” “You know you can use the bed in the guest room.” “Yeah, I am just so used to sleeping up against something.” “I understand.” But then, a small explosion came from the forest near-by and the two of you rushed off to check it out.
113111.title: The Next Day

1131111.content:
(Both)

As soon as you and Kuesu arrived, you saw many of the Hideaks surround a small number of people. You and Kuesu both knew that keeping them safe was priority number one. You had the faster speed, so you would knock them away from the people. You called on all the speed you could summon and in almost a flash, sent the Hideaks flying away from the civilians. As you stood in front of them, you told them to get out of there, which they did with no hesitation. “One problem has been solved, now for the Hideaks.” you said as you drew your sword. There were a lot more than there were before. About a hundred more came from the underworld and you were surrounded. Kuesu jumped through the crowd of Hideaks and landed right behind you. “Sasuke, do you remember that promise you made to me when we were kids?” You then remembered at the lake long ago, you promise that you would watch her back. “I do. Like I promised back then, I promise you now. I will watch your back.” “And I will watch yours.” The two of you were back to back and the Hideaks charged at the both of you. The two of you kept them at bay for a while, but you then noticed that they were getting ready to attack from a distance, thanks to your Sharingan. “Kuesu, jump!” And in that moment, the two of you jumped high into the air and barely avoided the attack from the Hideaks. “I say we finish this!” “I couldn’t agree with you more.” You and Kuesu moved your hands toward the other. You both left a little space between them and Kuesu called on her dark fire. You called on fire and darkness and sent them into the dark flame. “Now Kuesu!” “Right!” “Chaos…” "Dark…” “Phoenix Flower!” you both said as you thrusted your hands forward, sending a rain of purple fireballs at the Hideak army, destroying it in seconds. And before the entire forest could burn to the ground. You called on the power of water and used your Chaos Water Dragon to extinguish it. As you and Kuesu landed on the ground, you and Kuesu looked at each other before smiling at each other.

I want to hear the first inhale. Now sniff.” You were happy to oblige and took a very deep inhale, which Kuesu could hear easily. “That’s it Sasuke, just like that.” she said with a slight purr in her voice. You continued to smell her perfect feet or about an hour before she told you to stop. “Now my dear Sasuke. Pucker up for my feet.” she said putting her left foot in front of your face. Once again, you obliged and planted soft kissed on her feet, starting with the heel. “Very good. And no tongue, yet.” You continued to plant soft kisses on her feet. But once you got up to the toes, you could feel Kuesu try and push them into your mouth, starting with the big toe. “Open wide Sasuke.” You opened your mouth and welcomed her toe into your mouth. “Now suck.” she said in a flirtatious manner. You sucked her big toe pretty hard and used your tongue to drench it in your saliva. She then told you to open wide which you did. She then placed all of the toes of her left foot in your mouth. It will either be by this…” she said pointing to her lips. You blush a little brighter than before. “or this.” she said slowly moving her finger down her body and all the way to her pussy.
