11311111.title: A Hot Evening

113111111.content:
(Details on the moon blade http://kekkaishi.wikia.com/wiki/Hakudo)

The Next morning, you woke up to the sun shining on your face. You went to the usual morning routine of training. You began to create new attacks using your energy, Such as the Chaos Moon Blade. You began training by using that. You spread your arms to the sides and sent energy into your hands. Then you used that energy to create Crescent moons and threw them forward. Whatever got in their path was sliced like a knife through butter. And the surface of the sliced object was smooth and pure marble. You then felt Kuesu’s presence. “Good morning Kuesu.” “Good morning, Sasuke-kun.” You blushed when she called you that, but you got over it considering the events that occurred last night. But as if on cue, another explosion appeared, only this one was in the city. You and Kuesu went off as fast as you could to the source.
113111111.title: The Next Day

1131111111.content:
(Blackheart)

As soon as you and Kuesu arrived to the area of the explosion, you both saw a massive amount of destruction. There were many bodies of innocent people that were burned to the bone, which were covered in deposits of carbon. And there were many bodies that were nothing but bone. “My God. This is just terrible.” “All these innocent people, dead.” “What could have done this?” “That would be me.” a dark voice said. The two of you locked up and saw a man in a black overcoat, but you knew who it was in an instant. “Blackheart! You've returned!” “Of course, and if you think my work is terrible, this is nothing compared to what the Master has in store for this world. Even I don’t know.” “You bastard!” you said charging towards him with the Chidori ablaze in your hand. You thrusted your attack towards him, but he grabbed your arm and sent your own attack into your right thigh. “Sasuke!” Blackheart began to crush your hand. “Does it hurt Sasuke? It is only going to get worse.” He continued to crush your hand until it was broken. He let go and said “We will finish this in Japan. You heal up first before that. Until then…” he said as he pushed you. And with his great strength, he sent you off the building with ease. As you began to fall, Kuesu jumped into the air and caught you. “Sasuke, please tell me you’re alright.” “I…have to…stop him…” you said as you passed out. Kuesu used her powers to levitate your body and she took you back to the manor.
1131111111.title: Blackheart Returns

11311111111.content: You woke up a few hours later to find yourself back in the infirmary. Your thigh was wrapped up in bandages, and so was your hand. Thanks to your powers, you were a very fast healer. However, you had a feeling Blackheart knew this as well. But as you stood up, you could feel a sharp pain in your thigh. And as if on cue, Kuesu entered the room and saw you were out of bed. “Sasuke, you need to rest.” “I can’t afford to relax Kuesu. Blackheart is somewhere in Japan an I need to stop him.” You then attempted to get out of the infirmary bed, but Kuesu pushed you back onto the bed and said “I am not asking. Just relax.” She then got onto the bed with you, more specifically, behind you. She then began to massage your shoulders, and you could feel her soft hand work away your stress. “Sasuke, when was the last time you relaxed or anything?” “To be honest Kuesu, I can’t remember the last time I relaxed a little. I have been so busy with the Hideaks an now I have Blackheart to deal with.” “Forget about Blackheart for now. You just relax, and let me help.” she said in an almost hypnotic way. You could feel years of stress melt away thanks to Kuesu. As she continued, you started to fall asleep on her. “It’s okay Sasuke. If you want to sleep, then sleep.” You took that invitation and even though you were sitting upright, you fell asleep almost instantly. When Kuesu saw that you were asleep, she brought your head back and placed it on her breast and began to run her fingers through your hair. She noticed how peaceful you looked as you slept and she smiled. The two of you ended up sleeping together that night.
11311111111.title: Later

113111111111.content: The next day, you found yourself still in the infirmary. Though for some odd reason, you could hear a heartbeat. You then noticed that your head was right on Kuesu’s breast. You blushed a bright red, and gently tried to pull yourself away. But in that moment, Kuesu gently woke up and pulled you back onto her. “Good morning, Sasuke-kun.” “Good morning Kuesu.” “I hope you slept well.” “I did, thank you. But Kuesu?” “Yes?” “Do you mind letting me go?” you said with a blush. She smiled and said “I bet this your first time being this close to a woman’s breasts.” she said in a teasing tone. You blushed even brighter if that was possible. But after a quick giggle, she let you go. After you regained your composure, you and Kuesu began to talk about your plan for when you get to Japan. She told you she had a suite at a hotel there. You could get there easy enough, you just needed Kuesu to get packed a little. Once that was finished, you used Chaos Control to teleport to the hotel. Luckily, you appeared in an alley right next to it, so you don’t freak out the citizens. Kuesu checked into her suite and you followed her. The place was actually pretty fancy. The first thing you did was go onto the balcony to look at the city. And from there, you could see your old home, the birthplace of the Uchiha Clan. “My home…” you thought. But then you looked inside to see Kuesu settling in. You smiled and thought “But wherever I am, as long as I’m with Kuesu, I’m truly at home.” You went inside shortly after that.
113111111111.title: The Next Day

1131111111111.content: As soon as you and Kuesu were settled in, the two of you began to search the entire city for any signs of Blackheart. The two of you jumped from rooftop to rooftop in order to cover more ground. But so far, no luck finding him. Not even your sharingan was picking up any signs of him. You and Kuesu split up to cover even more ground. You searched until you found yourself at the home of the Uchiha, the place you were born.
1131111111111.title: The Search Begins

11311111111111.content: As you stood at the gates of the Uchiha, you began to get some major nostalgia. You walked through the gates to find the place the same as it was back then; battle-scarred. You noticed a few of the Uchiha clan crests had slashes through them. Even though they were carved into the stone, you knew this when the ten terrors invaded your home. You placed your hand on the crest and remembered what your brother once told you. It was the Uchiha that brought peace and law between the demon slayer clans. You continued your little nostalgia tour. You noticed the spot where both you and your brother practiced your shuriken skills. The log your brother used only had holes in the middle of the log, all in a single column. Yours on the other hand had holes all over the place. You smiled at the memory of you trying to catch up to your brother Itachi. You continued until ou found yourself in your old house.
11311111111111.title: Home of the Uchiha

113111111111111.content: You entered the house and noticed that everything looks the same as back then. You walked through the halls and saw your old room. You then noticed Itachi’s room and remembered how he used to jab you in the forehead with his first two fingers when you were a kid. You chuckled at that memory. Itachi was a good brother when he was alive. You then walked into the living room and you remembered how your mother managed to make people around her happy with just that warm smile of hers. You went outside and said to yourself. "I cant believe I had forgotten.”
113111111111111.title: Your Home

1131111111111111.content: But your little nostalgia tour came to an end when you felt a dark energy. “Blackheart.” you thought to yourself. You then rushed off to find him. And you found him rather quickly, only this time, he was in his true form. “Blackheart! I am going to put a stop to your evil, right now!” He began to laugh in a demonic way and said “Stop me? Don’t make me laugh!” he said as he appeared in front of you in an instant. He then landed a powerful blow to your stomach with his claws, forcing them into your body. He then sent a large amount of energy into your body, causing a massive amount of pain. He withdrew his claws and you fell on your knees in pain. “You couldn’t stop me in your dreams!” he said as le landed a powerful kick to your jaw, sending you flying into a mountain. The crash was so loud, Kuesu could hear it from the other side of the city. She knew you were in trouble and rushed off to help you. “Sasuke, please stay alive.” she thought to herself. Back with you, thing were getting worse. Blackheart used his dark power to create lightning made of negative energy. You were in a massive amount of pain. “I wonder how long you can last before you die just from the pain.” he said with a laugh. He stopped the lightning and before you could fall, Blackheart got above you and sent you flying towards the ground. But before you his the ground, he slammed you in the back with his elbow, almost breaking it in half. You had reached a whole new level of pain. “I am getting bored with you. I think it’s time to wipe the Uchiha Clan off the face of the Earth!” he said as he created a dark version of your Chidori, also made of negative energy. But before he could do anything, a large number of fireballs struck him in the back. He turned and saw Kuesu getting ready to attack again. He then decided it was time for a little retreat. “I will deal with you later my dear. Until next time Sasuke.” he said as he vanished into the shadows. Kuesu ran up to you and was extremely concerned about you. You were out cold as she picked your body up off the ground. She got you back to the hotel as fast as she could.
1131111111111111.title: Blackheart's Power

11311111111111111.content: As you lied there on the bed, Kuesu couldn’t imagine the kind of pain you felt during that battle with Blackheart. She decided it was time to confront Blackheart herself. But before she left however, she gave you a kiss on the cheek. She then went off to find and defeat Blackheart. She searched for a little bit and sound him in the middle of a valley. The two of them stared each other down for a moment.
11311111111111111.title: Kuesu Takes Action

113111111111111111.content:
(Itachi Mother Father)

As they stood in front of each other, Blackheart began to chuckle. “So, you think you can defeat me? Even after seeing what I did you your fiancé?” “I know you are strong. But don’t underestimate me, or it will be the last mistake you make.” “Alright then. Come and show me the power of the Jinguji Family.” “I would be happy to.” she said as they both took a fighting stance. After a moment Blackheart made the first move and attacked with his negative lightning. Kuesu managed to dodge easily an retaliated with a large number of fire balls. “This old trick again?” he said as he fired bolts of lighting at them. But to his surprise, the fireballs weaved around the bolts and struck him. The caused him some pain, but he started to chuckle. “I’m impressed. I guess you were right. I shouldn’t underestimate you.” “I’m just getting started.” she said as she fired more fireballs. Blackheart waited until they were close enough to jump. But as he was in the air, Kuesu continued her assault, only this time, what looked like pages from her book were shot at him. He managed to dodge a few of them, but some of them did a little damage by slicing his skin. And he was beginning to land, Kuesu slammed her hand on the ground and an attack traveled under the ground and scored a direct hit at Blackheart. Fire began to burn him which did cause a large amount of damage.

-Back with you-
As you lied in the bed, you began to sense what was going on and you thought to yourself “No! Kuesu is fighting Blackheart. She doesn’t realize he’s just toying with her.” You then had a flashback to the last time you talked to your brother Itachi. The two of you were sitting on the porch of your home looking at the sky. This was a couple days after you met Kuesu. “Hey big brother.” “Yes Sasuke?” “What do you Kuesu is up to right now?” Itachi chuckled and said “You like her don’t you Sasuke?” You blushed a little, but you didn’t deny it. “Yes, I do. I think she’s really pretty.” “Sasuke, let me tell you this. You know I won’t always be around to look after you. But if you ever need someone to turn to, you can always turn to Kuesu. I bet she likes you too little brother.” “Really? You think so?” Itachi then placed his hand on your head. “Yes. And no matter what happens, I hope you consider her a member of the Uchiha.” “I will big brother.” “Good. And remember, even if I may not be around, I will always be with you.” “And so will we honey.” You turned to see your mom and dad. “Mom, Dad.” “You can always count on us to be with you in your heart son.” Just then you opened your eyes and you felt your power grow. You got out of bed and said as you jumped off the balcony and onto the rooftops as you rushed off to Kuesu’s location. “Mom, Dad, Itachi, Thank you.” you thought to yourself.

-Back with Kuesu-
The battle continued as Kuesu thought she had Blackheart on the ropes. She got in front of him and landed a powerful attack which sent him into the side of a mountain. But as the dust cleared, Kuesu saw that he was actually laughing. “I will admit, I didn’t think you had this much power. But playtime is over now.” he said as he instantly got in front of Kuesu and landed a powerful backhand which sent her flying a little bit. He then grabbed her by the head and said as he created his Negative Chidori “Don’t worry. You won’t die alone. Sasuke is next on my list.” “CHAOS MOON BLADE!!” Just then, a Moon Blade (for short) Sliced Blackheart’s arm off and forced him to drop Kuesu. As he grabbed the spot where his are used to be, you yelled out “Hey Blackheart!” Blackheart turned and saw you, only you looked a little different. Your hair grew long and it was a silver color, just like Kuesu’s. You had a golden aura around you as well. Blackheart knew what this meant; your true power had finally awakened. “Get away from my fiancé.” You then got Kuesu away from him with such speed, neither of them could follow it. “Sasuke…” “Sorry I’m late my love. I’ll take it from here.” Blackheart then reattached his severed arm and said “You will not defeat me!” The final battle was ready to begin.
113111111111111111.title: Kuesu VS Blackheart

1131111111111111111.content: Kuesu could see the power flowing though you and agreed to stay out of it. “Don’t get cocky Sasuke!” he said as he fired a large blast of Negative Fire this time. This was big enough to turn the entire city into a pile of molten ash. But in a moment, you hit the fireball with an uppercut and sent it high into the sky. Both Blackheart and Kuesu were speechless at what they just saw. “Is that all you got?” you asked in a calm and collected tone. It sounded as if nothing in this world could harm you. “Are you mocking me!?” he said as he charged forward and threw a very powerful punch at you. You caught his fist in your hand and a massive gust of wind came from the impact. “Impossible!” “You just don’t learn.” you then pushed his fist up and used your great speed to land a powerful punch to his face, sending him all the way through the mountains. He then came charging at you with his Negative Chidori and you called on your Chaos Chidori. The two of you charged at each other and when you collided, the blast sent him flying. Kuesu walked up to you and was about to ask if he was finished, but you answered her as if you read her mind. “He doesn’t know when to quit.” Just then, Blackheart jumped into the sky surrounded by a black aura and said in pure rage “I will not lose to you Sasuke! I am Blackheart! And you and your fiancé can BURN IN HELL!!!” He then fired a massive beam that was too big for you to handle alone. “Kuesu.” “Yes Sasuke?” “I need your help for this one. We need to combine out powers to destroy him. Can I count on your help?” Kuesu smiled and said “Yes, you can always count on me Sasuke.” She walked up to you and the two of you grasped hands. “In the names of the Uchiha…” “And the Jinguji families…” “We will destroy you!” “SHUT UP!!!” he said as he sent more power into the beam. “CHAOS LOVE BEAM!” You both said as you thrusted your hands forward and a massive beam in a rainbow of colors shot towards Blackheart. It collided with his beam and it began to push it back towards him. “WHAT!?” “YOU’RE FINISHED!!!” “NOOOOOOOO!!!” The blast ended up shot into space and created the most dazzling display that night. Blackheart was no more.
1131111111111111111.title: The Final Battle

11311111111111111111.content:
Once all that business was done, you changed back and the golden aura faded. You hair remained its silver color and length. You fell on one knee from the energy loss. Kuesu got right in front of you to check on you. “Sasuke, are you alright?” “Yeah, I just used up a little too much power.” you said before you started to laugh. Kuesu never heard you laugh like that. But she loved the sound of it. “What a rush! But while I’m thinking about it, being I’m on one knee and all…” you said reaching into your shirt. You then pulled out a small box. Kuesu gasped a little. “Kuesu, I know our families arranged for us to be married, but I want to do this the proper way. Kuesu Jinguji, will you marry me?” Kuesu was touched that you would go the extra mile to propose to her. She noticed the ring had mini versions of the Chaos Emeralds on it. You put the ring on and said with a very warm smile on her face. It reminded you of your mother’s smile. “You don’t have to ask me twice.” She got on her knees and embraced you with a great deal of passion. As you embraced her, you saw your mom, dad and brother standing in front of. You smiled at this sight and you and Kuesu returned home shortly after that. You knew the Ten Terrors would be released due to Blackheart’s demise, but you didn’t care. You were just happy to have Kuesu by your side.


Down in the underworld, the defeat of Blackheart destroyed the seal that your clan used to put the ten terrors away. As they awakened, they knew that their objectives were clear. Revive the Master and destroy you and Kuesu.


TO BE CONTINUED……
11311111111111111111.title: A Proper Proposal

1132.content: Months have passed since you and Kuesu defeated Blackheart and you properly proposed to her. The two of you were the strongest pair of demon slayers around. And for a time, things were very peaceful. Though both of you knew it would not last too much longer. You both knew that the Ten Terrors would make their move and you would have to be ready. You had recently returned your hair back to the length you once had it. It still remained it’s silver color. England had recovered from the tragedy it had suffered under Blackheart. And even though you still had the occasional Hideak attacks, it was no problem. You had some allies in Japan as well as other parts of the world. You made friends with one Yuto Amakawa and a few of his friends who were Ayakashi. Himari Noihara, Ageha, Sasa and Shizuku helped out with any other Hideak attacks in Japan. And that was what was odd, the only two places they showed up were wherever you and Kuesu were, and Japan. You had a bad feeling it would not always be that way.
1132.title: Chaos Continues

11321.content:
(Kuesu's casual clothes http://www.animevice.com/kuesu-jinguji/1...)

One morning, you and Kuesu were back at her manor and did the usual activities. Kuesu was reading books on magic, and you were training to the fullest extent. Using your powers, you were able to increase the gravity around your body to five times Earth’s normal gravitational force. Your body was in the air as you tried to do push ups on your knuckles. Though you were having a lot of trouble. You had to get to 100 or you start over. But you were having enough trouble getting to 80. But about an hour later, you reached one hundred and you returned the gravity around you to normal. You then fell onto your back and began to pant heavily. Just then, A shadow was cast over your face and you knew it was Kuesu. “You really push yourself to the limit don’t you?” she said with a smile. You laughed a little and said “I guess you’re right Kuesu. I guess I’m just stubborn with my training.” “A little.” she said offering you her hand. You grabbed it and she helped you up. You and Kuesu went back inside and she set you down on the couch. As the two of you sat there, you said to Kuesu as you were panting a little “Hey Kuesu, how about I take you out on a date today? We’ve been so busy with Hideaks and stuff, we haven’t had a chance to have a little fun. So how about it?” Kuesu smiled and said after placing a tender kiss on your lips. “I’d love to. But I think you need to change. You should probably get in the shower as well.” “Fair enough, that will give you a chance to change as well.” You walked off to the indoor springs. You had used your powers to create a waterfall spring and you used that for your showers. As you stood in the waterfall, Kuesu picked a change of clothes for you before she changed herself. She brought you the spare outfit you had, which looked the same as the other. She changed into her casual outfit and waited for you. Once you were finished, the two of you went on your date.
11321.title: A Typical Morning

113211.content:
(Background music http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ml1Gi4Q2d...) (This date is montage form)

You and Kuesu arrived at the city and started your date. You started this off with a little lunch. Once that was done, Kuesu pulled you along to the next location, the movie theater. You agreed to see whatever movie Kuesu wanted to see, which to your surprise was an action film. And just like before, Kuesu pulled you with her, this time to do a little shopping. You rolled your eyes with the knowledge you would be carrying a lot of stuff, and boy were you right! You ended lifting so much stuff that you needed your sharingan just to see where the hell you were going. Luckily you were able to find a spot to use Chaos Control in order to drop the stuff off at the manor, much to your relief. You the returned to where you last saw Kuesu but couldn’t find her, at first. You ended up walking in front of the door of a photo booth and Kuesu grabbed your arm and pulled you inside. Turns out you had one crafty wife. She set it up to take one picture first, and it was of her locking lips with you with her arm around your neck. In the picture your eyes were wide open in a surprised way. Both you and Kuesu laughed at the photo, before you set it up to take several others. These were the type a regular couple would have on their first time in a photo booth, the last one ending with you holding Kuesu close to you and the two of you giving the camera a warm smile. Of course, Kuesu wasn’t done. She then decided to do one last shopping spree, only not for normal clothes if you get my drift. She ended up taking you to a lingerie shop. You about had a blast nose bleed with the first choice she had. She then found about another few. But when she came out in her tenth choice, you had a blast nosebleed so strong it sent you falling to the floor. She had picked out a pure black lingerie outfit that could make any man drool. Of course, she bought it, just so she could tease you, at first. The two of you went back home shortly after that, only you walked this time, enjoying the scenery.
113211.title: A Fun Date

1132111.content: As soon as the two of you returned home, both you and Kuesu sat on the couch. “Sasuke.” “Yes Kuesu?” “Thank you for taking me on such a fun date. And maybe I should take you with me to lingerie shop all the time.” she said in a teasing tone. You once again had a nosebleed just form the image of the outfit she bought in your head. “I take it you like the outfit I bought.” “Can you tell?” “Only a little bit.” she said with a giggle. After regaining your composure, you found Kuesu sitting on your lap. “Now here is a little thank you for today.” she said in a seductive way. Before you knew it, she kissed you again, only this time she had her tongue invade your moth, which you found to be hot as hell. The two of you started making out in that moment.
1132111.title: Back Home

11321111.content: Later that night, you and Kuesu sat down in the garden as the moon shined on the two of you. As you sat there, It seems that the moon had some kind of effect on you. You soon had a crescent moon on your forehead exactly like Kuesu's. You were not sure as to why this happened, but you just let it go. After a few minutes, you and Kuesu went inside and went to bed. But little did you know that the greatest challenge would soon begin.
11321111.title: Mark of the Moon

113211111.content:
(I am giving the Terrors colors as they speak)

The next morning, you and Kuesu woke up to some kind of earthquake. You both got dresses and went outside and you saw ten monsters coming from some kind of gateway. “People of the surface world, we are the Ten Terrors, and we have come to destroy this world in the name of the Master!” One of them turned and saw you with Kuesu. “Sasuke, it is good to see you again. I see you have a new friend with you. Allow us to introduce ourselves. I am Skulpin.” “I am Megahorn.” “I am Hekatoid.” “I am Itasis” “I am Matoombo.” “I am Blacklance.” “I am Serpentina.” “I am Magma.” “I am Gekkor.” “And I am Oculus.” "We are ready to take revenge on you for what your clan did to us all those years ago Sasuke. And I am going to enjoy killing your girlfriend!" he said as he pulled out his weapon an fired some kind of energy bolt at the two of you. You drew your sword and managed to deflect the blast, barely. “You will not harm her Megahorn." “What?! Why you-” “That’s enough Megahorn. We have only come to make our presence known, not come for a fight.” Megahorn growled and put down his weapon. “We will attack you one-by-one. We have rules to obey. Farewell." he said as he vanished. Kuesu could feel the amount of energy each of them gave off. She knew that this would be one of the toughest opponents you would ever face.
113211111.title: The Ten Terrors

1132111111.content: As the two of you stood there for a moment, you would have a lot of trouble with the terrors. But you knew that they could not return for a couple of days, which gave you enough time to train and have a little fun with Kuesu. The two of you returned home and the instant you did, you immediately started training. You started with the Chaos Moon Blade, but there was something different. You ended up creating four blades, even though you intended to make two. You had a feeling it was due to the mark on your forehead. You threw it and like the original it sliced through all in it’s path. You ended up throwing about 800 of those in a short amount of time, though it forced you to use up a large amount of energy.
1132111111.title: A Short Reprieve

11321111111.content: But your reprieve was much shorter than you thought, the sky went dark and you abd Kuesu knew a terror had arrived. You both went to the forest and saw Hekatoid. You were not sure why Hekatoid was considered a terror, but you didn't underestimate him. Which was good, because in an instant, he began to change in a way you would never have thought possible. He changed from fat blob of a toad to some kind of warrior. "No way!" "I improved since the last time I was on the surface world Sasuke. Now let me show you my power!" he said as he fired some kind of projectile at you and Kuesu. You both managed to avoid it, but you saw what happened to the ground around where you were both standing. It was as if it was dying. "Poison!" "Yes. My entire body is covered in a special poison. Anything that gets hit by it dies! Although, it will not kill you as quickly Sasuke." "Kuesu, no matter what happens, we cannot touch him." "Agreed." "This is going to be fun!" He continued to fire poison blasts at the two of you. You both managed to dodge, but then, he used his long tongue to grab Kuesu's ankle and swing her into a tree. She was not able to react in time as Hekatoid charged at her with his poison-coated clows ready to slice her. "Now DIE!!" he said as he made a single swipe of his claws. But then, you jumped in front of Hekatoid's attack at the last second, creating four very large scars on your chest.. "Sasuke!" "Oh this is perfect! He dies protecting someone who's weaker than him." Kuesu grew angry and attacked Hekatoid with a great amount of rage. She ended up surprising Hekatoid to where he was not able to fight back. She then created a fireball so large she incinerated him.
11321111111.title: Hekatoid's Poison

113211111111.content:
(Refrence http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TeuFEgjds...) (Note, for most of this, you are walking through the forest sanctuary)

As soon as Hekatoid was destroyed, Kuesu heard some commotion. She saw that you stumbled down into the part of the forest where the plant formed a tunnel. She slid down the side of the drop and ran up to you. You were sweating bullets and panting Kuesu then saw some kind of herb that was able to cure any poison. She placed in onto your wounds and turned away from you. “I’m sorry Sasuke. I should have been paying attention. I’m not worthy to be at your side.” “Shhhh….” you said extending your hand. “You’re wrong.” You placed your hand on her face and wiped the tears away from her eyes. “Look at the sky, tell me what do you see? Just close you’re eyes and describe it to me. The heavens are sparkling with starlight tonight. That’s what I see through your eyes.” “I see the heavens, each time that you smile. I hear your heartbeat just go on for miles. And suddenly I know why life is worthwhile. That's what I see through your eyes” “That’s what I see through your eyes. Here in the night. I see the sun. Here in the dark, our two hearts are one. It’s out of our hands. We can’t stop what we have begun. And love just took me by surprise Looking through your eyes. I see a night I wish would last forever. I see a world we’re meant to see together. And it is so much more than I remember.” “More than I remember.” “More than I have known.” “Here in the night. I see the sun. Here in the dark, our two hearts are one. It’s out of our hands. We can’t stop what we have begun. And love just took me by surprise Looking through your eyes. Looking through your eyes.” And the two of you found yourselves at a beautiful lake illuminated by the full moon.
113211111111.title: Looking Through Your Eyes

1132111111111.content:
As the two of you sat down by the lake, Kuesu noticed that your injuries were completely healed. And even though there was still a side effect of the poison remaining, which made you lose your since of balance for the moment, you were in no real danger at the moment. The moon truly did make the lake shine. The two of you were at peace for now. Kuesu then leaned up against you and you leaned against her. “Kuesu, you should never doubt yourself. You should know that you are the one thing that gives my life meaning now.” “Sasuke…” “And I never want you to think otherwise.” you said with a smile. Kuesu embraced you and you did the same. The two of you went home shortly after that.


But back in the underworld, the remaining members of the Ten Terrors gathered around the tablet known as the Rules of Darkness. They had their weapons gathered in a circle and a sphere of light spun above each one. Soon it stopped and went into the weapon of one of the terrors, making that terror the next to fight you and Kuesu. “I’m up.”
1132111111111.title: That Night

11321111111111.content:
(Note: The DarkFire Tsunami is similar to the Wildfire Tsunami, only the flames are purple.)

The next morning, you and Kuesu knew that another terror would strike soon, so you both got up and waited for anything to pop up. Luckily you didn’t have to wait long. A pillar of fire came from the mountains, which made you realize that Magma was the one to fight this time. “Kuesu, Magma is affected by dark fire. I doubt water will to much to him. Unless I throw him into the ocean.” you said as you and Kuesu made your way to the mountains. “I understand.” Soon, the two of you found yourselves standing in front of Magma, the head coming from his body was melting the rocks around him, even though they are about five feet from him. “I see you survived the poison Hekatoid put into your body. But you will have to deal with me now!” “Bring it on!” you said as you and Kuesu separated and began to attack him. Kuesu attacked with her dark fire attacks, while you called on the power of water and poured your power into the attacks. The two of you were hurting him no doubt, but he was far from being destroyed. He then sent out a shockwave of heat and sent you and Kuesu back a few feet. “You fools cannot defeat me. I have way to much firepower to lose!” You looked Kuesu in the eyes and she knew what you were thinking. As the two of you began to stand up, you said to Magma “Don’t take us too lightly you walking furnace. You want firepower? I’ll show you firepower!” You then began to call upon the power of fire and began to spin at an incredible rate. The heat was so intense you were just under supernova. “You think your Wildfire Tsunami is going to harm me? I am made of fire you fool!” “I think you’re forgetting me!” Magma turned around and saw Kuesu building up a large amount of dark fire into one blast. She then fired the blast and to Magma’s surprise, right at you. And just then, the dark fire merged with your attack, making it stronger and more deadly than before. “Impossible!” “Take this! DarkFire Tsunami!!” you said as you stopped spinning and kicked the attack at Magma. The attack was incredible effective not only destroying him, but most of the mountain was burned away. You fell onto the ground form the heat and Kuesu knew she couldn’t touch you for a bit. The two of you went home and you went to the hot springs, only this time you cooled the water down to keep your body from turning to ash. Once that was done, you decided to return the water back to normal and enjoyed the springs.
11321111111111.title: Molten Battle

113211111111111.content: As you continued to relax in the bath, you had a feeling Kuesu would make her move in a moment. “Three, two, one…” you thought to yourself. “Sasuke~” she said standing behind you. You turned around and saw Kuesu in a bikini, but there was a slight difference. She was only wearing the bottom part. You saw her breasts and had a huge blast nosebleed and you almost passed out. “Someone seems happy to see me.” she said in a teasing tone. You blushed the deepest red and looked away. But you heard Kuesu giggle before she hugged you and pressed her breasts into your back, intentionally of course. She was clearly doing more than teasing you this time. “Sasuke~” “Y-Yes Kuesu?” Kuesu then leaned in and whispered into your ear in the most seductive way possible. “I want you to do me~” You about keeled over when she said that. “K-K-Kuesu, don’t you think we should wait a little bit here?” you said still trying to regain your composure. “You know you want to~” “T-that’s not the issue here!” “Alright I’ll tell you what, I will wait until the moon is full.” You realized that was in two days. She is either really impatient, or really horny. More than likely it was the second one. In the end, you had to agree with her. The two of you had a peaceful bath after that.
113211111111111.title: A Bathing Partner

1132111111111111.content: Later that night, you and Kuesu got into bed after a nice relaxing bath. But back in the underworld, the Ten Terrors gathered around the Rules of Darkness again. And this time Oculus was the one to be chosen. He was know as the Terror of dreams. He went to the surface world and slipped into both of your dreams. And if he destroyed you in your dreams you would never awaken!
1132111111111111.title: Terror of Dreams

11321111111111111.content:
(background music http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oVIO1t9tY...)

As you slept that night, you found yourself in a room where it looked like you were in space. “What? Where am I?” You closed your eyes and got a feel for what was around you, and you felt a very dark energy. “Oculus! He’s here! Which means he must have entered Kuesu’s dreams as well.” “Not yet Sasuke.” “Show yourself!” But then, you were once again back at the grounds of the Uchiha Clan. Only this time you saw all of the family members were alive. “It can’t be…” you then saw yourself as a child. But then the sky went dark and the entire clan was under attack. And you were not able to use your powers back then, so you had no choice but to run. “No…No! Not this again!” “Yes. Your clan was under attack that day and what did you do? What did you do?! Nothing! Your clan was destroyed because you didn’t do anything. It’s all your fault.” You fell onto your knees and your body began to sink into the darkness. Oculus thought he had won but then, a memory of your past appeared before the two of you. It was the day you met Kuesu. “Sasuke, I want you to meet Kuesu Jinguji. The two of you will end up being future partners one day.” “Future partners?” “Yes. Although, I have to say little brother I envy you a little bit. Your only eight years old and you already have a fiancé.” You looked into Kuesu’s eyes and she turned away and blushed a little. And just from that memory you remembered everything else that happened after that day. From the time you landed outside her manor, to the battle with blackheart, all the way to that little bit in the bath. Kuesu had entered your dreams in that moment and pulled your body out of the darkness. “No! I was so close!” “Oculus. You have failed in more ways than one. As of now, I put the past behind me. Now I think it’s time to cast you out of my dreams and out of my house!” you said as you thrusted your hand forward, sending a burst of energy that shot him out of your dreams and through the wall of your bedroom. Kuesu woke up and you told her to just stay there and that you would handle this. Luckily you had the pants of your outfit on and jumped out of the hole. “Let’s just finish this!” you said as you created your Chaos Rasengan. You used your powers to create a fist of wind that came from behind Oculus and sent him towards you. You thrusted your arm forward and slammed him with your Chaos Rasengan. He was sent high into the air and your Rasengan created a large explosion, destroying him. “Good riddance.” “Sasuke, come back to bed.” “Coming my love.” You then walked through the hole in the wall and used your powers to repair it in an instant. You and Kuesu went back to sleep shortly after that.
11321111111111111.title: Never Turn Back

113211111111111111.content: The next day, you and Kuesu woke up a little later than usual, due to the fact you had Oculus visit in the middle of the night. You also realized that tonight would be the night of the full moon. And Kuesu was letting you know it too. She really did everything in her power to get you excited as possible. I mean she put on the works! Lightly biting your ear as well as licking inside it, the usual tease with her feet, and even flashing you every now and again. And you knew she would bring out everything she had tonight as well. Kuesu knew this was going to be trouble. She had to attack from a distance and she did just that. But no matter what she tried she could not hurt him. She was starting to tire and Megahorn saw this as a chance to attack. He fired small energy blasts at Kuesu but he made them explode before they hit her, causing her to fly backwards. As she stood up, she thought to herself “I see. Megahorn is the type to play with his prey before finishing them off.” Megahorn continued to walk towards her as he pulled out his weapon. But just then Megahorn was shot in the back of the neck with a blast of lightning, which cause him to fall onto the ground. Kuesu then realized he did have a weak spot. As he turned around, Kuesu then fired a powerful fire blast to his neck, nearly killing him. He had a massive amount of rage release at that moment and charged for her. He pinned her against the wall of a building and had the tip of his sword at her stomach. “Darkness shall never die!” he said as he was about to thrust his sword though her. But you tackled him from the side and stopped him just in time. As the two of you went at it inside a building, Kuesu thought about what he just said. She then placed her hand on her stomach and realized what he was talking about. “Chaos Chidori!” you yelled from inside the building. Kuesu heard Megahorn roar in pain and the light faded. You came walking out of the building with a few deep cuts on your arms, but you would live easily. You then used your powers to repair everything and you walked up to Kuesu. “So, shall we go home?” “Yes. Let’s go Sasuke.”

Megahorn wanted to separate you and Kuesu before killing any of you. You had a pretty good idea as to why he did this. You now had two lives to protect above any others; Kuesu’s and the unborn child within her. You knew that you needed some help. You decided to return to Japan and get some help from your friends. But the two of you slept that night, feeling closer than ever, knowing what will be in the future for both of you.

113211111111111111111111.content:
(Himari Shizuku Yuto Liz)

The next day, you and Kuesu returned to Japan using Chaos Control and once you checked into the hotel room again, you went to find the others. You all met at Liz’s café. You then explained to them what had happened, leaving out the part of Kuesu being pregnant. “I see. And what are we supposed to do about these guys? If they give you trouble, how can we help?” “The terrors may be strong, but they are not invulnerable. Megahorn was the hardest to kill, but we took care of him.” “But there is something odd about one of them.” “What are you talking about? ~Nano.” Liz had brought you some tea. “Here, it’s been a while since we’ve seen you two.” “Thank you Liz.” you said as you drank some of her tea. “One of these guys seems different from the others. But I have no idea why.” “We might have to look further into this.” But in that moment, another Terror showed up and the entire city began to have a blackout. You and the others went outside to check it out.

Himari found him but decided to observe him. “What a peaceful place.” But then he noticed a little boy chase his ball into the street, with a car coming at him. He used his power to stop the car without destroying it. He gently grabbed the child’s hand and got him away from the street. Himari was surprised by what she just saw. “You need to be more careful.” The child thanked him and gave him the ball. “Why did he give me this thing?” “It’s called a ball.” Matoombo turned around and saw her. “You play with it. Give it here.” Matoombo handed the ball to her and she showed him what you can do with it. She accidentally hit him in the face with it but he just laughed. “You’re not like the others are you? My name is Himari.” she said extending her hand. But before he could shake it, Shizuku arrived and shot a few ice needles at him. Matoombo was about to react when Himari got between both of them. “What are you doing cat?” “Look, like Sasuke said he’s different.” “I am Matoombo, I have come to destroy your world.” “You see cat, he wants to destroy our world.” “You can’t. If you destroy our world everyone who die. Me, the little boy you saved, everyone.” Just then the sphere made of energy returned and Matoombo could detonate it. But instead, he destroyed it, returning all the energy back to it’s original place.

What could you possible gain by destroying our world?!” “Your world is now MY world!” he said wrapping his tendrils around each of you Liz even got caught in this somehow. “Do you want to see what my world will look like?” he said as somehow time began to pass by in seconds. Within a minute, 50 years have passed and everything looked desolate. All life seemed to have faded away. “This is the future of your world, a barren wasteland where no one will oppose my will.” “Not if I can help it!” You said as you called on your super form. You picked her body up off the ground and you and the others went into a near-by cave.

Don’t you say that, not you! Do you think, Kuesu would give up if the situation was reversed?” You looked away for a moment and in that moment, the Master came into the cave. The force sending you and the others all to the same side of it. “It is time to finish this meal.” he said before laughing. You saw how everyone struggled to stand, and you knew you were the only one who could stop him. “No.” you said as you stood up. “I call upon all the powers of good still left in the world, all the power still left in my body. Come to me now!” you said as your power increased so you could increase your power, into a new level of your super form. You then charged towards the Master with a pair of swords made of energy. The first one was destroyed after you shattered the armor on his head. You then stuck it into his shoulder and he began to scream in pain. “Take us back! Take us back now!” You then told the others to take your hand and grab Himari’s body. They did as you asked and soon you all returned back to your time. You felt extremely drained however.

1132111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(All Tamamo)

As you and the others lied on the ground, the Master stood there in a rage. “Look at what you have done to me! I will return to the underworld and gather my strength!” “I’m afraid that will be impossible.” “Kuesu!” “Your pit of darkness lo longer exists.” “No longer exists?!?!” “What she means is you have nowhere to return to.” “Itassis! But how? Where is Skulpin?” “He is no more.” “What!”

-Itassis Flashback-

Itassis walks up to Skulpin who was surprised to see her alive. “Itassis? How are you alive?” “With a little help from my friend, Necrolie.” she said as Necrolie helped Kuesu out of her prison. “Are you alright?” “Necrolie!” “Itassis was the only one who ever showed me any kindness, so I revived her.” “I never did trust that bat!” “And now you will fall!” she said as the two of them attacked one another. Skulpin had Itassis on the ropes for a while, but she struck back and eventually defeated him. “But how?” “With courage.” Skulpin was destroyed at that moment, and Itassis destroyed the Rules of Darkness tablet, the only thing that kept the underworld around in the first place. Itassis, Necrolie and Kuesu escaped the underworld before it collapsed on top of them.

-with you and the others-

“But I am your Master!” “Well this puppet has cut the strings!” she said as she fired a blast from her weapon. The blast looked like it destroyed him, but you all knew better. “He is gone for now, but he will be back in a moment.” You and Kuesu embraced each other with a great deal of passion. "Oh my love. Never leave my side again.” “I was about to say the same to you Sasuke.” “So you’re both safe?” “Yes. I wouldn’t have gotten out of there if it weren’t for Necrolie and Itassis.” “I cannot thank either of you enough for saving my wife…” you said as you gently placed your hand on her stomach. “Or my child.” Necrolie walked over to Himari’s dead body and used her powers to revive her as well. But then, the master showed up again only he was much larger and much more powerful. “This is bad. My super form is not strong enough to stop him!” “Maybe we can help.” Yuto said as he showed up with a large number of people. “Or maybe we can help.” An Ayakashi named Tamamo said as she showed up with a large number of Ayakashi. “I spoke to all the people of the city. I told them about the Ayakashi and how they should not be afraid of them.” “And I spoke the same thing to the Ayakashi. Humans are not the enemy, our true enemy has been that thing all along! So we are more than happy to lend you some of out power Sasuke.” The people and the Ayakashi gathered around you and grasped each other’s hands. “We believe in you Sasuke!” they all said as a large flash of light came from where you were standing. And when the light cleared, you stood there with a much different appearance. Your hair was much longer again, but your hair became a golden color, same with your eyebrows. Your eyes were ablaze with the legendary Mongekyo Sharingan. The energy around you was so powerful it was almost scary. You and the Master were on equal levels now. “You should be proud of yourself. No one has ever forced me to use this kind of power before.” The Master shrank down to your size, but his power was no less as large as your own. “It’s time to end this!” “I couldn’t agree with you more.” You said as you both took to the sky in a way that looked like you were floating.

11321111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Background Music http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ISK9JHwcp... or http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rM85TNMnU...)

You and the Master took to the sky and stared each other down. The two energy aura’s began to create lightning against one another. The two of you then charged at each other and slammed your fists against each other, created a massive gust of wind. The two of you fought at close range for what seemed like hours, until the Master began to tire, and truth be told, so were you. But you knew you had far too much at stake to lose. "I will not lose to a mortal like you! Now die!” he said shooting his tendrils at you. Thanks to the Mangekyo Sharingan, you managed to see the weak spots of the tendrils. You dodged each of then and focused your energy into your first two fingers like a needle, and struck them there, severing the tendrils. “No!” “You will have to better than that!” “With pleasure!” he said as he charged at you with a great rage. He then made a single swipe of his claws and sent you through about ten buildings and into the ground. But you came charging back and landed a powerful punch to his stomach, and then used your elbow to slam him in the back, sending him falling towards the ground. But before that you got down to the ground and landed a powerful roundhouse kick, sending him flying just as far and through just as many buildings. You knew he was far from finished and charged at him. He then did the same and a massive explosion came from the impact. The two of you slid a bit though to stop himself, the Master had to sink his claws into the ground. This battle would definitely go down in history as the ultimate battle. The Master then began to grow frustrated at first, but then he calmed down and said with a laugh “Excellent. Your new power shall provide me a feast!” He said as he grew to his massive size and began to suck all the energy from you and everyone around you. You then jumped towards him and landed a powerful punch that sent him to the ground. He then returned to his normal size and he began to stand up. He once again took to the air and in a moment, got behind you and sent you deep into the Earth. He was tenderizing you at this point. You stood up and said “You want my power?” you said as you began to charge your energy. A large energy aura began to surround you and everyone was amazed by how much of it you were calling upon. “Here take it! Chaos BLAST!!” you said thrusting your hands forward and unleashing a very powerful beam. The Master opened wide and began to devour the beam. “Hang in there!” “It’s up to you!” “You have to stop him!” “Don’t give up!” “You can do it!” “You’re strong enough, we know you are!” “Now show this guy who he’s dealing with.” “And kick his ass!” “SASUKE UCHIHA!” The crowd continued to cheer you on as the Master continued to devour your attack. “W-what?! This is impossible! I have eaten all I can eat and still it comes!” “This ends NOW!” you said as you poured even more power into the beam. The Master could not take this much energy into his body all at once. “NO STOP!!” But you were not about to be stop now. Soon the concentration of energy was too much for him and he was sent deep into space by the force of the blast. And once that happened, he became one of the biggest explosions to ever be seen by humans. In fact, the amount of energy ended up creating a new nebula though a small one. It resembled the Mangekyo Sharingan,, so it was known as the Eye of the Uchiha. As the people turned their eyes away from the new spectacle in space, they wondered if you were alright. But then, you walked out of a huge cloud of smoke with your hair back to its silver color, though just as long as it was a minute ago. Kuesu ran up to you with everyone else soon following. Kuesu ended up giving you a tackle hug, though it did make you grunt from the impact, you still managed to keep your footing. The others gathered around you and in that moment, Matoombo returned and Himari gave him a hug. “Everyone, I hope you will welcome Itassis and Matoombo into your lives as well.” Everyone gave a big cheer as soon as you said that. “And how about we give Sasuke and Kuesu a big round of applause for the fact their going to be parents?” Everyone, including the Ayakashi cheered even louder after that. It looked like the future was going to be a bright one.
11321111111111111111111111111111111.title: The Ultimate Showdown!

113211111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Months have passed since the Master was destroyed, and Kuesu was now heavily pregnant with your child. Though you were not the only one who was going to be a father. Yuto actually got married to Himari and they were expecting as well. But as for everyone else, life was becoming quite peaceful. Necrolie helped Liz out at her café every now and again, Itassis and Shizuku became great friends while both of them usually stayed at the library at times. But there were times of danger as well. Though the underworld seemed destroyed, it somehow returned and the hideaks continued to pop up every now and again. But you knew that one day, an evil that could threaten the entire universe would arise. But for now, you and Kuesu just enjoyed life to the fullest. Soon, the time for Kuesu to give birth to your child arrived. You and Kuesu gave birth to a son which you named after your brother Itachi. And a couple days after that, Himari gave birth to a daughter named Kagome, who had the power of both Himari and the Amakawa clan’s Light Ferry. You, Kuesu, Yuto and Himari knew that the two would grow to be the best of friends.

But one day, a demon who’s power was unreal had arrived onto the planet. He looked at the city and said to himself “I see, this is the world all those who came before me tried to destroy. I need time before I can make my presence known. And when I do, you’re first on my list Sasuke Uchiha.”

TO BE CONTINUED....
113211111111111111111111111111111111.title: The Next Generation Begins

1133.content:
(Itachi Kagome) (Itachi's Outfit http://i579.photobucket.com/albums/ss231...) (For about half of this story, this will be from Itachi's POV)

Seventeen years have passed, and Itachi has grown into quite the young warrior. He was actually able to use the sharingan when he was only four. He would have given his own uncle a run for his money if he were still alive. He even seemed to be a spitting image of him. He and Kagome were the best of friends, and like her mother with Yuto, did make Itachi nervous from time to time (wink wink). But still, life was actually very peaceful. You and Kuesu were still the strongest couple around, but you had a feeling that would not be the case forever. Itachi was born with both your powers as well as Kuesu’s. One day, he had just finished a training session with you and Kuesu. He had to head for school as well. Though luckily for him and a few other students, uniforms no longer applied. As he traveled to school by his usual means, the rooftops, he slowed down for Kagome to catch up to him. “Hey Itachi! Good Morning.” she said wearing an outfit similar to what her mother wore when she went to school. “Good morning to you to Kagome.” “You always manage to keep that cool and collected attitude with me, at least most of the time.” she said holding onto his arm. “H-hey hold on now.” “What’s wrong? Am I making you nervous?” “She’s doing this on purpose.” he thought to himself. The two of them continued to walk to school, while not too far from the city, a evil far greater than any before it was about ready to make himself known.
1133.title: Chaos Still Continues

11331.content: As Itachi was at school, you and Kuesu did some one on one training as well. You had to admit, Kuesu had gotten much stronger in the past 17 years. She could even give your super form a run forits money. After about an hour of this, the two of you decided it was time to relax a little. The two of you decided to head for Liz's cafe. As the two of you walked inside, you noticed Liz looked exactly the same way as the last time. "Welcome. Oh, Sasuke, Kuesu. Good to see you two again." "It's good to see you as well Liz." "I hope you can give us a table for two." "Make that four." You turned around and saw Himari and Yuto. "Hey guys." "Mind if we join you?" "Not at all." Liz showed the four of you to a table and you all sat down to a nice chat. You all decided to catch up with each other. Yuto was still the kind of guy who didn't want to fight unless it was absolutely necessary. Himari still called him Master, and continued to embarrase him in the same way Kuesu does with you. But as the four of you were drinking Liz's delicious tea, you began to change to a serious subject. "Listen, I think it's time we had a little talk." "What is it Sasuke?" "I know you guys can feel the evil energy that seems to be gathering outside the city." "He's right. I'ce felt this energy for the last couple of weeks now." "As have I." "Whatever it is, this could threaten the entire universe." "I might not be able to stop it this time." "Don't worry Sasuke. You still have Kuesu and you can always count on the help of your friends. And don't forget about Itachi and Kagome." You chuckled a little. "You're right Liz. I had nearly forgotten Itachi is advanced well beyond his years." You then took another sip of tea. "Besides, I'm sure both Kagome and Itachi can feel this power as well." And you were correct as usual. Back at his school Itachi stared out the window and thought to himself "This energy, I've never felt anything like this before. But no matter what, I must do my best..." he then looked at Kagome "To protect her."
11331.title: Evil Approaches

113311.content:
(You are Itachi at the moment)

Once class was over, you decided to head for the roof during free period. You were followed by Kagome as usual, being the two of you would always hang out together during this time. You stood on top of the water tower and looked at the mountains. Kagome saw the intense look in your eyes and asked what was wrong. "I know you can feel it too Kagome." "You mean that energy?" "Yeah." "I know, it's not something a person can easily ignore." "Agreed. It's the type of power that gives you chills, because you've never felt anything like it before." "But no matter what happens, I know that you and I can handle it if we work together." You chuckled a little. "I know I can always count on you Kagome. And also, mind if I ask you something?" "Sure, anything." You then placed your hand behind your head and said with a blush "Do you, I don't know, want to go out sometime?" "Are you asking me out on a date?" You blushed a little more when she said that, which confirmed her answer. "Sure. I'd love to." "Okay, how about tomorrow?" "Sure thing. See you then." she said as she went back inside. You were cheering a little on the inside, but you still had the feeling that you would have to train harder than ever before to prepare for what's coming.
113311.title: At The School

1133111.content:
Later that night, after walking home from school with Kagome, you went to the training hall and started training. You were able to do many of the things your father and mother could do, for example the Chaos Moon Blades, the Chaos Rasengan and Chaos Chidori. But you started off with the type of attacks that the Uchiha were best known for; fire-style attacks. Your fireball jutsu was the strongest one you had, though you prefered to use the Phoenix Flower Jutsu. You managed to hit the targets true enough, but it was still not a perfect bulls-eye. You continued to rain for a couple of hours before your dad entered the training hall. He saw you were on the ground from exhaustion. He walked over to you and extended his hand. "You really do push yourself just like your old man." He grabbed your hand and you helped him up. "Yeah, I guess I do." "You know you would have given your uncle a run for his money." "I could?" "Oh yes. Your uncle was strong, but you were able to use the sharingan at half the age he was. I bet he's very proud to have you share his name." "Thanks dad." "Now you go relax with your mother. I have to do some training of my own." "Okay dad." you said as you left the training hall.

-Switch to Sasuke-

As soon as Itachi left the room, you used your powers to increase the gravity around you to 500 times Earth' normal gravity. Even though you were almost flattened right there, you dstarted with some push-ups with your body in the air. It took you two hours just to get to 100, and you continued until you reached twice as much. You returned the gravty to normal and you decided to lie there on the ground for a moment to catch your breath.

-with Itachi-

You and your mother were sitting down in the clan library and you continued to read books on the Uchiha and Jinguji clans. You were very interested in your heritage, and you found some pictures of your uncle, who looked almost exactly like you, with the difference of the crecent moon on your forehead. "Itachi, I heard you have a date with Kagome tomorrow." You blushed a little when she brought it up. "You are like your father in so many ways." "What do you mean?" "Well, even though we were engaged, he didn't ask me out on a date until about a year of living with me." "Why did he wait so long?" "You have to understand Itachi, you father went through a lot before he arrived at my manor all those years ago. So he was not the kind of guy who knew how to ask a girl out. But I remember how magical that date felt. I still have the pictures from that date." "It sounds like you cherish that moment mom." "I do. And I cherish every moment with your father. And I hope you do the same with Kagome." "I will." "Good, now I think you should get in the hotsprings, you want to be all nice and clean for Kagome." "Alright." you said as you walked for the springs. "So Kagome can be dirty with you later." You about fell over when she said that. "Mother!" "I'm just kidding. I'm going to get your father." she said as she walked for the training hall.
1133111.title: That Night

11331111.content: As you were in the hot springs, you couldn't help but think about Kagome. She was on your mind quite a bit though you never admitted it to anyone but your parents. But even though you were the best of friends with Kagome, you knew that you would like to be more than friends one day. But you decided to enjoy each and every moment with her just like your mother advised you to. You went to bed later that night with Kagome in your dreams. But as you slept that night, deep within the mountains, the evil you and the others had been feeling was getting ready to reveal himself at last. "It is time."
11331111.title: Later

113311111.content:
(Background Music http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DtuJE0_3...)

The next day, you woke up and got ready for your date with Kagome. You put on your usual outfit, being it was only the first date and all. You told your mother and father where you were heading and they wished you luck. You once again used the rooftops to travel to Kagome's house. Once you got there she was wearing her usual outfit as well. "Looks like we both went casual here huh?" "True but no need to get super fancy for the first date." "Agreed. Now come on, let's go!" she said as she grabbed your hand and pulled you behind her. You began to wonder if your dad had to deal with this sort of thing. The first thing you did was go to a movie, which was actually pretty good. You then decided to grab some lunch. Once you did that, the two of you got some pictures taken together. The two of you were having a lot of fun, though you had to carry a few things Kagome bought. But as you were shopping, you decided to buy a special necklace. This was one of those necklaces that was actually two. It was a Yin-Yang where the two could be worn by different people. You took the Yang and Kagome wore the Yin. This seemed like an awesome first date. But then, a massive explosion came from the mountains and you knew that it was the evil you had been feeling for so long. You knew you had to do something about this and so did Kagome, so the two of you rushed off to the mountains.

-Sasuke-
While Itachi and Himari were on their date, you Kuesu, Himari and Yuto ended up having a double date. But during the middle of it, you all felt that massive energy. Yuto knew he couldn’t keep up, so he stayed behind while you, Kuesu and Himari rushed off to the location of the explosion. But along the way, you and Kuesu felt so many familiar energies. You both began to shudder. “What’s wrong?” “That one energy feels like a combination of all those we have ever faced!” “Blackheart, The Ten Terrors, even the Master, all their energies seem to be rolled up into one being!” “One thing is for sure we are about to meet the ultimate enemy.” “And knowing Kagome, she is rushing off to fight this thing.” “Same with Itachi. We better hurry.” you said as the three of you began to pick up the pace.

-Itachi and Kagome-
As the two of you approached the cause of this, you and Kagome began to talk to each other about this. “Kagome, no matter what happens, we need to keep our guard up!” “I agree. This is an energy like no other.” “Yes. I say we show him the powers of our families; The Uchiha, Jinguji…” “And Amakawa.” Soon, the two of you reached the source of the explosion.
113311111.title: The Next Day

1133111111.content:
(Naraku http://myinuyashafanfiction.synthasite.c...) (Note: Naraku sounds like he does in Inuyasha)

As you and Kagome reached the site of the explosion, you saw the amount of destruction there. The rocks were melted into puddles of lava. The trees were dead from the energy from it. And even some of the animals had died as well. “This is terrible.” “I agree. But we need to find the one who did this.” you said as you called upon your sharingan. “Let me make it easier for you.” a voice as the two of you took a fighting stance. What appeared to be a man in some kind of armor walked out of the crater cause by the blast. But you and Kagome knew that he was far from human. “I see. You two are the current heirs." He then looked towards Kagome. “You are the hair of the Amakawa clan. And you…” he said as he turned his attention towards you. “You are the heir of both the Junguji and Uchiha clans. it’s a pleasure to finally meet you, Itachi.” “I see you know who we are.” “Of course. You think I haven’t been observing you in the seventeen years I’ve been here?” “Observing us?” “Yes, though I am not entirely sure how you two fight I know your parents very well.” “What do you-” “Itachi!” “Kagome!” You both turned around and saw your parents. “Mother, Father!” “Mother.” “We see you came here as well.” “Not like I could ignore this kind of energy.” “Let us handle this.” “I have waiting to meet you three face-to-face, mainly you two.” he said looking at Sasuke and Kuesu. “I see we don’t have to introduce ourselves. Now who are you?” “Me? In a word, I guess you could say I’m the underworld.” “What?” “You see, when Itassis destroyed the Rules of Darkness, she thought she destroyed the underworld. But in fact, she just destroyed the only thing keeping it from taking living form. I was born on that day, and from the instant of my creation, I absorbed all those who were created in the underworld and had died by your hand.” “So that explains how you have the energy of Blackheart and the others.” “Exactly. And before the Master was destroyed, all the energy he did and could have absorbed from your last attack was also transferred to me as well.” “You have all the energy I put into that attack?!” “Yes. And as for my name, call me Naraku.” he said as he lifted his hand and sent a huge burst of energy at the five of you. You were all sent flying a little, but you didn’t waver. “Alright, I say we get this started!” he said as he took on his super form. “Right!” Kuesu and Himari got ready to fight as well. They told you and Kagome not to get involved. You both agreed, but reluctantly. The three of them charged for Naraku. “Please, you will have no luck defeating me.” “We’ll see! Chaos Spear!” e said as a shower of energy spears came from the sky towards him. He managed to dodged every one of them, which was quite a surprise. Kuesu and Himari attacked as well, but their efforts were about as successful as your fathers. Naraku did the same thing as he did before and sent the three of them in the air. But then, he brought his hand down and three fists made of negative energy send them deep into the ground. “I was hoping for more of a challenge.” “Don’t forget about me.” you said as you appeared behind Naraku. He was surprised by this which allowed you score a direct blow to him with your Phoenix Flower attack. He felt very little pain, but he was still impressed by you. Kagome got behind him and slashed at him with her claws. Once she did that, she jumped next to you and the two of you took a stance. “I am impressed. You are both worthy to be the heirs of your clans. I shall let you enjoy this taste of victory for now.” he said as he disappeared into the darkness. You and Kagome knew that starting now, your training had to be taken more seriously than ever before.
1133111111.title: Naraku, the Ultimate Evil!

11331111111.content:
As soon as Naraku had left, you and Kagome ran over to check on your parents. “Mom, Dad, you okay?” “Are you alright mother?” you both said picking them up. “Yeah, I’m alright kiddo.” “I’m alright Itachi.” “Yes, thank you Kagome.” “Where’s Naraku?” “He’s gone. He seemed impressed when he left.” “It seems like your mother and I have to teach you everything we know.” “Agreed. I will have to teach you as well Kagome.” “But you guys, that might not work. He seems to know all your moves and fighting styles.” “True, but the two of you have your own unique fighting styles. And you adopt with new attacks. So even if he knows our moves. He wont know how you’re going to use them.” “We will start the training tomorrow. But for now, the two of you head back home.” “Alright. Come on Kagome.” “Alright Itachi.” The two of you left shortly after that. As did your parents.

-Sasuke-
You, Kuesu, and Himari met up back at Liz’s café. You used your powers to call on some of your old friends as well. Shizuku, Ageha, and Sasa arrived as well. Even Itassis and Matoombo showed up. “We got your message. ~ Nano.” “You needed us?” “Yes. We have a new enemy to worry about.” you said before giving them all the details. Once you did that, they all looked extremely surprised, and rightfully so. “Damn it! If I knew this would happen, I would have never destroyed the tablet.” “Do not blame yourself Itassis. I had a hand in this as well.” “So how are we going to beat this guy?” “Well, that is where I am going to need some help from you guys.” “Huh?” “Himari, you and Ageha can teach Kagome how to wield a sword to the best ability possible.” “Agreed. Can I count on your help Ageha?” “Sure thing Himari.” “And Shizuku, I need you to teach Sasuke how to fight using water and ice. I will also need your help Sasa.” “We will help. ~Nano.” “Sure. I Haven’t seen Itachi in a while anyway.” she said with a blush. “You do realize he’s dating Kagome?” “I know, but I’m still attracted to him.” “Alright, it’s settled. Tomorrow, we start training the two of them.”

-Itachi-
As the two of you were walking home, you and Kagome continued to think about today. “Listen Kagome.” “Yes Itachi?” “I just want to say I’m sorry. We had to cancel the rest of our date to deal with Naraku. And for that, I am sorry.” “I’m not.” “Huh?” “Itachi, you may thought it was the end of our date, but it really doesn’t end until I get home. You sure know how to show a girl a good time.” You blushed a little at that point. “I’m glad you had fun.” The two of you then arrived at Kagome’s home. “Well, I had fun too.” “Good night Itachi.” she said before kissing your cheek. You blushed a bright red from that and once she got inside. You jumped high into the air. “Yes! I got a kiss from Kagome!" You thought to yourself. You returned home shortly after that.
11331111111.title: Gathering Strength

113311111111.content: The next morning, you woke up and got your clothes and went down to the training hall. There you saw your mother, father, Shizuku and Sasa, who tackle hugged you. “Itachi-kun it’s so good to see you.” “Nice to see you too Sasa.” “Itachi.” “Shizuku.” “Listen my son. You must be ready to train like never before.” “I understand father.” “I must warn you, if you are going to train to fight against Naraku I am not going to show you any mercy.” he said as he changed into his super form’s highest level. “I am prepared to do what I must.” “Alright, the first one to train you will be….
113311111111.title: The Training Begins

1133111111112.content: Sasa wasn’t extremely pleased with the fact she had to fight you, but she figured the sooner she gets it over with, the better. “Alright, I guess I have no choice. But if we are going to do this, here.” she said handing you a blindfold. “What is this?” “You sometimes depend too much on your eyes. You will need to used your other senses in order to fight against Naraku. The Sharingan will not always be able to help you.” “I understand.” “Now before we begin you will need to learn the attack known ad the Gravity Slam.” “Gravity Slam?” “Yes, its where you can increase the gravity around you and focus it all into one attack. For example, you can focus energy into your fist and fire it towards an opponent. Watch.” she said as she called on her powers. This was a simple enough technique, but only you could turn it into a weapon powerful enough to harm Naraku. She then fired a blast of gravity out of her eye and created a massive hole in the wall. “Whoa.” “Now you try.” “Alright.” You said as you focused energy around you to increase the gravity. You then sent it into your fist and thrusted it forward, making an even large hole than Sasa created. “Very good Itachi-kun. Now put the blindfold on. You will need to score a blow to me and pin me down, as well as avoid all of my attacks, without the use of your eyes.” “Very well.” you said as you put the blindfold on. Everyone else left the room and entered the only part of the hall they could observe you safely. “The first move belongs to you Itachi.” “Very well.” you said as you threw a few shuriken at her, she easily dodged, but you fired back at her in an instant with the Phoenix Flower. She managed to avoid that attack as well. She then dropped pillars from the sky towards you. You were able to avoid a few but one of them sent you into the air. Sasa then fired a blast of gravity from her eye again. You barely avoided that one though. You then used the power of earth to create spikes made of rock rise from the ground and move towards her. She then jumped into the air to avoid it, but you got above her and threw a punch at her. She was able to dodge, but she didn’t notice your other hand and you hit her with a gravity attack. As she hit the ground, you used the power of earth to make shackles out of earth to pin her to the ground. “Looks like I win.” “It seems so Itachi.” You then took the blindfold off and released Sasa. You knew that Shizuku was up next to face you.
1133111111112.title: Sasa vs Itachi

11331111111121.content: Once Sasa left the room, Shizuku came in. You knew she was not one to mess around. “Itachi, I will teach you how to use different kinds of ice and water attacks, but first, you will have to defeat me.” she said as water surrounded her. “Very well. Show me what you can do.” Shizuku created whips out of the water and attacked. You did manage to avoid them, but barely. She even managed to slice your cheek. And within a moment, she was able to get behind you and sweep your legs. She then pinned you to the ground, or so she thought. It seems the only thing she pinned was a shadow clone, which vanished as soon as it was pinned. Shizuku was trying to find you when her legs were encased in crystal. She soon found a sword at her neck. “Don’t move.” “It seems I’ve lost. ~Nano.” “It seems that way.” You released Shizuku and she taught you a few ice attacks as well as the water attacks, including the water whips. Now it would be a brawl between you and your father.
11331111111121.title: Shizuku vs Itachi

113311111111211.content: As Shizuku left the room, you knew that things were about to get intense. “Son, be prepared for one hell of a fight.” he said as he took a fighting stance, still in his ultimate super form. “Alright then dad.” you said as you changed into your super form. You hair turned silver in color, but the length was the same, being your hair was already long. After a moment of staring each other down your father charged at you and in an instant, landed a powerful blow to your stomach. He then landed a knee to your chin and sent you into the air. He then followed by sending a bust of energy at you, sending you flying. Once you got near the ground, you created talons made of energy and sank them into the ground, slowing you down. But your father was not about to let you off easy. He made another charge at you, but this time you managed to catch his fist. The two of you began to clash with such speed only those with the sharingan could follow it. The two of you separated for a moment and both of you fire a large fireball at each other. Once the two clashed, the heat was incredible intense. It was almost at supernova. The two of you had to stop before it got so hot the atmosphere would be set on fire. Once you stopped your father got behind you with his Chidori, but you managed to grab his wrist and send it into his own thigh. You then landed a powerful kick to his head, which caused him to be sent flying. You then used the gravity slam Sasa taught you and sent him into the ground. You then used the ice needles you learned from Shizuku to pin him to the ground, even though you had to send them through his arms and legs. Once you landed, you had him pinned with your own Chidori at his neck. He then began to laugh and said “You really are a chip off the old block. You definitely have what it takes to surpass me and your mother. And I say congratulations Itachi.” He then created a little heat around him to melt the ice needles and you helped him up. “Thanks dad, you might want to go to the hot springs and heal up.” “Good point. Then you can have them. But first, time for me to show you everything I know.” he said as he used the Mangekyo Sharingan to transfer all his knowledge to you.
