You fell to the ground with the rush of knowledge that just entered your mind. “Yeah, that will happen for time to time.” “I’ll just head outside for some fresh air.” you said as you left the training halls, with your hair back to its normal black color. Your mother walked up to your father at that moment and carried him to the hot springs.
113311111111211.title: Battle of the Uchiha

1133111111112111.content: As you stood there on the roof, you continued to think of how you would be able to defeat Naraku. You had the Uchiha clan’s Sharingan, and the Jinguji family’s powerful magic, but it seems Naraku knew everything he had to about it. But as you continued to ponder, your thoughts were interrupted by Kagome, who just got finished with her training as well. “Hey Itachi.” “Hey Kagome.” you said turning around, and you noticed that her outfit was a bit shredded. “Whoa, what happened to you?” “My mother and Ageha gave me quite the workout.” “No kidding.” Kagome walked over to you and sat down next to you. “You know Itachi, this might be the last moment of peace you and I have before the fight with Naraku” “You have a point there.” The two of you just decided to enjoy the sunset for a while. After about an hour, you went back inside to heal up. But Kagome continued to think about her next move for a while.
1133111111112111.title: Later

11331111111121111.content:
Later on that night while you were asleep Kagome snuck into your room and saw how peaceful you looked as you slept. She gave you a kiss on the cheek before leaving for the valley where she was sure Naraku would be hiding. She had her sword all ready to go and soon she made it to the valley. Once there, a demonic chuckle filled the valley. "So, you're here alone are you? I was hoping you would be Itachi." "Sorry, but you will just have to settle for me." "Fair enough. Besides if I kill you, the frustration Itachi will feel will make it easier to kill him." "Don't you dare touch him!" she said drawing her sword. "It seems I struck a nerve." he said as he appeared. "Very well. Show me what you can do, Kagome Amakawa." The two of them stared each other down for a moment and then the battle began.

-Itachi-
Just then you were woken up by naraku's energy. But you also felt Kagome's energy in the exact same location. You quickly changed and thought to yourself as you left the house withoout your parents knowing "Damn it! Kagome how could you do something so stupid? just don't you die on me, whatever you do."
11331111111121111.title: Kagome Takes Action

113311111111211111.content:
(your new sword http://images.wikia.com/sonic/images/3/3...)

As you were rushing over to help Kagome, she was not having much luck fighting Naraku. She may have scored a few blows, but she was getting beaten at every turn. “I’m really disappointed. You are the same type of Ayakashi your mother is, and you share the blood of the Amakawa family. Yet you are such a disappointment. At this rate, I bet Itachi will be just as easy to kill as you.” Just then, Kagome snapped and her true nature as an Ayakashi began to rise. She soon transformed into a full-fledged Ayakashi. She smiled as she lost herself in her rage. “Now this will be interesting.” Kagome charged at him with incredible speed and made a single slash with her claws, sending him back a bit. She then started to fight from a distance, making energy slashes at Naraku. He was easily able to dodge, making her even angrier. Soon, the ground began to break apart and you arrived to see what was happening. “Oh no, I remember Himari telling me about this. Kagome has lost herself in her anger.” you thought to yourself. As you slid down the canyon walls, Naraku saw you and said to himself “Well, this should be interesting. Kagome will end up killing the man she loves in her anger.” he said as he vanished for a moment. “Kagome!” She turned to you and ended up attacking you with an energy slash. You took a direct hit and you knew it was because of her anger. You then decided to go for broke. “Kagome, I know you’re in there. Lease listen to me.” you said as you began to walk towards her. She smiled and continued to attack. Even tough you were taking quite a bit of damage, you still continued to walk towards her. “I know it may seem like all I know how to do is fight, but you know better than that.” she continued to attack. “But no matter what you are, no matter what you have done, my feelings for you will never change. I…I…” you got right in front of her and said as you embraced her “I love you! I want to be with you Kagome! Come back to me.” She seemed to snap out of her anger and returned to normal, with the Light Ferry awakened. And the instant it awakened, Himari, Yuto, Kuesu and Sasuke woke up and knew what was going on. “Itachi…” “Welcome back, Kagome.” “How sentimental. I almost feel sorry that I have to end this reunion.” Kagome took your sword and imbued it with the Light Ferry. She handed you the blade and you turned toward Naraku. She then did the same thing with your outfit, giving it more power. “So this is the power of the Light Ferry.” he said as he created a sword from his negative energy. “Now you are about to witness the power of the Uchiha, Jinguji and Amakawa families first hand!”
113311111111211111.title: Power of Love

1133111111112111111.content:
(Background Music http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Um_qkffVB...)

The two of you stared each other down for a moment and then charged toward one another. But with a single slash, you sent Naraku flying into the walls of the canyon surrounding the valley. You were actually amazed with the power this sword had. But Naraku then came charging towards you and the two of you began to clash blades. And you both used energy attacks to try and gain the upper hand, but it was in a dead heat. “You are much better than I anticipated.” “Coming from you, that means so little.” “Why you little!” he said as he charged at you. “Chaos Spear!” you said as a massive number of energy spears came from the sky. Naraku was able to stop them, but only to have you land a powerful punch to his stomach, which broke the part of his armor it was covering. Both he and Kagome were surprised at your power. You then landed a powerful kick that sent him deep into the ground. But then, he came charging at a speed your sharingan couldn’t follow and sent you deep into the ground in front of Kagome. “Itachi!” “Don’t worry about me. I’m jut getting started!" you said as you activated your super form. And in that moment, the Mangekyo Sharingan filled your eyes. You were on a whole new level of power, one your father had never experienced before. Naraku noticed this and increased his power to the point where a black aura surrounded him. You then took to the sky and the two of you began to clash. And in that moment, Your parents, Yuto and Himari arrived to see what was going on. “Kagome!” “Mother, Father.” “You could have been killed!” “I’m sorry.” “We will discuss this later.” You and Naraku were neck and neck in this battle “You can do it Itachi!” “Don’t you dare give up my son!” “We believe in you.” “Now kick his ass!” “And return to me!” You and Naraku continued to clash with such power that it was tearing the ground into large chunks. “How can this be? I have the energies of the greatest warriors of all time, including your father and mother!” “You may have their energies, but you are nothing in the face of the power of love!” “Don’t spout that nonsense with me!” he said as he made a massive energy slash at you. You knew if you didn’t stop it, it would slice the entire planet in half. You then focused all the energy you had into your sword. “Now, you will feel the power of the three greatest Demon Slayer clans to ever exist. CHAOS BLADE!” you said as you made a single slash with the blade. The energy slash was half the size of Naraku’s but contained about ten times as much power. It destroyed it and even though many miniature versions of the slash hit the valley. Naraku did not have enough power to dodge and it sliced him in half. Once that happened, a massive explosion lit up the sky and Naraku was finally destroyed.
1133111111112111111.title: The Final Showdown!!

11331111111121111111.content: As soon as Naraku was destroyed, you fell on your knees and the Light Ferry’s power left your outfit, but not your sword. “Itachi!” she said running up to you. “I’m alright Kagome. I just used up a little too mush energy that’s all.” “I’m just glad you’re alright.” “Yeah, me too.” you said as you both embraced each other. But then you noticed your parents walking up to you. “Oh this is not going to be good.” “Itachi, Kagome, you two went to fight Naraku on your own with none of our consent.” he said in a pissed off way. “But, it seems that the two of you made up for it b not only destroying Naraku, but by showing that the power of love is unstoppable. We will let you all off the hook this time. But, only if you two promise to always look out for each other.” You held Kagome closer to you and said “I think that won’t be a problem dad.” Kagome rested her head on your shoulder and you both rose to your feet. Your parents then embraced each other at the sight of the love you had for Kagome. And in about a couple of year, you proposed to her and got married. And in due time, the newest member of the clan came into this world. Arashi Uchiha. You, Sasuke, Kuesu, Yuto and Himari ended up uniting the clans into the Uchiha. And even though there were some powerful enemies, you and the rest of your clan defeated them. And for the most part life was perfectly peaceful.
11331111111121111111.title: Peace At Last

114.content:
(You Kuesu) (As always, you are the shippuden version)

You are Sasuke Uchiha, the last survivor of the once mighty Uchiha Clan. You were also born with the power of Chaos which made you the strongest member of your clan to ever exist. However, most of your past was shrouded in mystery. All you had to go on was a memory of you speaking to someone as a kid, but you didn’t you did know who. What you did know is that person was female. But recovering your past wasn’t your top priority. You had to find the demon called Nightmare and destroy him. As you wondered the globe searching, you had no idea that the one person who could bring your past to light, would soon appear in your life again.

One day, you were walking through England as you continued your search. However the peace was interrupted by a swarm of Hideaks, as well as a demon general. This one took after the scorpion. “Sasuke, i will kill you here and now!” “You can try.” You drew your sword and pointed it at the general. “Attack!” The Hideaks charge for you with their weapons ready to cut you down. But you managed to counter them with little effort. Half of the Hideaks attacked you head on, while the other half stood there. You continued to fight the Hideaks before the general joined the fight. Once he joined the fight, things got a bit difficult. The Hideaks continued to attack you head on,, but the others fires small energy blasts at you. With the combination of the General and the Hideaks, you were getting pummeled. They never showed this kind of teamwork before. They seemed desperate to kill you this time. But why? “You are weak Sasuke. Nightmare will be pleased!” You knew it was time to step it up. You activated your sharingan and focused energy to your whole body. “Chaos Rotation!” you said spinning at extremely high speeds. This forced the Hideaks and the general back. The others continued to bombard you with energy. But as soon as you saw an opening, you jumped high into the air raising your arm. “Chaos…Spear!” you said as your brought down your arm and a rain of energy spears took out almost all of the Hideaks. As soon as you landed on the ground you used your sword to butcher the ones that remained. You then turned your attention to the general. “You may have defeated the Hideaks, but you will not defeat me. I will kill you!” “I have a message for Nightmare.” “Huh?” “Tell him he will pay for the destruction of my Clan.” You said creating the chidori in your hand. The general took a step back but then he charge for you and you did the same. He grabbed onto your arms before you could use your chidori on him. But as he got ready to strike with his tail, you landed a powerful kick to his side, causing him to release one of your arms. You grabbed his left pincer and used your raw power to tear it off. As the general screeched in pain, you forced your chidori into his stomach and made a very loud screech before his body grew limp. You pulled out your chidori an he fell to the ground. “Foolish demon.” you said turning around. But then you felt something grab your leg. Amazingly the general was still alive. “You…will…pay for that!” he yelled standing up and lifting you off the ground and the slamming you on your back. He did the same thing several times before throwing you into the air a bit and grabbing your neck. “Now die!” he said stinging you in your stomach with his stinger. You then stuck your sword through his body and ran your chidori through it. The electricity back-lashed onto you too and caused you to be sent lying through the air. You crashed landed at such high speed you were in a mini crater. But before you could try and get up, some security showed up with guns pointed at your head. “Shit…” Just when they were about to shoot, someone stepped in and saved your ass. “Stop!” The guards pulled back their guns and you tried to see who saved you, but the venom in your veins was causing you to lose consciousness fast. But before you passed out, you heard the woman say to the guards “Take him to the infirmary now!”
114.title: Chaos Begins

1141.content:
Later, you slowly awoke in a daze. You had no idea where you were, or how you were still alive. You turned your head to see your shirt and sword on a small dresser. After a minute or so, you slowly began to sit up, finding your chest was covered in bandages. You also noticed that the infirmary was more like a bedroom. “Where am I?” you thought. Just then, you heard the door open and the one who entered was a very beautiful young woman. She had long, silver hair and wore some kind of black dress. She had a crescent moon on her forehead, beautiful purple eyes and her breasts were at least a DD. You had never seen such a beautiful woman before in your entire life. “I see you’re awake. I am sorry my security was so rude. They overreact at times.” “I can’t argue with you there. Now, mind explaining what is going on? Who are you?” The woman giggled. “You haven’t changed a bit, have you Sasuke?” You were surprised this woman knew you. “How do you know me?” The girl shook her head and said “My goodness, what an unforgivable sin. Forgetting me like that...” she said as she walked over to you. “Allow me to reintroduce myself. I am the heiress to the Junguji family, one of the twelve demon slayer clans. My name is Kuesu Jinguji.” As soon as she said that name, some of your memories passed before your eyes. You remember a girl with black hair and a crescent moon on her head a long time ago, long before your clan’s demise. “Jinguji…” “I see, you still are having trouble remembering.” She said as she got next to you. You were unsure if you could trust her, so you jumped out of bed and halfway across the room. Kuesu smiled and got in front of you in an instant. “So fast.” you thought to yourself. She then gently grabbed your face and somehow suppressed your powers. “What the hell, why can’t I summon my strength?” you thought. “Calm down and listen to me Sasuke.” You looked her in the eyes. “Your family asked me to look after you.” “My Family? What do you mean?” “I was told by both our families that I would join the Uchiha. They arranged for us to be married.” “Married?!” “You really don’t remember do you?” She then began to pull your face closer to her own. “You may have forgotten your past… But I'll make sure you remember.” she said as she kissed you on the lips. You then had a little flash back about her as a young girl and how the girl from your past kissed you before by the lake near your clan’s home. “Could she be the same girl from back then?” you thought. She broke the kiss and looked into your eyes “Y-You’re…” “So you’re beginning to remember.” She let you go and a few memories began to come to light. It wasn’t much, but you were happy to recover some of your memory. “Kuesu…” “Sasuke, you remember.” “I remember some things. I remember you, an the arrangement our families made, and a few things we’ve done as children, but nothing more.” “I will help you recover your memory, Sasuke.” “Thank you Kuesu. I’m going to get some air.” you said walking off.

Later that night, you were standing on the roof as you enjoyed the night sky. You were still getting used to the idea that Kuesu was by your side. It would take a while before you were used to the idea she is your fiancé. Your thoughts were interrupted by Kuesu as she stood behind you. “Is there something you need Kuesu?” you said turning around. “I was about to ask you that Sasuke.” “You’ll have to forgive me, as you can imagine, this day’s been a little confusing for me.” “I understand Sasuke. And if there is anything you need, no matter what it is, you can come to me.” she said walking up to you and gently placing her hand on your cheek. You placed your hand on hers and gently took it off your face. “I know, but this a whole new thing for me Kuesu. I’ve lived on my own for the last eleven years. I am used to being alone.” “Not anymore.” she said as she gave you a very gentle kiss. You calmed down in that moment, and you had no idea why. But you loved the calmness of the moment, and you knew that as long as Kuesu was at your side, you felt at peace. She gently broke the kiss and looked into your eyes. “I will always be there for you Sasuke.” “Thank you, Kuesu.” “You’re welcome. Now I think you should get some sleep. The guest room is prepared for you. And when you are ready, you are more than welcome to sleep with me.” she said walking off with a smile. You blushed at that image and enjoyed the night for a little longer. Then you went into the guest room that was prepared for you. You walked towards wall and slept against it. Something you were very used to.
1141.title: Meet Kuesu Jinguji

11411.content: The next morning, you woke up to find a very warm blanket around you. It wasn’t hard to figure out Kuesu gave it to you. You also could smell something very delicious. You stood up and walked downstairs to the kitchen. There you saw Kuesu had prepare a delicious breakfast for you. She turned her head and smiled at you. “Good morning Sasuke.” “Good morning.” “Did you sleep well?” “Yes, I did. Thank you Kuesu. For letting me stay here, and for the blanket.” “It’s no trouble Sasuke. You are my fiancé after all, and you will be treated with the same hospitality.” You smiled and looked at the food she prepared for you. “This looks amazing.” She chuckled a little. “Thank you. Now please, eat up.” You wasted no time and started eating. The taste was absolutely incredible. One thing was for sure, Kuesu was an amazing cook. “This is unbelievable.” She giggled sitting beside you. “I’m so pleased you enjoy my cooking.” You continued to eat and Kuesu joined you, watching how much you loved the taste of her food. It didn’t take long for the two of you to finish breakfast. “I haven’t eaten something that good in years.” She smiles. “The smile on your face fills me with joy.” You smile at her but in that moment, a large explosion came from the forest near-by. You both stood up and charged towards the forest.
11411.title: The Next Day

114111.content:
(You and Kuesu) (ils on Kuesu's seal attack, see this episode where she fights Himari http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L8yHCVg_b...)

As soon as you and Kuesu made it into the forest, you saw a large number of Hideaks and hid behind a couple trees. “What are those things?” “Hideaks. These are the soldiers of the underworld. They are not to be underestimated.” “I see. Wait, what’s that?” You looked around and saw that these Hideaks had innocent people captured. “They have hostages.” “What?” “We have to make sure they don’t get hurt.” You thought for a moment and looked at Kuesu. “Here’s the plan. As soon as I get those guards away from those people, cover me until I can get them all out of there.” “Alright.” You drew your sword and used your speed to slice down the guards. But as soon as you I that, the rest of them turned their attention towards you. But then, Kuesu used her magic to trap some of them in a seal that fried their bodies. Before the others could attack you, she jumped beside you and the pages of her book began to spin around at high speeds creating a powerful barrier. “All of you are going to be fine. I will get you back to the city.” you said as you focused your power around them. “Chaos…Control!” Almost instantly, the hostages were returned to the city, leaving you and Kuesu to face the Hideaks. “Sasuke, do you remember the promise we made to each other?” In that moment you had a small flashback to when you and Kuesu were kids. “So, you’re a Demon Slayer like me Kuesu? Then let’s work hard together.” “I-I can do it by myself. I’m different from you.” “How boring. Working together is better for sure.” “Do you really think so?” she said her back facing you. “It takes a few seconds to cast a spell. And more powerful offensive spells can only travel forward.” she looked away. “Is that how it is?” “If we work together as one…” she said with a slight blush. “Will you protect my back for me?” “Of course. I’ll protect you.” “Really? Will you really protect me?” “I promise you. We will fight together. That’s obvious. So let‘s take down evil.” As soon as your flashback ended, you looked Kuesu in the eyes. “I do remember. And like I promised, I will protect you.” She smiled. “Good. Now let’s go.” she then made a single swipe of her arm which caused the barrier to fire pages at the Hideaks like bullets. This destroyed quite a few of them. But plenty still remained. As you and Kuesu were back to back, the Hideaks did all they could to kill you. But you and Kuesu fought in perfect synch. The Hideaks kept their distance after a little while, but you knew they weren’t finished. Using your Sharingan, you saw that they were building up their energy for an attack. “Kuesu, jump!” As soon as you said that, every single Hideak fired an energy blast at the two of you. You were both able to jump into the air just in time. “Let’s finish this.” “Let’s.” You brought your right hand close to her left. By combining your power of fire and her magic, the two of you were able to create a powerful dark flame “Here it goes.” “Now!” “Dark Phoenix Flower!” you said thrusting your hands forward causing a rain of purple flame to descend on the Hideaks, destroying them all instantly. As the two of you fell to the ground. You used the power of water to put out the flames before they burned the forest to the ground. You landed side-by-side then turned towards each other an smiled. “We make an amazing team.” “I completely agree Sasuke.” The two of you walk back to the mansion with a smile on your faces.
114111.title: Battle in the Forest

1141111.content: Three weeks have passed since you started living with Kuesu, and you still haven’t slept in a bed yet. You were also still getting use to the idea of having a fiancé. But you were starting to regain more of your memories. And even though there were still a Hideak attack every now and again, it was nothing you an Kuesu couldn’t handle. One day, you stood on the roof and thought it was time for some training. You focused your powers and created a large training field next to the mansion. You then surrounded it with an indestructible barrier that only you and Kuesu could enter and exit. Making sure none of your attacks could get out. Once you finished, you jumped right into the field and used your power to increase the gravity to five times Earth’s normal gravity. This was not an easy task. You had to get used to this in order to increase your speed. You stood there for a couple minutes and once you were able to keep your balance, you used the power of darkness to create a warrior that wasn’t effected by the gravity, making him more nimble than you are. Kuesu stood on the roof watching this. “Sasuke seems to take his training to whole new levels.” You then created warriors of fire, wind, lightning, and ice as well, also unaffected by the gravity. You drew your sword and the shadow warrior charged for you. You blocked his attack with your sword and pushed him back, every warrior came at you when they had the chance. But you managed to keep them at bay for a while. You started off simple for now. But then things became difficult when they came at you with the intent to kill. They were working in such perfect synch that they had you on the ropes. “What will you do now, Sasuke?” You thought it was time to get serious and charged at them with your sword. Using your sharingan, you were able to see the attacks of the warriors vividly clear. You managed to slice them down one by one until they were on the ground. However, you knew there was one last test. All of the warriors combined and created a super warrior. You knew this was not going to be easy. But despite that, you charged for the warrior and he did the same. The two of you clashed blades and as soon as you did, he used lightning to send electricity into your body and send you back a ways.. But he extended his blade wrapping it around your leg and brought you over his head and slammed you over the ground. Kuesu watched closely. You then combined darkness and lightning sending it through his blade and began to fry him a bit. You then jumped into the air and created a massive number of Chaos Spears. You then caused them to rain down upon the warrior at extreme speeds, while more Chaos Spears formed and fire towards him. This continued for ten minutes before you stopped the attack. But the instant you did, the warrior used all of the energy in his body to fire one last energy blast at you. It scored a direct hit to your chest, causing you to slide back to the edge of the barrier. You then returned the gravity to normal and walked out. However, that training session pushed you to where you could barely stand up. Kuesu walked up to you and got under your left arm and walks inside with you and setting you on the couch. “I’ve never seen someone train so hard. You really are something Sasuke.” You chuckled a bit. “Thank you, Kuesu.” She smiled and sat beside you. You sat on the couch for a while, due to the fact you felt pretty worn out from that training session. You sat there for so long you ended up falling asleep.
1141111.title: Later

11411111.content: That night, you began to dream of your future. You were standing under a waterfall to clear your mind. You then stepped out of the waterfall and picked up your sword. You then made a single slash of your blade and cut off the waterfall for a couple seconds. As soon as the waterfall returned to normal, you walked towards your home. There was nothing but peace and quiet there. And you saw Kuesu standing there to greet you. You embraced her in your arms feeling happier than you ever have. But then, your dram became nothing but pitch black. You could only see a few feet in front of you. “Do you really think this dream will become reality?” “Who’s there? Show yourself!” “This is what your future shall hold.” The area around you was a battle scared wasteland. The land was set ablaze and there as no one around. You then saw someone walk around the corner ad you rushed to help. You then saw that it was Kuesu severely wounded. “S-Sasuke…” she then fell to the ground. “Kuesu!” you ran to her an lifted her body off the ground. “Kuesu! Stay with me!” She struggled to reach out to you and you grabbed her hand gently. “Sasuke…I…” She then let out one last breath as her arm went limp. “No…Kuesu…No…” you said as tears streamed down your face. But in that moment the one behind this got behind you and attacked, but you woke up in a cold sweat in that moment. You were panting heavily and noticed you were still on the couch. You also noticed that the sun was up and the smell of Kuesu’s cooking filled the air. You let out a sigh of relief that she was okay. You pulled yourself together and went to the kitchen. You saw Kuesu smiling knowing you were awake. “Good Morning Sasuke. I hope you slept well.” “I did. Thanks.” You smelled her food again. “Man, your cooking smells amazing.” “Thank you Sasuke.” she said smiling. “I thought I would make pancakes today.” “Let me cook you some lunch. I think I should cook for you too.” She smiled. “I would love to taste your cooking.” You smiled and sat down at the table when Kuesu finished cooking. After a little bit you and Kuesu sat down and ate together. Talking about your past together, or at least what you remember. But as soon as you finished breakfast, you both heard a huge explosion coming from the city. “Hideaks again?” “Not with that kind of explosion. Lets go Kuesu.” “Right.” You both rushed off to the city to find out what was going on.
11411111.title: The Next Morning

114111111.content:
(Nightmare)

As soon as the two of you made it to the city, you saw a huge amount of destruction. The bodies of police officers littered the ground. And most of their car were in flames while others were in pieces. “What happened here?” “I don’t know. But be careful. The one who caused this is still around.” She nodded and both of you took a look around. “This kind of destruction isn’t something Hideaks could do so quickly.” The two of you continued to look around. “The air is thick with dark energy.” “I noticed that too. It’s almost nauseating.” “Who could of done this?” “That would be me.” A demonic voice said. “Who’s there?” you said as you got back-to-back with Kuesu. “Show yourself!” “As you wish.” The voice said before a dark shadow started to form in the flames of a destroyed car. The demon soon appeared before you and the instant you saw him, a huge amount of your memories came flooding through your mind. “Hello Sasuke!” “Nightmare!” “You know him?” “That bastard was one of the demons that butchered my clan.” “I am so pleased you remember me Sasuke.” You drew your sword and charged for him at lightning speed. You tried to strike him down but he used his sword to block your own. “Hard to forget scum like you.” “You are strong Sasuke, but unfortunately for you…” he pushed your blade upward while pulling his demon arm back. “I’m stronger!” he said landing a powerful punch to your face, sending you crashing into the ground. “Sasuke!” she said running up to you. “Don’t worry Sasuke, I wont kill you here. If you wish to finish this, you will come to Japan. I hope you give me a challenge.” “Shut up!” you said firing a blast of lightning at him. He was forced back a ways before he deflected it into the ground. “My turn.” he said as the eye on his sword opened and a burst of energy sent you through several buildings. “Farewell.” he said vanishing into the darkness. Kuesu rushed to your side to help you. You were extremely weak an tried to stand. “Damn…it…!” you said before you lost consciousness. Kuesu helped you up and took you back to the manor.
114111111.title: NIghtmare Returns

1141111111.content: You woke up a few hours later in the infirmary once again. You were still in excruciating pain. You noticed parts of your body were wrapped in bandages. You saw your sword leaning against the wall. You tried with all your might to stand up, but to no avail. You were in way too much pain. Despite the fact your powers increase your recovery speed, you needed more time to heal. But time isn’t something you have. As you continued to try and stand up, Kuesu walked in and saw you trying to get up. “Sasuke you need to rest.” “I cannot afford to rest. Nightmare is somewhere in Japan and I must stop him.” Kuesu got behind you on the bed and pushed down on your shoulders forcing you back on the bed. “I’m not asking you. Just relax.” She started to massage your shoulders, her soft and gentle hands working out all the stress. “Oh Sasuke, you’re so tense. When was the last time you tried to relax?” “Truth be told, I don’t think I’ve ever made the attempt. I’ve been so busy with training, Hideaks, and now Nightmare that I…” “Shhhhh. Relax, and let me help.” she said in a very gentle tone. She continued to massage your shoulders, you could feel years of stress begin to melt away. You were extremely grateful Kuesu was back in your life. But as she continued, your eyes began to feel very heavy and Kuesu could see this. “Sasuke, its okay. You can sleep. I’ll stay here with you.” she said with a warm smile on her face. And almost instantly, you fell asleep and your body resting against hers. She smile and got comfortable and placed your head on her chest, running her fingers through your hair ever so gently. She soon began to feel sleepy as well and fell asleep with you in her arms. The two of you were thoroughly enjoying each other’s company. And for the first time in your life, you had someone sleep by your side.
1141111111.title: That Evening

11411111111.content: The next day, you woke up to the sound of a gentle heartbeat. You found the sound very comforting. You then noticed that your head was right on Kuesu’s breast. You blushed a bright red, and gently tried to pull yourself away. But in that moment, Kuesu gently woke up and pulled you back onto her. “Good morning, Sasuke~.” “Good morning Kuesu.” “I hope you slept well.” “I did, thank you. But Kuesu?” “Yes?” “Do you mind letting me go?” you said with a blush. She giggled and said “I bet this your first time being this close to a woman’s breasts.” she said in a teasing tone. You blushed even brighter if that was possible, an you tried to regain your composure. But after a quick giggle, she let you go and went to make you breakfast “Kuesu, I‘ll make breakfast.” you said smiling. As you made her breakfast the two of you began to discuss getting to Japan. “So I think after breakfast we should get packed and head to Japan and start our search for Nightmare.” “Agreed. Once we get there, we can head to a hotel where I have a suit reserved.” “Getting there will be easy enough, all I have to do is use Chaos Control.” “Chaos Control?” “Basically, we travel through time and space to get to any location.” “Very impressive.” You smiled. “Thank you. Here I hope you like this.” you said presenting her with an omelet. “I had no idea you were such a good cook Sasuke.” “I’m am happy to hear it. This is my triple pork omelet. It has an even amount of bacon, diced ham, and sausage, along with some cheese and a little seasoning.” “Sounds great.” She too a bite as you sat down at the table. “This is delicious Sasuke.” You smiled eating your omelet as well.” “I am so glad you like it.” You both continued to eat until you ate every single bite. “I’ll do the dishes, you go pack up. Oh and once we leave you need to tell me exactly where the hotel is.” “Alright.” She went upstairs and packed her stuff. After a few minutes you went upstairs and you noticed Kuesu was all packed. “Ready to go?” you said walking to her. “Of course.” “Alright then.” Once she told you where the hotel was, you offered your arm our like a gentleman. She smiled and hooked her arm in yours. “Chaos Control.” And in that moment, you, Kuesu, and her luggage traveled through time and space and within a few seconds, you arrived at the hotel Kuesu told you about. You transported the two of you to an alley right beside the hotel so people wouldn’t notice. The two of you walked into the lobby and Kuesu checked into the suit. The two of you walked up to you room and you took a good look around. “Nice place.” “Thank you. Most of the furniture is my own.” “Wow, didn’t think you could do that.” “If I am going to have a suit reserved, I might as well make it my own.” “You have a point there. I‘ll let you get settled in.” you said walking outside to the balcony. You had a great view of the city and the forested area not too far away. Not only that, but you could see a sight you never thought you would see again; Your old home, the birthplace of the Uchiha Clan. “My home…” you thought. But then you looked inside to see Kuesu settling in. You smiled and thought “But wherever I am, as long as I’m with Kuesu, I’m truly at home.” You thought smiling. You went inside and settled in yourself
11411111111.title: The Next Day

114111111111.content: A couple hours after you and Kuesu settled in, you both decide to start searching for Nightmare. “We should spilt up, If anything happens, signal me.” “Understood Sasuke. Be careful.” “You too.” You both split up and started searching. You both used the rooftops to cover more ground. However, not even your sharingan was picking up any trace of him. “Damn it. Where are you Nightmare? Where are you?” you thought as you continued to seek him. Your search brought you back to your old home, the Uchiha Clan grounds. It was just as you had left it, battle scarred. You walked through cautiously, keeping your guard up in case Nightmare came back.
114111111111.title: The Search Begins

1141111111111.content: As you stood at the gates of the Uchiha, you began to get some major nostalgia. You walked through the gates to find the place the same as it was back then; battle-scarred. You noticed a few of the Uchiha clan crests had slashes through them. Even though they were carved into the stone, you knew this when Nightmare invaded your home. But you ha the feeling he didn’t do this alone. You placed your hand on the crest and remembered what your brother once told you. It was the Uchiha that brought peace and law between the demon slayer clans. You continued your little nostalgia tour. You noticed the spot where both you and your brother practiced your shuriken skills. The log your brother used only had holes in the middle of the log, all in a single column. Yours on the other hand had holes all over the place. You smiled at the memory of you trying to catch up to your brother Itachi. You passed your aunt and uncle’s home and you remembered how they always cheered you up. There was a smile upon your face with all these happy memories of the past. You continued until you found yourself in your old house. You entered the house and noticed that everything looks the same as back then. You walked through the halls and saw your old room. You then noticed Itachi’s room and remembered how he used to jab you in the forehead with his first two fingers when you were a kid. You chuckled at that memory. Itachi was a good brother when he was alive. You then walked into the living room and you remembered how your mother managed to make people around her happy with just that warm smile of hers. You went outside and said to yourself. "I cant believe I had forgotten.”
1141111111111.title: Home of the Uchiha

11411111111111.content: But the your nostalgia tour was cut off when you felt a large amount of dark energy. “He’s here.” you thought as you rushed out. Once you got a little distance from the Uchiha grounds, you saw him. You stared each other down and you drew your blade and pointed it at him. “So, you want to fight?” “You know I want you dead. But before I kill you I want answers.” “Hmm? Answers?” “You are strong, there is no question about that. But you aren’t strong enough to take on the entire Uchiha Clan alone. Whoever helped you must have been much stronger. Who do you work for?” He chuckled. “So you figured it out. No matter, it wont matter once your dead.” He charges at you an you do the same. The instant your blades clashed, you both began to use everything you had. But he was too strong, and sliced your chest. You sent a small signal to Kuesu, one that she noticed before rushing towards your location. “Sasuke, please be okay.” she thought. But while she rushed to help you, Nightmare had pinned your arm to the ground with his sword. He then stepped on your right arm with great force, causing you extreme agony. “You are weak. I almost don’t find pleasure in killing you…almost.” he said grabbing his sword and twists t in your left arm before pulling it out. “I think it’s time to end this. Say good night Sasuke.” he said bringing his blade up. But before he could finish you off, a large magic blast sent him back a ways. Kuesu appeared and helped you up. “Sasuke, are you okay?” “K-Kuesu…” Nightmare laughed as he walked towards you both. “So you’re the Jinguji heiress huh? I must say that did sting a bit.” Kuesu glared at him. “Consider yourself lucky Sasuke, I will let you live for now.” He said vanishing. Once he left you completely lost consciousness. Kuesu took our body back to the hotel, and used the balcony to get inside, so no one would freak out at the sight of your wounds. As you lied there on the bed, Kuesu wish she could have been there to prevent the pain you felt during that battle with Nightmare. She decided it was time to confront Nightmare herself. But before she left however, she gave you a kiss on the cheek. She then went off to find and defeat Nightmare. She searched for a little bit and sound him in the middle of a valley. The clouds grew ark as the two of them stared each other down, ready to fight to the end.
11411111111111.title: Nightmare's Attack

114111111111111.content:
(Mother, Father, Itachi)

As they stood in front of each other, Nightmare began to chuckle. “So, you think you can defeat me? Even after seeing what I did you your fiancé?” “I know you are strong. But don’t underestimate me, or it will be the last mistake you make.” “Alright then. Come and show me the power of the Jinguji Family.” “I would be happy to.” she said as they both took a fighting stance. After a moment Nightmare made the first move and attacked with his dark slash.. Kuesu managed to dodge easily an retaliated with a large number of fire balls. “Nice try.” he said as he fired used the dark slash to destroy them. But to his surprise, the fireballs weaved around the bolts and struck him. The caused him some pain, but he started to chuckle. “I’m impressed. I guess you were right. I shouldn’t underestimate you.” “I’m just getting started.” she said as she fired more fireballs. Nightmare waited until they were close enough to jump. But as he was in the air, Kuesu continued her assault, only this time, what looked like pages from her book were shot at him. He managed to dodge a few of them, but some of them did a little damage by slicing his skin. And he was beginning to land, Kuesu slammed her hand on the ground and an attack traveled under the ground and scored a direct hit at Nightmare. Fire began to burn him which did cause a large amount of damage.

-Back with you-
As you lied in the bed, you began to sense what was going on and you thought to yourself “No! Kuesu is fighting Nightmare. She doesn’t realize he’s just toying with her.” You then had a flashback to the last time you talked to your brother Itachi. The two of you were sitting on the porch of your home looking at the sky. This was a couple days after you met Kuesu. “Hey big brother.” “Yes Sasuke?” “What do you Kuesu is up to right now?” Itachi chuckled and said “You like her don’t you Sasuke?” You blushed a little, but you didn’t deny it. “Yes, I do. I think she’s really pretty.” “Sasuke, let me tell you this. You know I won’t always be around to look after you. But if you ever need someone to turn to, you can always turn to Kuesu. I bet she likes you too little brother.” “Really? You think so?” Itachi then placed his hand on your head. “Yes. And no matter what happens, I hope you consider her a member of the Uchiha.” “I will big brother.” “Good. And remember, even if I may not be around, I will always be with you.” “And so will we honey.” You turned to see your mom and dad. “Mom, Dad.” “You can always count on us to be with you in your heart son.” Just then you opened your eyes and you felt your power grow. You got out of bed and said as you jumped off the balcony and onto the rooftops as you rushed off to Kuesu’s location. “Mom, Dad, Itachi, Thank you.” you thought to yourself.

-Back with Kuesu-
The battle continued as Kuesu thought she had Nightmare on the ropes. She got in front of him and landed a powerful attack which sent him into the side of a mountain. But as the dust cleared, Kuesu saw that he was actually laughing. “I will admit, I didn’t think you had this much power. But playtime is over now.” he said as he instantly got in front of Kuesu and landed a powerful backhand which sent her flying a little bit. He then grabbed her by the neck and brought up his blade. “Game’s over. But don’t worry, you wont be alone for long, Sasuke is next on my list.” “CHAOS SPEAR!” In that moment, a large number of energy spears struck Nightmare multiple times an forced him to let ho of Kuesu. You grabbed her using great amount of speed. Kuesu looked like what she saw was only a blur. “Are you okay, Kuesu?” She looked up and saw you, but she noticed some changes. Your body gained a little more bulk, and your hair grew as long as her own. An the legendary Mangekyo sharingan was ablaze in your eyes. “Sasuke?” “I’m here, my love.” Kuesu blushes when you said that. But nightmare groaned a bit as he stood up. “Don’t get too comfortable Sasuke.” You gently set Kuesu down and looked at Nightmare. “I will not allow you to harm the woman I love.” The eye on his sword opened and you knew he wasn’t going to hold back anymore. “Kuesu, let me handle things from here.” She looked at you and nodded. “Let’s end this, Sasuke.”
114111111111111.title: Kuesu Vs Nightmare

1141111111111111.content: After the two of you stared each other own for a moment, Nightmare charged at you with great speed. He swung is sword at you and you blocked it with lightning speed. He tried to slice you multiple time but you blocked every single one of them. He made yet another attempt and your blocked locked and you two looked each other in the eyes. “You’re pretty good Sasuke. Finally you have become a worthy opponent.” You looked him in the eyes and you kept your cool and collected expression. “I wish I could say the same.” “What?” You quickly pushed Nightmare back with your sword and slashed through his chest plate, and you even sliced his chest too, causing nightmare to bleed. As soon as he felt his own blood in his hand, he looked at you. “You proud be proud of yourself. No one has ever spilt my blood before.” You remained silent. “However, don’t get to confident!” he said swinging his sword, creating an energy slash. But you sent the power of lightning into your sword and deflected the attack away from you and Kuesu. Nightmare then fired off multiple energy slash attacks at you, and you deflected all of them too. “No way.” You vanished for a moment before appearing right in front of him. “What the?” Before he could react, you slammed your palm on his chest, causing him to slide back quite a ways. “He‘s stronger than I expected.” he said to himself as he looked at you. “Well?” “Hmm?” “Is that the best you can do? If it is, you might as well give up now.” He clenched his demonic fist. “You worthless little…” He then jumped back and raise his sword into the air. And in a few moments, a sphere of energy began to form at the tip of his blade. You stood your ground as the sphere grew in size until it was the size of a tank. “Try this one!” he said as the sphere fired off large energy blasts at you. You evaded the attack at full speed, as it continued to fire at you. The attacks kept following close behind you until the sphere eventually all of the energy inside the sphere was exhausted. As soon as you saw your chance, you charged at him with full speed and slashed at him. For the moment, it looked like nothing happened. But as soon as you put your blade inside its sheath, his human arm severed form his body, causing him to scream in pain. “You are no match for me Nightmare. You might as well give in.” He snarled and grabbed his sword with his demon arm. “I have had enough! I am going to kill you here and now!” He said as he created a powerful flame around his sword. You drew your blade again and he looked you dead in the eyes. “Try this! HELLFIRE SHLASH!” He said swinging his sword and the massive flame heading right at you. You didn’t even make any effort to dodge the flame, you just let it hit you, just as you planned. Kuesu gasped as she saw the flames swallow you. Nightmare laughed triumphantly. “Now there is nothing to stop us!” He continued to laugh as you spoke up. “A little early to celebrate isn’t it Nightmare?” He looked into the flame and saw you were still alive. “Impossible!” “Now Nightmare. Say good-bye.” you said as the flames surrounded you as a flaming tornado three times your size. “Take this! WILDFIRE TSUNAMI!” you said sending that flame at him, as soon as it hit him, the burning cyclone transformed into a raging pillar of fire that pierced the sky, dispersing the dark clouds. The flames soon died and Nightmare was barely alive, falling to the ground. You waked to him knowing he was helpless now. “You have lost Nightmare. Now, Who was with you that night? The night my clan was slaughtered.” he chuckled in pure pain. “You will meet him soon enough. But due to the fact you have won, I shall reward you with his name. He is Blackheart, and he will be your next opponent. But as strong as he is, Blackheart is not the one who caused the death of your clan.” “Then who?” “You will see…” he said as his body turned to ash. But as soon as it did, his sword vanished returning to the underworld.
1141111111111111.title: Nightmare's Demise

11411111111111111.content:
(Blackheart)

A short time after the sword vanished, you collapsed to your knees completely drained. “Sasuke!” she said running up to you. She noticed your body had some pretty bad burns. “Are you okay?” You looked at her as your eyes returned to normal. “Yeah…I’m just pretty drained is all.” She helped you up carefully and took you back to the hotel. Once there, she started to treat your burns. “You really shouldn’t be so reckless Sasuke. Be thankful you are such a fast healer.” “True, but the reckless comment goes for you too.” You smiled at her “But I am happy to know you would go that far for me. Because I would easily do the same for you.” She smiled as she treated the last of your burns. “There, that should do it.” “Thank you Kuesu. And though I am still getting used to the idea you are my fiancé, however…” Kuesu looked in your eyes as you paused for a moment, But then she was surprise when you gave her a very gentle, and loving kiss. “I love you, Kuesu.” She blushed for a moment but smiled. “I love you too Sasuke.” The two of you gently embraced each other and shared a very tender kiss.

Down in the depths of the underworld, The demon Blackheart stood before ten much larger an much more powerful demons. His power and size made him an ant in comparison to them. “Blackheart, you are now charge with the task of destroying Sasuke Uchiha. Complete this task, and you shall be greatly rewarded. Take Nightmare’s blade and use it wisely.” The demon picked up the sword, and all of the energy from the blade merged with him. His eyes shined a blood red and he chuckled. “Enjoy your victory Sasuke Uchiha, because its my turn now.”



TO BE CONTINUED....
11411111111111111.title: A New Beginning

1142.content:
(Blackheart) (black doom: http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m0ln4c... )

It’s been a few months since you defeated Nightmare and you and Kuesu got into a serious relationship. Of course, the Hideak attacks were still happening, but our powers continued to grow. You also learned how to use the Mangekyo Sharingan as well, mastering the Amaterasu and Tsukuyomi as well. However, even thought your eyes were eternal, you know both of those jutsu drained you immensely. But you never had reason to use them before, so you stuck with your other powers to fight. And life with Kuesu was as good as ever.

It was a warm summer morning, and you and Kuesu had once again checked into Kuesu’s suite. You decided to relax for a while on the couch enjoying the day. Listening to the birds outside was also very relaxing. And as you listened to the birds you became lost in your thoughts. “Things have gotten much more peaceful lately. Still, even though I am getting much stronger and so is Kuesu, I cant help but feel this is the calm before the storm.” Your thoughts were interrupted by the news. They said something about the Black Comet passing over the Earth in a few days. But there was something about that name that gave you the chills. But Kuesu walked in and sat down beside you. “Something on your mind Sasuke?” You snapped out of it and looked at her. “It’s nothing Kuesu.” “Don’t give me that. I know that look.” You chuckled a bit. “I guess I cant fool you. It’s just that comet. There’s something about it…” Kuesu looked at you and she turned your face towards her. “Just relax for now, And let me help you.” she said before kissing you. You blushed a bit and returned the kiss. You both held each other close as you kissed. After a couple minutes of kissing, you laid back on the couch and you took a nap with Kuesu on your chest.

Meanwhile, down in the underworld, Blackheart ready to make his next move. Using his dark powers, he transported himself to the heart of the Black Comet, inside was an alien race called the Black Arms and their leader Black Doom. “Who are you? Why are you here?” Blackheart chuckled. “I am here for you Back Doom. I have a little game for you.” “What?” “A duel. Whoever wins, absorbs the loser and his powers.” “An amusing proposition. Very well. I accept your challenge.” “Then let us begin.” Both of them remained silent for a moment before attacking each other. As they did, the Black Arms watched to see who would be their leader. The two of them were evenly matched for the longest time, but in the end, Blackheart was able to defeat Black Doom. As he walked to him, Black Doom looked up at Blackheart. “How can you be this powerful?” “I would tell you, but you wont be around much longer.” he said grabbing his head. “Farewell.” He then absorbed Black Doom’s body into his own and in turn, the jewels that were on Black Doom were now around Blackheart. He too in a deep breath and exhaled, feeling a great amount of power. He then looked at the Black Arms who were roaring in a way that shows they accept him as their leader. Blackheart couldn’t help but laugh in pure excitement. “Sasuke Uchiha, enjoy your worthless life, while it lasts!”
1142.title: Chaos Continues

132.content:
(You Himari)

One day, you are alone in your small home which you use to get away from the city and relax. You are the only member of the powerful Uchiha clan and the number of enemies you have are numerous. Almost all of them are Ayakashi and wish to destroy you. You never wanted to kill them, so you fought them until they were forced to retreat. But as a child, you made friends with a white cat that showed you true affection. Though the day the Uchiha clan was slaughtered by your brother, you lost contact with the cat. Itachi had died from his last attack against you. You did not seek revenge due to your teachings that revenge leaves you with nothing. You were enjoying the peace and quiet when you heard something come up to you. You opened your eyes and said “Is there something I can do for you?” You turned your head and noticed a very beautiful girl with long dark hair and beautiful eyes. Though you had a feeling that she was not normal. “It’s good to see you again, master.” she said. You stood up and asked what she meant by that. She walked up to you and said “You do not remember me? We used to do everything together when we were younger.” Just then you figured out that she was the cat that you had befriended as a child. “It’s you. You’re that cat from my childhood.” “Yes, my name is Himari. And long ago, your family had asked me to look after you if anything happened to you. But after the day of your clan’s destruction, I lost you. I have spent the last few years searching for you. I felt your energy during that battle with your brother a few months ago. I followed the trail and made my way here.” “Is that why you are calling me master? If so, please, just call me Yoru.” Himari nodded and you welcomed her to you little home away from home.
132.title: An Old Friend

133.content:
(You Himari Rinko Yuto) (Your name is Sasuke here and look like him in Naruto Shippuden)

You are Sasuke Uchiha, the last survivor of the strongest demon slayer clans to ever exist. You are also the strongest member of the clan that ever lived, due to your powers of chaos. You don't remember too much about your past. You swore to get revenge for your clan against the one who destroyed your clan, but you had no idea where he is, all you knew was that he had an army at his disposal. You had to fight these soldiers known as Hideaks. One day you were walking to school with your friend Rinko and Yuto Amakawa, who was also a member of a demon slayer clan. "You know Sasuke, you should consider yourself lucky that you don't have to wear these uniforms." "True. But you know I will truly consider myself lucky if I find the one that destroyed my clan." "Yeah, and of all days for that to happen, your own birthday." "It's okay. I have you guys." "Are you Sasuke Uchiha?" you and the others heard a voice say. You looked and saw a beautiful woman staning on a concrete staircase. "Who are you?" The woman smiled before disappearing and reappearing behind you. "So fast." you though to yourself. "You've become rather handsome. What about your confidence?" she said as she got closer to you than you had ever would have thought. "Rinko, Yuto, see you both at the school. Chaos Control!" you said as you teleported to the school. As Rinko dragged Yuto by the back of his shirt so he didn't fall for her, the woman just smiled at the fact you used Chaos Control to get away from her.
133.title: The Chaos Begins

1331.content:
(Taizo)

As you were sitting through class, you couldn’t help but wonder who that girl was. “How does that girl know me? Could she be a figure of my past? She was pretty.” You snapped out of your imagination and once class was over, you decided to head for the roof. Along the way, you bumped into your friend Taizo. “Hey Sasuke. You should head down for the cafeteria.” “I’ll catch up to you later.” you said as you walked away. “Man, you can’t help but feel sorry for him.” But in that moment, something went into his body and took over.
1331.title: At School

13311.content: As you stood on the roof, you got a good look at the city. "This place seems peaceful enough, at least until Hideaks show up that is." But your thoughts were interrupted by someone joining you on the roof. You turned around to find Taizo. “Taizo, I thought you were headed to the cafeteria.” “I found you, Matsue.” “Huh?” He then began to chuckle a little. “I’ll slaughter you and eat your liver!” “This doesn’t sound good.” you thought to yourself. And just then, Taizo threw a sphere made out of dark energy at you, which you were able to dodge, but barely. “What the hell? Since when could Taizo do that?” “I will show you our ancient hatred!” “I can’t let you do that.” And in that moment, the girl from before showed up. “You again.” “You intend to stand in my way?” “He is my prey.” she said as she drew the sword from its sheath and pointed it at you. “Wait, hold on.” “It’s futile, there’s nothing you can do.” “I’m going to kill him. Out of my way!” “I draw my blade against Ayakashi only!” once you heard that, you thought to yourself “How does this girl know about the Ayakashi?” The two of them charged at each other and then separated. The girl then pointed her sword at Taizo. “I only slay Ayakashi.” “Interesting. Show me what you can do.” “Bring it on.” The two of them began to clash and the girl was far more skilled than you expected. She looked like she was about to kill him. “Wait, he’s my friend.” The girl then slammed Taizo with the harmless side of her blade and knocked him out. And then, a spider demon came out of him and attacked again. But the girl made short work of him by piercing him with her sword. She even pierced the water tower while she was at it. She left a few moments after that. “What the hell is going on here?” You then took Taizo to the infirmary and told the nurse he fell down some stairs. Luckily she bought it.
13311.title: Clash on the Roof

133111.content: You sat there in your home which was next door to both Yuto's and Rinko's thinking about today. “What in the hell happened today? That mysterious girl shows up…Taizo went crazy…and…” you said to yourself. “Well, whatever. I’ll worry about it tomorrow.” “Going to sleep so soon?” a familiar voice said. Just then the girl from today shows up under your sheets. The fact that she was in your room at all surprised you, let alone in your bed. “What’s wrong? I’m not a monster.” “Uh, but…” you said as you looked at her breasts. She saw this and moved closer to you. "You don't need to hold back...if this is what you want.” she said as her breasts pressed up against your chest. “W-wait.” you said trying to keep your composure. The girl then starts to lick your neck and though you were in pure ecstasy, you needed answers. “Hold on! Can’t you explain to me what’s going on?” you said pushing her away. “Very well.” The girl began to explain how that being it was your seventeenth birthday, the Ayakashi could sense your power, making you the prime target. She then said that this was your destiny. “But my destiny…” the girl began to get really close to you again. “Do not worry. By an ancient vow, I will protect you starting today. Actually…even without the vow…I would never leave my young master’s side.” “Master?” she then proceeds to lick your neck again. “Hey wait. I still haven’t asked you the most important thing.” She then looks into your eyes and visa versa. “Who are you?” “Himari. My name is Himari. I am also an Ayakashi… an adorable cat.” she says as a pair of cat ears pop out the top of her head. But then Rinko and Yuto came in and saw what was going on. “Hey guys, I can totally explain.”
133111.title: That Night

1331111.content: The next day, it turns out that Himari somehow enrolled in your class. She requested Taizo to switch seats with her, so she could be at your side. Of course, being a sucker for a cute girl, he happily obliged. “Hey Himari…” “I put up a barrier around the school yesterday. No one will notice.” You then thought about last night, how she said that she would be your shadow. As well as you shield and sword at times. You knew that this sort of thing would take some getting used to. But as soon as class ended, you got the feeling that the Hideaks were back. You grabbed your sword, which you stashed in your locker and went to the location of the attack. Using your powers, only those who knew about the Ayakashi’s existence could see you in this fight.
1331111.title: The Next Day

13311111.content:
(Blackheart) (Your sword is the exact same as Sasuke's)

As soon as you arrived, you found yourself surrounded by multiple Hideaks, about 50 of them. You drew your sword and charged at them. You managed to kill a few of them easily, but the numbers of each of them were getting a little out of hand. “This is getting annoying. Chidori Stream!” you said as you sent a large blast of lightning in all directions, destroying a large number of them. But then, you were able to sense a strong power rise from the earth. And what looked like a man in an overcoat appeared before you. “I see, a demon taking on human form.” “Allow me to introduce myself, I am Blackheart. I see you have shown quite a bit of growth.” “How do you know me?” “I serve the one who destroyed your clan.” “What?! Tell me who he is or so help me-” "You shouldn’t threaten those who you could never destroy.” he said a she sent a powerful burst of energy towards you, which sent you through a couple of buildings. You tried to stand up, but he got in front of you and grabbed you by the head, sending a massive amount of energy into your body and causing a massive amount of pain. But before you lost consciousness, he threw you to the top of a large building. “Now I think you will realize what you are dealing with.” He then turned away for a moment. “I guess I should get going. Remember this, if you can defeat me, I will tell you who I serve.” he said as he vanished into the darkness. “Get back here!” You said as you tried to rise to your feet. “Master!” You then noticed Himari as you began to pass out. “H-Himari…” you said as you fell to the ground.
13311111.title: Blackheart Returns

133111111.content:
(Shizuku)

About two hours later, you woke up back in your home with himari, Yuto and Rinko looking at you. "Master, you're awake!" You tried to sit up, but you felt a massive amount of pain. "Sasuke, you should rest!" "Yeah, you really took some damage there." "Blackheart, I have to find him." Himari would not let you up being she was concerned about your safety. You had no choice but to relax a little. But back in a cave near the beach, a few Ayakashi were meeting about your powers. "I will handle it. ~Nano." "Is that you Mizuchi?" "Demon Slayers cannot be allowed to live." she said as she turned into water and found herself on top of the water tower at your school. He mission was clear, find you and kill you.
133111111.title: Later

1331111111.content: The next day, Himari was getting settled as a new student at school. While you, Himari, Yuto and Rinko were eating lunch, Taizo suggested that you all go down to the beach. The chairperson decided to go there to welcome Himari as a new student. “I will go wherever the young master goes.” Taizo looked at you with a look that said “You had better say yes Sasuke.” “I guess I’ll go.” The decision was final and soon you would head for the beach. As you and Himari were walking home that day, Himari needed your help with choosing a bathing suit. “Why do I have to go?” “Isn’t taking a woman shopping a gentleman’s duty?” “But bathing suit shopping?” “I don’t have one. Or perhaps you would prefer me to swim naked?” “Himari!” She then made a huge leap and said when she landed “Do not worry. You need only choose. Thanks in advance!” “Himari! I don’t know anything about bathing suits. I know. I’ll invite Rinko. At least she will know what the hell she's doing.” As you dialed the number, you ha a feeling that something was watching you, but you ignored it. Just then, a sudden downpour came and you ran for cover under the bridge. “What is with the sudden rain?” “Forget, demon slayer.” “What was that?” You looked around, but found no one. “Forget everything.” “Forget?” “If you don’t you will…die!” You quickly turned around and still saw no one, but you could sense someone's presence. Something was very wrong.
1331111111.title: The Next Day

13311111111.content: Later when you, Rinko, Yuto and Himari were heading for the mall, you told them about what happened and Himari kept saying she should not have left your side. “Himari, I’m fine. I could have taken care of it. Now relax.” Soon, the three of you made your way to the store where Himari would get her suit. But she had trouble choosing. “Master, which one should I wear? Something with a lot or a little fabric? Or maybe one with strings?” “Himari! Don’t ask so loudly.” many girls in the store were giggling at your expense. “Come now. Why did we come together if you’re not even going to choose?” Rinko (being the jealous type with that flat chest of hers) then came from behind and began to fondle Himari’s breasts. This went on for about 15 seconds before you gave Rinko a quick chop to the head. “Cut it out already.” Himari found a few suits to try one and you and Rinko stood outside the changing booth. She came out with the first suit and you thought it looked good, but it wasn’t exactly her thing. “What do you think? What about this? How about this?” “The sexy suits look better on you.” “I see. In that case…is this the one?” You could only stare. “Is this the one?” she caught you off-guard. “I’ll take it to the register.” Once she closed the curtain, you turned around with a blush. “H-how did she know?” But once again you got the feeling you were being watched. As Himari waited for you to pay for her stuff, she saw how the women around wore normal cloths and not kimonos. "Thanks for waiting, Himari. Is something wrong?" "Young master, do you like tradiional Japanese clothes?" You gave a confused look. "If I do say so myself...I think I look quite good in this outfit. It creats a certain image or atmosphere. However, perhaps I ought to..." "I almost forgot. We forgot to get something." "This place..." "I think your Japanese clothes suit you...but it can't hurt to wear cute clothes sometimes." You walked over to the cloths line and thought to yourself "At the very least, I need to be able to choose some clothes for her. Maybe I should go with a clean white." As you looked through clothes, Himari watched you and felt very touched. "Master..." In a few moments, you fund something you thought she would like. "I think you'll look great in these clothes." "Yes." "Why don't you try them on?" "Of course." Himari gave a serious look and pulled you inside the dressing room with her. "What are you doing?" "Quiet!" "Where did those two go?" Rinko said as she walked by with Yuto. "What do we have to hide for?" "Master.." Himari then got your back against the wall. "W-what are you doing Himari?" "Master, I've never worn anything but kimonos. I don't know how to put on these Western clothes. Will you dress me?" Your face began to turn a deep red. "I couldn't do something as embarrassing as that." "I don't mind being seen by you." "You should mind." "If you don't dress me, I'll expose my ears and tail and meow." "Please don't do that." "Well, then." She began to drop the top part of her kimono and her breasts pressed up against you. "W-wait a second. H-Himari." "Come, master...help me change." Though you were both turned on and embarrassed at the same time, you then remembered something. "Your uniform! You're always wearing your school uniform!" She backed away and got fully clothed faster than you could blink. "He noticed." "Himari, what are trying to do, give me a heart attack?" You then got out of the changing room fast enough that no one could see. A few moments later, Himari came out in the outft you chose for her. "Tada! What do you think?" You only stared. "Master?" You began to stammer a little bit. "I'll get this." "That was quick!" "You're easy to read, master." You did try to get her to put on more outfits, but she was 100% sure she owould find nothing better because it is the first outfit you chose for her. She then grabbed your arm. "H-Himari..." "I'll wear this home today." "H-hey!" you said as she pulled your arm.
