Big waves, big busts in swimsuits, you know what that means we’re gonna do right?” “Uh, swim?” “Wrong! Sexier! More Sexy, Sexy! Where’s your positive sexy thinking you two?” “I don’t know how I feel about jumping to the climax straight away.” “Taizo, you know I’m not the kind of guy to think about that kind of stuff.” “Are you telling me that doesn’t peak your interests?” he said pointing to Himari. “Try not to say anything that will get us in trouble in a public place.” “Other people. O-T-H-E-R.” “The ocean sure is vast.” “What do you think, Sasuke?” “Uh, right.” “Himari's breasts are of particular interest. That enormous shapely swell. That bounce is what every student is envious about!” “They were pretty soft…” “W-WH-What did you say?!” “I said nothing. Don’t mind me.” “Seeing her in a swimsuit is a special privilege to her classmates. This is the best-” he was interrupted by Rinko landing a kick to his head. “You better control your libido or I’ll drown you in the ocean.” “Yes ma’am.” You and the others decided to have some fun after that. But you still had the feeling you were being watched, and yet for the moment, you decided to ignore it.
133111111111.title: A Day at the Beach

1331111111111.content: As you and the others were out in the water for a bit, you noticed that Himari was just sitting at the shore. Rinko ended up accompanying you to talk to her. “Hey Himari.” “Master…” “Why don’t we swim together?” “I-I’m fine.” “Ah, the kitty-cat can’t handle water after all?” “Really?” “F-fool, I have no trouble bathing or getting wet.” “So your feet have to touch the bottom?” “That’s….” “How cute. Here.” she said tossing an inflatable orca at her. “You can use that. Cats like fish right?” “Rinko!” “Coming. Come on Sasuke.” “Hey hold on!” you said as she dragged you by the arm. As the two of you were walking to the others, you both decided to chat. “You think she’ll be okay?” “Oh relax Sasuke. She is an Ayakashi after all.” “True enough. But why did you grab my arm like that? I know you have a crush on Yuto.” “That may be, but still, I kind of see you as a brother.” “I’m flattered.” Later, while you and the others were playing with a beach ball in the water, you were wondering where Himari could have gone to. Thanks to the sharingan, you found out that she drifted from shore quite a bit. You then decided to go get her. As she was out in the middle of the water, Himari thought to herself “Pathetic. I’m just like a child afraid of water. I seem to have drifted quite a ways.” As she was looking towards the shore, you popped up in front of her and startled her. “Are you okay Himari?” “M-master? Don’t startle me like that!” “What’s wrong with you? I just came to make sure you were okay.” “Quiet, you! I don’t need you to look after me.” Just then a large wave crashed down on you and Himari, knocking her off the orca. You dove after her and when you got a hold of her, she ended up pressing your face in her breasts. You quickly rose to the surface with Himari. “L-let go. Himari, your breasts!” “No! If I let go now, I’ll drown!” “It’s okay. I’ll support you. Himari, please. Let go.” “I won’t let go no matter what!” But then some kind of creature grabbed you and Himari and tried to pull you both under. “Himari! I have had enough of this! Chaos…” you were about to get both of you out of there, when the creature wrapped a tentacle around your neck and squeezed hard enough to make you pass out. It then dragged you and Himari under the water.
1331111111111.title: Trouble Arises

13311111111111.content: Later, you started to regain consciousness and noticed someone in front of you. “Himari?” “Descendant of the Uchiha clan…” “You’re that girl from the other day.” “I’m Shizuku. ~Nano.” “Shizuku?” “The awakening of the demon slayer, will destroy the balance between humans and Ayakashi. If I let you live, you will come after us in the name of Humankind.” she said making a needle out of ice. “One hundred years ago, my family…was wiped out by the Jibashiri family, one of the 12 demon slayer families. ~Nano” She then pointed the needle at your neck. “We were just living peacefully. The demon slayers are evil. ~Nano. Die!” But then, Himari came bursting out of the water and stopped her. “Himari!” “Ice needles. You must be a Mizuchi.” “Sword of Noihara, you are still siding with the Uchiha in this era? Traitor.” Just then the creature that grabbed the two of you before appeared behind you. “Two of them?” “Whatever it takes to kill you.” “Quiet!” she said charging at her, but when she struck her, it turned out to be a water clone. The creature then grabbed her and even though Himari sliced through a few tendrils, she was not able to escape when Shizuku create a water vortex around her and the creature. “Himari!” “Don’t worry! This is nothing!” She held her breath for a while, but she ad to exhale at some point. “Stop! Please stop!” Shizuku looked at you with the same emotionless look as before. “Himari!” you said charging into the vortex. You tried to get the creature to let go, but it wrapped a tendril around you as well. “He’s charging himself to his own death. Foolish demon slayer. Now you won’t be able to leave. ~Nano. That saves a lot of trouble. I’ll kill them both at once.” she said as the vortex got much stronger. You and Himari reached towards each other. “It’s pointless. ~Nano. The shaved ice increased my powers threefold. I can even drown a fish.” You grabbed onto Himari’s hand and pulled her close to you. Shizuku was surprised at what she saw. You were running out of air yourself at this point. Himari then noticed one of the ice needles. “Die! ~Nano.” Himari took one of the needles and stabbed herself in the thigh, filling the vortex with blood. “What did you do cat? ~Nano.” In that moment, the vortex was dispelled, and Himari sliced the creature in half. As the two of you were gasping for breath, you noticed what she did to her leg. “Himari…” “I can’t believe she did that. ~Nano.” “You can only control normal water. You can’t control water that is mixed with the blood of another Ayakashi.” “What of it?” she said as water from around the cave turned into many different vortexes. “There’s plenty of water here. ~Nano.” “It looks like it.” she said as she tried to stand up, but the pain forced her back down. “Himari!” “Run, Master. I’ll hold her off while you escape.” You gasped lightly. “I’m your bodyguard. Protecting you is my duty. Hurry!” “No… How can you expect me to leave you here?!” Both Himari and Shizuku gasped a little. “You’ve suffered a serious injury trying to protect me. If something happens to you, I would ever be happy even if I escaped!” you said placing your hand on her shoulder. “M-Master?” “Don’t sacrifice yourself for my sake. That is not what I want!” Himari looked at you in amazement. “Demon slayer of the Uchiha…This cat and this man…There’s something wrong with them. ~Nano.” she thought as the vortexes vanished. She then jumped to the opening of the cave and said “In compliance with the simpleton demon slayer's request, I'll withdraw myself for today. But next time, I'll kill you.” she said as she turned into water and left. You used your powers to heal Himari’s leg and the two of you returned to the beach after that.
13311111111111.title: Meet Shizuku

133111111111111.content: The next day, you were in the bath while Rinko was over for a visit, and you were thinking about what happened yesterday. “I guess I better get out.” you then noticed something in the bath. “Seaweed?” In that moment, Shizuku burst out of the water and you ended up grabbing her chest by accident. “What the hell?” “In this situation, would you prefer me to scream, or slap you without a word? What would you rather have me do? ~Nano.” “I’ll pass on both." You then used your powers to communicate with Himari and tell her that Shizuku was here. She came bursting into the bathroom and slashed her, but it turned out to be another water clone. She then appeared behind you and said “Do you still intend to fight? ~Nano. I told you I would kill you the next time.” “But I already told you, I have no intention to fight you.” “Who can prove that? ~Nano. How do you intend to prove...that you are a demon slayer who won't kill Ayakashi?! ~Nano. How do you intend to Silence the vengeful cried of the dead Ayakashi?! ~Nano. Answer me, Sasuke Uchiha!” “W-Well…” “Answer me, demon slayer!” You started to feel dizzy from the bath. “I just…want to live the way I have been, with…my…friends…” you said as you passed out.
133111111111111.title: The Next Day

1331111111111111.content: A couple of hours later, you woke up to seeing Himari and Rinko looking at you with concern. “You two…I must have passed out in the bath.” You then noticed you were wearing your usual outfit. “How did I get into my clothes?” “We didn’t see anything!” they both said as the same time. “They both got a good look.” you were all surprised when she said that. “Shizuku.” “I got a good look too. ~Nano.” “W-What are you saying?” “Perverted things. ~Nano.” Rinko stumbled back towards you and you both fell over. “Stand back, master. It looks like I will have to teach her a lesson.” “Calm down Himari!” Shizuku sighed and said “Just looking at you guys makes this whole fight seem stupid.” “I’m telling you I never wanted to fight!” “Don't be a fool! You must face the truth Master! I'm just worried about you.” she said as her cat ears popped out. “If you’re really worried about me, then stand down.” “Sasuke Uchiha.” “Shizuku, I can’t offer you any proof. But I can assure you this, I am not the kind of person who attacks Ayakashi just because I’m a demon slayer. I know you don’t believe me.” you said which made her gasp. You then threw your sword over to her and you told Himari to stand down. She reluctantly agreed and Shizuku just stared at you because you handed her a weapon she could use to kill you. “I can’t understand him. ~Nano.” she thought to herself. She then placed the sword against the wall. “Very well. ~Nano. I am in no hurry to understand you.” “Thank you Shizuku.” “If you get to know Sasuke, this misunderstanding will be cleared in no time.” Shizuku then grabbed your sleeve. “If I live with you, I'll be able to understand you. ~Nano.” You and everyone just froze for a moment when she said that. “I’m looking forward to it. ~Nano.” she said with a smile and a slight blush. And in that moment you knew you had another person to protect besides Himari from Blackheart.

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: It was a beautiful morning as you started to meditate. You were wondering when Kuesu or Hitsugi would arrive at the clan house, but you had a feeling that Hitsugi was actualy pretty close. You stopped meditating anf walked to the front door. But as you opened it, you heard a girl call your name. You tuned around and you were tackled again. Ony this time, you were tackled by Hitsugi. "Yoru-kun! I missed you so much!" she said as she locked lips with you for about a minute. When she broke the kiss, she gave you a big hug that was actually pretty strong. "It's good to see you too Hitsugi. Now can you please let go? It's starting to hurt now." you said. Hitsugi let you go and you asked her to sit on the couch as you explained the rules.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Hitsugi Yakouin

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: "Let me guess Rule one: No fighting, Rule two: No eating humans or other Ayakashi, and Rule three: All who live here must work together. Weather it be chores or running errands. Am I right?" Hitsugi asks. You weren't surprised at her figuring out the rules seeing how her families abilities are the closest to predicting the future as you could get. "I think you know the answer to that one as well." You say with a smirk getting close to her. "Ok so wheres our room?" Hitsugi asks. "Ou ou our room." You stutter. "yes silly we are fiancees after all so we should share a room and a bed." Hitsugi says getting closer and placing her hand on your chest and tracing a circle on your chest with her finger. "W wel I I ah" You started to stutter. Hitsugi starts to laugh at this. "Oh Yoru-kun you still can't tell when I'm joking." Hitsugi replies
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: As you were giving a sigh of relief to the fact that she was joking, you heard your phone ring in your pocket and you jumped a litte bit. You looked at the caller I.D. and it said "Love Love Kuesu-Sama." You looked at Hitsugi and said "I have to take this. I need a minute." "Of course, just don't spend too much time with her." she said as she walked away. You were a little surprised now, but not much. "Hello?" you said. "Yoru-kun.A friend of mine needs to speak with you at the cafe right away." Kuesu said. you could tell how serious she was and you told her that you were on your way. ou hung up the phone and went through the portal.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: A Call From Kuesu

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: You gather up Shizuku, Himari, Sasa, and Ageha to come with you you told Saya to close this side of the portal incase your walking into a trap. "You know they want to make you into a government dog right?" Hitsugi Yakouin says as you walk by causing you to stop. "I know i'm bringing those 4 just in case the reason I don't bring you is cause I need you here in case they attack the clan house while i'm away. I trust you Hitsugi-chan. Besides if they try anything they won't be around long enough to regret attacking me and all of you." you call out letting all the Ayakashi's ease droping know. Hitsugi sighs. "Don't scar that pretty face now ok." tells you sliping a nagato into your clothes. "I won't I won't." You tell her. and head through the portal.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: When you got there, the man that Kuesu told you about explained to you and the girls of a flesh eating Ayakashi roaming around. You were instantly worried for the girls and their safety. He asked you to join them in taking it down and you refused. But then, the Ayakashi made her appearance with a friend of hers. "Looks like she's here already." you said. The Ayakashiy was a nine-tailed fox and you had no idea what the other one was. You created an indestructable barrier around Liz's teacup so it does not get damaged at all. "So, who do you want to satrt with?" the male ayakashi asked the girl on his shoulder. She looked aroud and turned her attention to Himari. She charged at her with great speed and tackled her. But before she could sink her fangs into Himari, you grabbed her in the back of the neck and you yelled "GET AWAY FRM HER!!" as you threw a punch which sent a powerful burst of energy towards her. She was sent flying through the window and you followed her. "You will not touch any of them while I'm around." you said with anger in your eyes. The Ayakashi then smiled and said "I think I will leave them alone. I have no interest in them. You're the one I want now." she said using tellepathy. You were confused by this at first, but then she charged at you and tried to get a taste of the energy your body contains. You managed to keep her away from you using your power. But you knew you could't keep this up. You told the girls to get Himari to the portal. They understood and you were about to follow them shortly. As the girl continued to charge at you, you quickly dove to avoid getting bit. You then sent another powerful energy punch at her and she had to retreat.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: A New Threat

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: Hyogo Kaburagi comes out of the restaurant looking very impressed. "You really sent her running." Hyogo Kaburagi commented. "Your a fool." You say bluntly getting a confused look from Hyogo. "That was obviously a power conserving form. If she was at full power then no way it would have been that easy." You tell him. "What that was easy what's hard then?" Hyogo asked. You pick up Liz's tea cup and turn around to him. "A fight that levels continents." You say bluntly shocking Hyogo again. You make a call to the clan house and have them open up the portal on their end and the girls go through it including Liz and her tea cup. "What." Hyogo called getting you to turn your attention back to him. "Is there any way to get you to join Public Safety Division 4?" Hyogo asks. You sigh. "No for 2 reasons. First I won't kill just cause someone tells me to. You people must get it through your heads we're not gods. We are part of the food chain and can't wipe out a species cause we're scare they'll eat someone. And second I have a prior engagement I up hold. Oh and tell your people that if they try messing with any business I own or partially own that I have been getting more and more respect from the Ayakashi population and they get angry at you for it." You tell him before walking through the portal once on the other side you close the portal.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: As soon as you closed the portal, the girls rushed over to you and asked if you were ok. "I'm fine girls. I just need to train for the battle that lies ahead."you said. You then went outside to do a little training. You had used up a nice amount of energy just to keep that Ayakashi at bay, and that was her weaker form. As you continued to train, Shizuku decided to do a little research on the abilities and powers of your family. She then discovered somthing called the Light Ferry.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: You've trained for about two hours before stopping for the day. You then call a meeting for the Ayakashi living at the clan house and informed them of the situation and that they weren't to leave for their own safety. The news wasn't taken that well cause some were horrified at that. After that you dismissed them saying that was all. Later that night Shizuku approached you with a old book from the library. "Yoru-kun I've been reading up on your families abilities and I found out about how to activate and use the light ferry." Shizuku says holding out the book. You bend down and hug Shizuku. "I appreciate the thought and effort but I don't have the light ferry. You see my family has a one hundred percent accurate test that is administered at birth and I was found lacking the ability." you tell her stroking her hair.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content:
Shizuku was not sure why you were unable to use the light ferry,but you did. But you were not very concerned at all by this at all. You continued to train for a while until it was pretty late in the evening. You went to bed in a short time that night.

The next morning, you woke up to find both Shizuku and Hitsugi in your bed. You knew why Shizuku was, but not Hitsugi. You gently woke her up and asked what she was doing in your bed. "Well I ask Shizuku for some help getting in your bed. I really wante to be with you." she said. You chuckled and gently stroked her hair. You then woke Shizuku up and went outside for a little meditating.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: Meditation went fairly well for you today. No attacks, no love sick Himari ambushing you, and perfectly peacful and quite. Walking back you had a bad feeling today though. something was gonna go down and you didn't like it. It was almost as bad as the feeling you got right before you called Kuesu last night to tell her about the other arranged marriages your grandfather made. After that Kuesu started yelling and cursing your grandfather it was so loud you literally set the phone on one side of the room and went to the other side and could still hear her rant as clear as day. It also didn't help that the volume was right above mute too.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: That night, you had a feeling that Shizuku was acting rather strange. You tried to look for her but she was nowhere to be found. You asked the girls if they had seen her but no suck luck. You then asked Himari if she knew anything and she tried to avoid the subject. You get a little forceful and tell her that you will not let that slide. Himari then told you she left to get one thing; revenge. You asked where she could be and she had no answer for that. Hitsugi came in and told you the location she would most likely be in. You and Himari then went off to get Shizuku.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: Shizuku and Kuesu had reached an impasse and Kuesu was about to try and kill Shizuku. When Himari appeared and
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Snakes Vengeance part 1

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: Kuesu was not too pleased that Himari stopped her attack. They two of them began to fight while Shizuku was getting ready to continue. You got in front of her. "Shizuku stop. You need to stopp going after revenge." you said. "Yoru-kun, get out of my way. You would not understand how I feel." she said obviously forgetting about the snake tatoo on your chest. "I thought you would never forget this. And besides, I do know one thing. Even if you get your revenge, all you will gain is emptyness. I ask you to please stop your search for revenge. Please, for us." you said. Shizuku then charged at you.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Snakes Vengence Part 2

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: You just stood there between Shizuku and her target. Even as her attack approached you didn't budge. At the last second before the water hit you all magic fade from it and you were only splashed in the face. Shizuku is on the ground on all four her long green hair falling on the ground. "Why?" Shizuku asked standing up. "Revenge for my friends, my mother, and my sister. The hatred I have for the demon slayers." Shizuku says with tears in her eyes as you put a hand on her shoulder. "I've been living for this only and yet" Shizuku was cut off by you when you embraced her and yelled. "That's not true. Don't give me that! You've been living for revenge alone." "Yoru." Shizuku mustered. "If you did so why did you come to me? Why did you get so friendly with me? Why did you live with us? You also wanted a place where you could live in peace. Then don't be like that. You think I or the others would be happy if you disappeared on us like that? If your gonna force yourself into my daily life, then Leaving is forbidden! I'll never ever approve of you leaving!" You ranted. Seconds later Shizuku embraced you back and started crying out all the pain she's and anger she's felt all these years and you just stand there on your knee comforting her. As she cried
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: snake finds peace

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: As Shizuku cried, you looked at Kuesu and thought that she was a big part of this. You were about to scold her when Shizuku told you not to blame her. You saw the look in Kuesu's eyes and knew she had nothing to do with it now. You then decided to take Shizuku home. "Well, I'm done here. So let's go home." Shizuku said. As the three of you went home, you gave Kuesu a wave good-bye for now as you continued to walk away. As you and the others got home, you were a little more tired than usual and went to sleep. The next morning you found Shizuku in your bed and you were covered in water. "Shizuku, why are you in my bed this time" You said. "Well, because you told me not to leave you. Then I'll need to coil up and stay bound to you." she said. As she tried to lean in and kiss you, Himari showed up and got her off you. "Good morning master. Though, covered in water, it may not be so good." she said. You greeted her and were about to go oitside to meditate, but you got dizzy all of a sudden and you collapsed to the floor. Himari and Shizuku ran up to you. "Master! He has a fever. Shizuku, give me a hand." she said.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content:
While you were being tended to by the girls Hitsugi, Kuesu, and a few other demon slayer were having a meeting.using their magic to have real time video chats.

The Shizuku and Himari told Ageha, Kaya, and Sasa who are helping treat you. They even had an Ayakashi who was a doctor while masticating as a human take a look at you. He told them his Diagnosis is that you have the common cold. The only ones who wern't there were Liz, Hitsugi, and Kuesu. Lix as you know was running a bussiness and Kuesu was living in town, but that didn't explain Hitsugi. While the girls were away you went to Hitsugi's room.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: You were still pretty dizzy as you went into Hitugi's room. You looked around and saw the meeting going on in there. Everyone saw that you still had a fever, but you came joined in anyway.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: Even though you had a fever you still had your wits about you. Looking around you spy Kagamimori Sisters, Aiji Tsuchimikado, and Kuesu were attending the meeting with Hitsugi. "Kasuri-chan Hisuzu-chan Good to see you again." You say. "Good to see you as well Yoru-san." Kasuri greets. "H hi Yoru-kun." Hisuzu greets with a blush. "Aiji." You simply state. "Yoru" Aiji states right back. "I'm guessing this meeting is about Kuesu's actions recently right?" Yoru ask truth be told you were still not happy with Kuesu over that although you hid it relativity well. "Yes she was way out of line with her actions. She was lucky that Ranka Mikari didn't press the matter. At least she knows the consequence of her actions unlike a curtain air head 3 rate demon slayer. Oh by the way Yoru-kun Ranka send you her thanks and says she owes you a kiss." Hisuzu stayed much to Kuesu displeasure. "Hisuzu-chan please let's keep this civil OK?" You ask. "A alright Yoru-kun." Hisuzu said with a blush. "Yoru-kun what are you doing with Hitsugi?" Kuesu yelled franticly. "Why wouldn't I be I mean I do own this house and estate. Or has Hitsugi-chan not told you all she moved in?" You answer. This one statement got Hitsugi glares from all three other girls. Although Kasuri was hiding it the best. "whoa way to go Yoru." Aiji says sarcastically. "Oh go by to bed with your boyfriend Aiji." you countered. You started to feel the effects of the cold again and start to lose stability only for Hitsugi to stabablize you. "Come on Yoru-kun we should get you back to bed. You won't beat that cold unless you do." Hitsugi says leading you out. "Well I think that concludes this meeting. I must go." Aiji says as his image disappears.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: Hitsugi and the other girls helped you back downstairs. Himari was worried about you and asked where you went. "It's fine Himari. You do not need to worry about me." you said. Ageha and Sasa helped you back into the futon and you started to rest again. As you slept, Himari looked at you. "He can be such an idiot at times." she thought to herself. Shizuku came downstairs and told Himari that she had gotten rid of the excess water in your bed. But they decided to keep you downstairs. They then decided to help you get rid of that cold. "Master, I made you a toddy." Himari said with a hot tea cup on a tray. "A toddy?" you said. "You made something that old?" Shizuku asked. "The old remedies still work. Drink it, it'll warm you up." Himari said as she handed you the cup. "T-thank you." you sad as you began to drink it. You did feel a little better, but not by too much. Shizuku went to get some chicken soup and the others joined her. Himari saw this as an excellent opportunity. You then felt something on your side. You looked and saw Himari getting in the futon with you. "H-Himari!?" you yelled. "The warmth of 2 bodies is the best thing for a cold." she said as she got in next to you. "Here, there is no need to hold back. It would just prove how close we are. In fact, I wouldn't mind catching your cold." she said. The next thing you know, your face is in Himari's breasts. "Master, if you're going to say I'm more than your sheild and sword, then rely on me at times like this. I'm your personal cat." she said. You could feel the emotion in her words. "Himari." you said gently. But then Shizuku came in and placed the hot pot on one of Himari's ears. "It's done." she said as the pot burned Himari's ears.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Himari's Dedication

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: "Meow." Is all Himari yelled. Before she could say or do anything Sasa and Kaya were dragging her off. Shizuku sat down and took off the lid of the soup and put a spoon into it. "Now say Ah." Shizuku said bringing a spoon full towards your face. You open your mouth and let Shizuku feed you the soup. This continued until
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: As you were about to take yet another mouthful of soup, Kuesu came in with Liz and she saw what was going on. You quickly swallowed the soup and tried to calm Kuesu down. "K-Kuesu. I can explain." you said nervously. Kuesu did get pretty mad and got into an arguement with Shizuku who set down the soup. But as the two of them were going at it, Liz took Shizuku's plase. "Open up Yoru-kun." she said. You gave a slightly nervous chuckle. "Liz, I can feed myself just fne." you sad. "No, you need to rest and relax. Now say ah." she said. But before this could continue, Kuesu and Shizuku dragged Liz away. You thought to yourself "OMan, if this is what it's going to be with Kuesu just coming here for this kind of thing, I have no iea what it will be like if she starts living here as well." All of the girls decided to take turns taking care ofyou. They drew slots to see who would finishe feeding you and the winner was Sasa. She helped you finish off the soup and you thanked her, even though you could do it yourself.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Loving Care

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: The next few days were a little hectic. When the Ayakashis heard you were sick they started arguing who was to be in charge. You settled it when you told them the elder Ayakashis from their council were in charge until you get better. This settled everything down. While this was happening the girls were making sure you were comfortable. Everything was going well when the doorbell rang.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: You were still not up to getting to doorbell yet, so Sasa was the one who answere. You heard three voices that sounded very familiar. Then you knew who it was; the sisters. They came in and saw you. "Hello Yoru-kun." they both said at the same time. They noticed you were still not doing well and then huddled up next to you. "Oh man, if Kuesu, Shizuku, or Himari see this it's not going to be pretty." you thought to yourself. And as if on cue, the girls came in and saw what was happening. They did get pretty angry, but the elders did stop them from getting out of control and you were grateful for that.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: Later that night you were still awake even though everyone else were asleep. You could feel it something was coming. Moments ago a ayakashi slipped though your barrier and was in the house. You could feel them watching you. "Why don't you show yourself I know your there." You state. "Well aren't you a sensitive one." You hear a voice inside your head. A young blond girl appears before you. "Crap it's her. and thanks to this seal that Kasuri placed on me I can't move properly without powering up." you though. and you couldn't do that in such close places and with so many people nearby. The fox moved closer to you and inhaled your scent. "You smell so good but I can tell you're holding back almost all of your power . Why is that?" She asks telepathicly and now siting on top of you an rubbing your face with her hand. After a second she smile "I'll be back soon and I hope you intertain me with a good fight bettter than last time now sleep". She states telepathicly and breathes something into your face that puts you to sleep almost instantly. The last thing you see is a smile on her face. After you fall asleep she floats into the air smile still on her face and disappears.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: An Evening Visit

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: In due time, you felt like your old selfagain. And just in time too, it was almost time for a christmas party at the clanhouse. You got ready and the party began. It was pretty much unsupervised now that you were better. There was one rule you should have thought of but didn't; no mistletoe. Kuesu saw this as the perfect time to get closer to you. She gave you a wine glass and held onto your left arm. "Whoa Kuesu, is that alcohol?" you said shocked. "Come on Yoru-chan, let's make a toast." she said with a smile on her face. You remembered what happened the time the nine-tails came to you when you could not fight. "Is something wrong?" Kuesu asked. "No, nothing at all." you said holding back the truth. Kuesu turned you around and wrapped her arms around you and pressed herself against you. "Whoa, hey Kuesu." you said a bit nervous. She smiled and said "Hmm, what's the matter Yoru? Is the area around your knees happy?" She then thought to herself "he's THAT big?" You blushed a little and Ageha shot confeti at her while yelling "Merry Christmas!" She did that to get Kuesu off of you much to your relief. You had no idea how much longer it would have been before things got a little too hot fr you. You then went outside fr a little fresh air.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: What a Party

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: You breathe deeply taking in the fresh crisp mountain air. This was a good life and you were happy to have it even though you know it's just temporary. Sooner or later they'll come for you. But you wonder which group will come first. Will it be those two demons, defence force 4, or the third group that you know all too well. You kept musing until. "Yoru onii-kun." A voice says says to your side. You turn and see Sasa wearing a new white dress. "Sasa-chan you look great in that." You said with a smile making her blush. "Thank you Onii-kun." Sasa yelled throwing her arms around you and you hugged Sasa back "Sasa-chan I need to ask you something." You ask your voice sounding serious. "Anything for you Onii-kun." Sasa says. "I want you to make me a sword. A sword that is made just for me." You say making he stop hugging you for a second and look at you in the eyes. "I will need some blood and the use of the workshop of the clan house and some tools from my parents house." She says quite seriously. "Done I'll arrange an escort for you and will get things ready." you say to her before kissing her.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: A Request for Sasa

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: As soon as you were done kissing her, she then told you there is one little thing. "What is it Sasa?" you ask. "Well, for my kind, a request like that is a marriage proposal." she says with a slight blush. You on the othe rhand were blushing a deep red from this. You nodded and Sasa gave you another kiss. She went inside and you were alone again. "How many fiancee's can a guy possibly get?!" you thought to yourself. As the night continued, you went inside and you noticed all the girls were all holding a mistletoe. "You have got to be kidding me." you thought to yourself. YOu followed the traditional rule and gave them all a quick kiss. Although, being the last girl in the line, Kuesu pulled you in for a kiss and actually put her tongue in your mouth. The girls got really pissed off from that. The rest of the night continued a bit more peacefully after that arguement was finished.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Another Fiancee?!

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: It's been half a month since that night. It's been business as usual since then. You could feel that Tamamo will not wait much longer she'll be back soon. The most unusual thing is that Sasa has locked herself away in the smithery refusing to see anyone even you. You are the only one who knows exacly what she's doing in there and she made you swear that to breathe a word to anyone about it.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content:
(Credit goes to Dragonmaster)

Sasa is standing at the door from the smithery with an object wraped in cloth. efore she opens the door she thinks back to meeting her parents for the tools.

-Flashback-

Sasa is sitting at a table with her parents her father had refused to give her the tools she needed saying she was still too immature to use them. After that she glares right into her father's eye and says she won't let anyone stand in her way of making the sword that the one she loves asked her spacificly to make. Her father is a little taken back by this but before he could answer answer his wife the head of the family smacks him in the head with a empty sword shethe and places the tools on the table. She then says she is proud of the woman she had become and that she wiuld handle Sasa's father. As Sasa left her mother called out. "Don't forget to make me a grandmother soon!"
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Sasa's Flashback

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: Sasa took a deep breathe and opened the door. She wasn't surprised to find you sitting at the on the other side but the to cups of tea did surprise her. "After all that time in there I would think you would be thirsty." You say offering her a cup. Sasa takes it thankfully after sitting down the object wrapped in cloth. "So this is it huh?" You say looking at the cloth. "Yes it is." Sasa says. Thinking back over all the steps taking some of your blood, throwing your blood onto molten magma, Cooling it and begin shaping it, shaping it then cooling it many many times, and then polishing it and installing the hilt. She sigh and starts pulling off the cloth.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: She starts to pull away the cloth revealing a perfectly forged sword (http://www.trueswords.com/images/prod/av...) She handed it to you and you took it in your hand. You knew this sword was perfect for you. You thanked Sasa and gave her a quick kiss. She then handed you a shieth that goes on your back. You put the sword in the shieth and took Sasa to the other, being it was time to eat and all that stuff.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Your Sword

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: That night you were sleeping and were exsperiencing a moment of your pass.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: Continue

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content:
(The Ayakashi in the flashback looks like Cell in his first form)
Many years ago when you were a child, you made friends with an older woman named Genkai. The two of you grew very close and she was like a second grandmother to you. But even when you were young, you had a great amount of power. And there was an Ayakashi who absorbed energy and came after you. Genkai tried to fight him off because she had something to prove, even though you didn't know what it was. But she was overpowered by the creature very quickly. He walked over to her and picked her up by the shirt and chuckled. "I could absorb your energy Genkai, but I have a much greater source over there for me to feed on. You're of no value to me anymore, you're just refuse. Good-bye." he said before a powerful blast of energy came from his hand and destroyed most of her body.
1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.title: A Dark Memory

1552121121211111111111111111111111111121.content: You sat up and were heading on the way for breakfast with a far off look in your eyes. That's when sirens starting going off in your head you know the only reason for that is someone is intruding on your land and you could feel allot of them. Using a spell you could see it was Defence force 4 of the Japanese government. 'So they finally decided to come her and exterminate me and all the Ayakashi that live here huh?' You think to yourself. "Himari tell everyone no one is to leave until I come back." You say to Himari as you pass her. Before she could question you raised a very powerful barrier and used your magic to jump to the other side of the mountains where you sense they were.
