1552211111111.content: As you looked at Himari who was still out cold in your arms, you needed to get back to the others and fast. You then used your power of wind to propel you through the water and allowed you to stay underwater by sourrounding you and Himari with air. As you got near the shore, you had to make it look like it was a normal thing, you you faked it. The only person you couldn't fool when you do that is Rinko. Taizo, the chairperson and Rinko saw you with Himari in your arms. "Yoru-kun, what happened?" "She hit her head on a rock. She was knocked out when I found her. Luckily she didn't take in too much water." But then, Himari started to wake up and saw she was in your arms. "Master, you saved me." You smiled and you all went back home.
1552211111111.title: Later

15522111111111.content: The next day, you were in the bath trying to relax and figure out how you were able to unlock the power of wind. Now only did you also gain the full knowledge of how to use this new power, but you also remembered how to use the Chaos Spear as well. But before you could get out, Shizuku appeared in front of you. You could not react in time, so you called Himari and she rushed to you. She saw and attacked Shizuku which turned out to be a water clone. “That’s new.” you thought to yourself. Then you felt her at your back. “Do you still wish to continue? Now, I told you I would kill you.” “I already told you, I do not wish to fight.” “Who can prove that? How do you expect me to believe the same kind of beings that killed my family?!” “I…I…” but before you could say anything, you passed out in the bath. Soon, you woke up on the couch fully clothed. Rinko and Himari were watching you as well. “You two…I passed out in the bath. How did I get into these?” “We didn’t see anything.” they said at the same time. “They both got a good look.” you were all surprised by the fact Shizuku was still here. “I got a good look, too.” “What are you saying?” “Naughty.” Rinko blushed a bright red and backed into you. Himari was about to attack before you called him off. “Shizuku, I can’t offer any proof. But I can assure you this, I am not the kind of person who attacks Ayakashi just because I’m a demon slayer.” Shizuku trusted you and said that she was going to study you to get a better understanding of you. She was now officially living in the house as well.
15522111111111.title: The Next Day

155221111111111.content: The next morning, You, Rinko, and Himari saw that Shizuku made one hell of a meal. You took the first bite and loved it. Rinko tried it and said to herself “What is this feeling of defeat?” Himari was feeling the pressure because not only did Shizuku make breakfast, but she also did the laundry and cleaned the place. “Wow, with skills like this, you would make an excellent bride." “In that case…you can look forward to today’s assault. I will seduce you.” Rinko was not pleased at all as she said this. “Yoru will not fall for your tricks!” “Then… is this what you prefer?” she asks lifting up Rinko’s skirt. You turn look away and slightly blush. “That’s not…” “What? You don’t want me?” she said looking hurt. You tried to get out of this by complimenting Shizuku’s housework skills. But then Himari decided it was time to prove that she was more than just a mouth to feed. She ran into your teacher and she got a job at a maid café called Café Relish.
155221111111111.title: Later

1552211111111111.content:
(Liz)

Later on during the day, you, Shizuku and Rinko decided to see how Himari was doing with her job. It turned out the place was pretty popular. "M-master!” “H-Himari, that outfit…” You and the others sat down at a table with Himari giving you a glass of water. “What a surprise. Nevertheless, I’m glad you came, master. How do I look in a maid outfit?” You look at her cat ears and tail exposed. "The outfit is good, but I am not so sure about the cat ears and tail.” “Oddly enough, no one seems to find these strange here.” Taizo showed up and began to think with his sex drive again. He saw Shizuku and asked who she was. She introduced herself as Himari’s acquaintance. “I get it. You can hide your true identity in one of the may maid cafés.” Himari then wrapped her arms around you. “I’m exclusively your maid, master.” Every single male in the café got jealous and Rinko was about to go crazy. But then the owner of the shop told Himari the rules. “Sorry for causing you trouble.” “Oh, not at all.” She then thought to herself “This man’s smell…”
1552211111111111.title: Cafe Relish

15522111111111111.content: As you sat there drinking the best tea you have ever had, Himari and Shizuku gave you a warning that Liz was an Ayakashi. You had no reason to fear this girl. However, Liz on the otherhand was terrified that you were here to kill her. In a short time, she tried to get you to drink some magic tea, but Shizuku with that extremely long tongue of hers tested it and gave it to Taizo. All the tea did was make him leave. imari saw this and she attacked. You tried to get her to stop, but she was determined. Liz did manage to land a kick, but Himari stuck her sword through her, but it did nothing.It turns ot that she was can Ayakashi called a Tsukumogami. It also turns out her real body was a tecup and Himari was about to smash it, when Liz dove after it. But then, the cup went into the air and Liz was anabe to catch it. You used the power of wind to stop it form hitting the ground. Liz saw this and quickly grabbed the cup. "Whew! That was a close call. Is your body intact?" "Yes. But why did you save me?" "I guess I didn't think you were a bad person. I could tell at a glance. You love this store...and you work hard to provide everyone with great tea. I didn't feel any evil from you. Besides, theres no way someone evil could prepare such great tea." Liz was touched and appologised for everything. She told you she thought you were here to kill her. "Don't worry. I would never do anything to you. But as my friend, I will protect you. I promise you." Just then, your eyes shined a topaz yellow and the power of erath was unlocked. The next morning you woke up to Himari, Shizuku and Rinko in a maid outfit. This was going to be a heck of a time.
15522111111111111.title: Power of Earth Awakened

155221111111111111.content: The next morning, you woke up from a dream which seemed more like a memeory to find your right hand on Himari's breast. "H-Himari! Calm down Yoru. I'll just remove my hand and get out of bed." you said to yourself. As you tried to do this, Himari placed her hand on your own and you froze for a moment. "Are you fond of women's breats, Master?" "Wait, Himari. It wasn't on purpose..." "You Pervert." a voice said from under your sheets. You were shocked to find Shizuku under the sheets with you. "Yoru, do you always sleep with this cat?" "Not Always!" you said without thinking. You then noticed Rinko at the doorway and you knew she was pissed. "Not always, huh? Which means there are times you sleep with her?" "Wait, you have the wrong idea, Rinko." you say even with Himari and Shizuku holding you. "How can you say that in your position?!" she said as she started to swing a wooden bat at the three of you. Luckily you all got out of that without a scratch. Later, you all went to Cafe Relish to talk about what happened this morning. "Is that it? I was wondering why you were in such a bad mood." "It's not like that!" "However, the Ayakashi could come for the young master at any time. As his bodyguard, it is only natural I stay at his side at all times." "Identifying Yoru Amakawa's nature is my mission. I must not stop my abservation for even a moment." "In any case, there is no reason for you to make such a big fuss over this. It was normal for us in the past. In fact, we did even more." "More?" "You had an intimate reationship? I can't believe it!" "I don't know or remember anything about that!" "What are you getting so upset about?" "That is, umm..." she said looking at you. You only gave a confused look. "You fell in love with Yoru after he saved you." Liz just squeeled which confirmed it. "I don't need anyone else meddling in my business!" "How can you say that?" "Let's all try to get along, okay?" "Kindness is a mistake at times." "That's right! It's your fault for not being clear!" "What? Me?" Later that night, Himari had thought that the fact you had forgoten your past and not becoming a true demon slayer was a problem, so she told you to get ready to go to Noihara. But she unintentionally invited Rinko and Shizuku with you.
155221111111111111.title: A Trip to Noihara

1552211111111111111.content:
(Kaya)

In a short time, you and the others made it back to your grandparent's home. "Why did I have to bring this up with you two around?" "Do you really think I would let you and Yoru come here by yourselves?" "I am interested in Yoru's roots. I may learn something about the demon slayers." "But why are we here Himari?" "I thought if we came to Noihara, you would remember your past with me. I mean, you would recognize yourself as a demon slayer, and take my feelings seriously. I mean, you would take the resposabilities of the Amakawa family seriously!" "Cat, we can see your true colors." "I knew it." All you could do is chuckle. "Alright! We're here. It hasn't changed a bit." "This is Grandma's and Grandpa's..." "Himari!" a girls voice said. You looked and saw a little girl in a red robe. "So it is you! Welcome home, Himari." "I'm back. How have you been?" "Same old, same old." "Himari, who is this child?" "I'm Kaya, a zashiki warashi. It's a pleasure to meet you." "Zashiki warashi?" "Yes." "So, you're an Ayakashi too?" "I hope you die, Yoru Amakawa." You gave a very confused look. "If you were gone, Himari would stay here forever. She woudn't go anywhere." Himari then hit her on the head. "Hey, don't spout useless crap! I'm sorry. She runs her mouth off, but she's a good girl." "If it wasn't for me, this place would be overrun with weeds! Be thankful!" "Nevermind that. Where is your library?" "Who are you? You seem pretty strong." Kaya then showed all of you around and you found your grandparent's altar. "Look Gen-ji, Sawa-ba! See how much the young master has grown." "I was disconnected from my grandparents and didn't even go to their funeral. I'm sorry." you thought to yourself. "And these clothes! The young master bought them for me." "You don't need to tell them about that!" Just then all three girls were bihind you with a very mad expression "I have a bad feeling about this." you said to yourself. "I will fulfill my vow to protect the young master...until he becomes a full-fledged demon slayer. Rest in peace." "Demon slayer, huh?" you thought. As the day continued, you were looking at the cieling trying to remember anything with a fan blowing at you. "My forgotten past...What happened here?" you thought. "Do you remember anyhting now?" "Himari..." "I'm sure you know why I brought you here." "Y-yeah, but..." "Don't worry about being a demon slayer." you looked and saw Himari have the fan blow up her skirt. "Start by remembering what happened here." "Can't you stop doing these embarrassing things?" "Am I making you nervous?" Himari then got closer to you and your back was against a dresser in the room. "If words are ineffective, perhaps this would work better for you." "Himari..." "If you won't remember, then I'll make you remember." she said before licking your neck. "Himari..." She stopped and then you had a slight flashback that showed you with a white cat. The next thing you know, you are standing at the lake with that cat.
1552211111111111111.title: Remember the Past

15522111111111111111.content:
(Ageha)

"That's right. That cat...So it was you." Himair was in her cat form. "Took you long enough, idiot. When we were young, we did everything together. Dispite that, you left me without saying a word." "S-sorry, but I did try to remember." "Really now?" "I was taken away by my parents without understanding anything." Himari jumped into your arms. "Forget it. More importantly." she said as she transformed back. The odd part of that was that she had no clothes on. "As punishment for forgetting me...Hug me until I am satisfied." "H-Himari, do you think you could put some clothes on? All sorts of paces...Are causing all sotrts of problems." "Like I care. I won't let go of you today. You are mine after all." Just then a woman standing in a tree came out and said "I found you, Yoru Amakawa! "I'll have you die right here!"
15522111111111111111.title: At the Lake

155221111111111111111.content: "What are you two doing?" "Geez...learn to read the atmosphere. Leave before I decide to kill you." "You think you can threaten me in the nude? You can't do anything without your sword, can you? I am Ageha, the air demon. I thought you might show up if I hung around the Amakawa house...but didn't expect it to be so soon. Now give me the sword and die, Yoru Amakawa!" You were still a little too surprised by all ofthis, and could not react. But you niticed Himari was gone. She came out of the tree and stopped Ageha from cutting you. "I missed, eh?" "Where did you get that sword-" is what she said before her chest area was exposed and she screamed. "Unfortunately fr you, I had stashed away my clothes and sword in a tree earlier. I do not want the young master seeing another woman's chest. Put them away. An air demon...she'll suck out your blood while you're alive. I'll kill her." "Himari!" you said giving a strong look. "Alright alright. Ageha or whatever! The current head of the Amakawa Family is a person seeking peace between Humankind and Ayakashi. Won't you abandon your agression and withdraw?" Ageha looked and laughed a little. "He wants me to leave peacefully? I can't believe my ears. What I wish for is to raise my status by killing demon slayers! His desires are no concern of mine!" "This is more like it. Now I can cut you down with an unburdened mind." "W-wait! What are you trying to say?" "It's exactly as I said. All she wants is to kill you and raise her status among Ayakashi." "No way." "Let's see if your bark is worse than your bite, air demon!" "Wait, Himari!" "Master, you need to leave. I know you can fight, but you have just remembered your past with me. That alone gives me strength. I would fight the world for you." When she said that, you felt another power inside you unlock and your body felt very hot. You had unlocked the power of fire! "Keep your head in the battle fool!" she said as her arm streached out to attack. Himari blocked it and told you to leave. You started to run for the house to get the others to safety, but then, some kind ofgiant came out of nowhere. "Daidarabocchi!" The creature attacked the both of you and you both dodged. "Himari!" "What are you doing? Take this chance and run away!" "But-" "GO! I wil be alright!" You had no choice but to run. As the fight continued, you got second thoughts and ran back. You also saw that Ageha was about to cut Himari in two, so you jumped in front of the blade. "Master!" she was surprised that you took the attack. "Himari..." "Are you an idiot?! Why haven't you run away?" "I can't let girls protect me all the time. "I've got to act like a man sometimes, right?" but when you turned around, your chest was slashed and blood came from it. As you fell to the ground, Himari was going to lose it. "What an unexpected turn of events. You were saved by the one you were supposed to save. His blood is beautiful. It really looks delicious." but then, Himari lost control and her heart sank into a darkness. She attacked and cut the giants arm off. She was about to kill Ageha when you stopped her with a blade made from pure energy. The collision not only unlocked the power ofdarkness, but a huge blast came from the point and destroyed the giant and crated a huge clearing. Shizuku saw this and went to the point of the blast. "This is the power, of chaos."
155221111111111111111.title: Fire and Darkness Unlocked

1552211111111111111111.content: As Himari came too, she saw Shizuku lying in top of you with no clothes. "What do you think you're doing?!" "Quiet down. I'm tending Yoru's wounds." "What?" "Pure water has the power to heal wounds." Himari saw that the slice on your chest was disappearing with her on top of you. She remembered how you protected her from the attack. Shizuku was sinished and she scolded Himari for letting that happen to you. Later on she deicded to take a bath and Kaya held a knife you your face and said "no peeking." You wouldn't do that in your dreams. Later on, Shizuku explained that your power was different to the rest of your family and that your true power would be unlocked only with a serine state of mind. She also explained the other elements that needed to be unlocked were lightning and light. She told you that because of her, you could now control water. You thanked her and you went to Himari. You told her that you remembered the time she kiessed you when you were young, but she told you that never happened, because the first time she appeared to you in human form was when you and Rinko were walking to school. For the last weak you were trying to figure out who that girl was, but you let it go beacuse of the fun you were having with Himari. One day, the two of you were walking from school and you enjoyed the sunset. But then, a girl in a black dress with long, siver hair and a crescent moon on her head appeared and atytacked Himari. It turns out she was also a demon slayer.
1552211111111111111111.title: Another Demon Slayer

15522111111111111111111.content:
(Kuesu)

"I am Kuesu, heiress of the Jinguji Family, one of the twelve demon slayer clans." "A demon slayer? There are othe demon slayers other than me?" "What are you surprised about? We're both charged with eliminating the Ayakashi. I shouldn't need to tell you that. It's inherent in our relationship." "W-what are you talking about?" Himari got in front of you. "Stay out of this, pet." "What did you say?" "How aggressive. What ifyou ruin my good looks? Why don't you find yourself a scratching post like a real cat?" Himari now had an understanding of how Rinko felt when she first met her. "Come with me, Yoru Amakawa. You need not associate with filthy Ayakashi any longer. I'm here for you now." You just stood there. "How long are you intending to hide behind that filthy Ayakashi?" "W-wait a minute. I don't understand." Kuesu chuckled a little. "Quit calling the Ayakashi filthy. You shouldn't assume they're your enemies without taking the time to understand them." Kuesu stopped walking towards you. "What are you saying? We're finally reunited. Would you mind not disappointing me?" "Reunited?" "I'm not sure I can forgive you for forgetting me. Not to mention this..." Himari charged at her, but she dodged the strike with ease. "So fast." you thought to yourself. Himari got ready to attack again but she created some kind of barrier keeping you in with her. Himari tried to cut through but to no avail. You were about to use Chaos Control to escape, but she grabbed your face and somehow suppressed your powers. "Now, quit dragging your feet and come with me. That's an order." "Who are you to order me around?" "Your grandfather asked me to look after you." "Grandpa?" "Do not listen to her master!" "W-what do you mean? Why would my grandfather do that?" "I was told to join the Amakawa family. He and my family arranged for us to be married. Can your mind understand that?" "Married?" "You really don't remember anything, do you?" She then began to pull your face closer to her own. "The protective charm placed on you must have been extremely powerful.... But I'll make sure you remember." she said as she kissed you on the lips. You then had a little flash back about her as a young girl and how she kissed you before. "Could she be the girl I thought was Himari?" you thought. She broke the kiss and looked into your eyes. "Y-you're.." "YOU BITCH!" Himari yelled as she cut through the barrier. Kuesu dodged and you ended up falling backwards. She then caught you and kissed you in front of her. But this time she slipped her tongue into your mouth. "Did you really need to kiss him a second time?" Kuesu broke the kiss and licked her lips after a transparent line of saliva trailed from your lips to her own. "Second?" she said as you fell on your ass. "Don't be foolish. That was the third. That's probably enough for today. I'm sure he needs time to think things over. I'm staying at the Shin-Takamiya Hotel in the neighboring city. Visit me whenever you feel like it. After all, you are my fiancée, and you can expect me to treat you as such. However, it's a rather high class hotel. Please leave your pet at home. Of course, if your family does not cut its ties with the Ayakashi.... a certain demon slayer may have to destroy it along with the demons. Farewell." she then disappeared before your eyes.
15522111111111111111111.title: Kuesu Jinguji

155221111111111111111111.content: For the rest of that day, Himari was acting like she was avoiding you. But later that night she came to you with one odd request. "Master, kiss me!" when she said that, you spit out the tea you were drinking. She quickly got on the couch and began to crawl towards you. "W-what?" "Just do it. It's only a kiss." "What's gotten into you, Himari?" "Please, master." "H-hold on." "Are you saying you won't?" "That's not the issue here. I can't just..." Himari moved in closer but backed off in a second. "No, no. I know it's a strange request. I know it's not right, but..." "But?" "If I don't do what that woman did...I won't be able to move past it." Then you knew that she was talking about Kuesu kissing you right in front of her. "Kuesu must have really gotten to her." you thought to yourself. "Can you...Can you kiss an Ayakashi?" "I...I don't..." "A peck on the cheek wouldn't hurt, right? I suppose you can't do that either." "Himari..." "S-sorry for speaking such nonsence." she said as she was about to get away from you, but you grabbed her wrist, stopping her. "M-master?" "Himari..." Himari gasped lightly but she knew you would honor her request. You proceeded to kiss her cheek, but then the door bell rang. "Wait, master. Someone's..." she was cut off by your lips touching hers. "Odd. This doesn't feel like a cheek." you thought as you opened your eyes. You saw you kisse dher on the lips and you fell backwards. Just then, Himari blushed and exposed her cat ears. "Wha...your lips?" you got very embarrassed. "On your lips...your lips..." and a meow escaped from Himari's lips. Rinko came in the kitchen and saw you just had cup noodles for dinner. Himari tackled her in a happy way and she helped Rinko make dinner. You on the other hand were still shocked that you kissed her on the lips.
155221111111111111111111.title: Himari's First Kiss

1552211111111111111111111.content: The Next day, you, Shizuku and Rinko went to the cafe to talk about Kuesu. Shizuku pulled up her information on her laptop and Liz came in and was scared of this new demon slayer. "She's quite skiled and vicious. You're easy prey for her." "Yoru-san!" she said as she shoved your head in her clevage. "Protect this innocent little teacup." "Get away from him you demon teacup." "Get away!" they both knocked Liz on the head and dragged her away. "But what does Yoru have to do with this girl?" "My family has been connected with the Junguji family for quite some time. And, she and I are...." you told them and Rinko was very angry. She grabbed you by the collar of your shirt while Liz and Shizuku looked up the word fiancee. "W-what do you mean?" "I-I just remembered this recently. It's a decision my grandfather made behind my back. I can't breath." "Forget that old promise." "Right!" "However, that vicious woman would never accept that." "Drink this." You were trying to catch your breath as Rinko talked to Liz. "Magic tea! What effect does it have?" "It erases memories." "Great!" "Every memory you've had since you were born." "Hey! What good is it to erase all of his memories? Don't you have tea that will erase select memories?" "I don't have anything like that." "In any case, it's empty." Rinko grabbed you and began to shake you like crazy. Just then the bell for the entrance rang. "W-welcome." "How do you do, Yoru Amakawa?" "There she is!" Kuesu saw that they were getting information on her. "It seems I don't have to introduce myself." All the eyes in the room were towards her. Liz closed the shop for the reason that she wanted no one else to see what was going on. Kuesu liked the tea Liz made. "What well-brewed tea." "Th-thank you." she said hiding behind you. "Excuse me...Jinguji-san?" "Jinguji-san sounds so formal. As your childhood friend, please call me Kuesu." "Childhood friend?" "Why don't we get down to business? It's about the future of the Amakawa and Jinguji Families we discussed the other day. There's more to the promise to join out families." "Until you change your mentaility, I can't go along with that." "Why is that? We demon slayers are the chosen ones. As humans with exceptional powers, it's our responsibility to eradicate the Ayakashi. Associating with that poorly behaved cat and Ayakashi masqurading as a human is absurd." "Don't be ridiculous. Who do you think you are?" "Rinko..." "You showed up out of the blue and have been saying whatever you want. Eradicate the Ayakashi? The chosen ones? That's all just arrogance! What gives you the right?" "You're just a powerless commoner in need of protection. What does a person unfimiliar in life-or-death battles...simply enjoying her painfully ordinary life...understand about being a demon slayer? Yoru Amakawa, you belong with me." She then began to walk towards you. "Your recent outburst of power must have made you understand. You must reconsider your grandfather's words." she said as she held you against her. "My grandfather's words?" "Yes." "I can't imagine Gen-ji expected you to become such a selfish woman." she said as she came behind a support beam. "I can't let the young master turn into your slave." "Himari." "I don't know how you've lived up until now...but the young master is his own person. Leave him out of your plans." "It seems you're trying to claim a connection to him. However, I am his fiancee and a demon slayer like him. We understand each other better than anyone else." "Understand each other. Then why do you force yourself on the young master? You were the one kissing him all three times." "Himari..." "Kissed you?" "The young master kissed me as well." “You kissed her as well?” “A-an Ayakashi? Is it true?” “Th-that was, uh…” “Th-this is nothing in the face of the promise we made that day.” “What promise?” Kuesu gasped and placed her hand on her head. She laughed a little and said as she backed away “It seems this will take quite some time. I’ll be back. Even if you don’t remember it, we’ve been connected since we were children. Farewell.” Just then, she disappeared again. "Kuesu..."
1552211111111111111111111.title: Kuesu's Visit

15522111111111111111111111.content: The next day, as you were playing soccer at school, you remembered all the stuff Kuesu said to you. “Why is Kuesu so set on being with me? What promise was she talking about?” But then Taizo told you heads up and being the second best kick in the school, when the ball hit your head, you were knocked out cold. Himari ran up to you. You woke up later with your head on her legs. “Are you alright? You seem out of it today, master. Is it because of that girl?” You nodded. You and Himari sat together while the others let you sit out for a bit. “To be frank, I am not in a position to stop you from going along with Kuesu Jinguji.” “R-really?” “I am your bodyguard. I cannot tell you how to live.” “It’s your responsibility as an Ayakashi in service to the Amakawa Family.” “Fool. That’s only if I disregard my personal interests.” “You’re right. You wouldn’t be yourself otherwise. But I‘ve got to do something. Killing all the Ayakashi. Weather it‘s good or evil, there‘s something wrong with Kuesu‘s thinking.” “Master…” “How can I get her to change?” “You can’t change her. She’s set in her ways…so long as you don’t change yours.” “I guess you’re right.” you said as you fell onto the grass. “Why did grandpa make Kuesu my fiancée?” “I have an idea. The masculine Amakawa Family and the feminine Junguji Family. Maintaining power by joining the two families is by no means a bad plan. Both families would die without an heir.” “An heir?” Your imagination did the rest for you on that one. As you spaced out a little Himari sat on your chest. “Master. You haven’t been deluded by her charms, have you?” she asks grabbing your shirt collar. “No, uh…” “You seem rather suspicious. You’re too weak to women.” “That’s not true!” you lied. You looked away or a moment. “What are you averting your eyes for? Look at me.” She said as she placed her hands on your face. But then all of the guys saw what was happening and you got out of there. But before that, Himari told you that she was going with a countermeasure against Kuesu. You thought she knew what she was doing and let her. But later that night, you found her in her room knocked out and her kimono shredded. You knew she must have fought against Kuesu.
15522111111111111111111111.title: The Next Day

155221111111111111111111111.content: That night, you took care of Himari and withing a few hours she woke up. She was ashamed of herself because of what happened. You calmed her down and she asked you to bring her bag to her. She took a pill that got what remaind ofKuesu's magic out of her body, but she acted like an actual cat the entire time. The next day, she thanked you for taking care of her by kissing you. You had to speak with Kuesu now. You used Chaos control to go to the hotel and you made your way to her room.
155221111111111111111111111.title: That Night

1552211111111111111111111111.content: You knocked on Kuesu’s door. “You finally came, Yoru Amakawa. I’m so sick of waiting I was about to have a fit.” “H-Hello.” “What are you nervous about? Come in. Reception told me you were coming, so I prepared some tea.” “I’ve never been in the top floor of a hotel before. It’s a bit different from what I had imagined.” “Is that so? Most of the furniture is my own actually. I intend to stay here quite a while, so I made changes as I saw fit.” “Is she allowed to do that?” you thought to yourself. She then asked for your cell phone and you gave it to her. Just then, you heard something break. It turns out you were bugged, which was odd. You are usually more careful than that. The number she placed herself on is under “Love Love Kuesu-sama” which was quite the title. “Well? Have you decided to join me as a demon slayer?” “First, I want to thank you for what you did to Himari.” you said sarcastically. “No master keeps quiet when someone torments his cat. Did you think I wouldn’t be angry?” "We were just playing. Besides, she attacked me.” “It isn’t an issue of who attacked who.” “What then?" “Himari said she couldn’t help it if I joined the Junguji Family. She said she wouldn’t stop me. But what about you? You fundamentally reject Himari and Shizuku’s desire to coexist. You want to destroy them only because they are Ayakashi. I don’t want to lose my current life…and if we can live together, I can’t reject the Ayakashi. I’m not like you. I cannot follow your path. You are not my ally.” When you said this, Kuesu gasped a little and your questions echoed through her mind. “Why are you obsessed with me?” “What is this man saying?” “We haven’t met for years, and now you claim you’re my fiancée?” “You don’t know how I’ve felt.” “Shizuku told me that the Amakawa and Junguji Families were both persecuted by the other demon slayer clans. You want the Amakawa Family’s Chaos Power, don’t you? The Chaos Power is able to cause great destruction or great protection. You need that power to revive the Junguji Family. Am I wrong?” “It’s all for the Junguji Family. You‘re wrong.” “I don’t intend to use a power that brings unhappiness. I can’t agree to a marriage of calculation. It would only make us unhappy. That’s why…” you were cut off by Kuesu cutting your cheek with a dagger. “What?” “Why doesn’t my voice reach you? You’ve changed. It may be too late for you. At the very least, let me be the one to take care of you.” She then tried to stab you and you avoided each attack. You were then back against the wall and you could not use chaos control. She must have done something to the tea to keep you from using it. “I don’t need you. You’re unnecessary.” “Kuesu!” “Don’t worry, I can do it!” Just before she stabbed you, the power of lighting was released and a huge thunderclap knocked her through the window. You then remembered your promise with her all those years ago. As you remembered this, you saw Kuesu fall and you were horrified. “What have I done? I was the one who wanted to fight demons. I forgot my past. But Kuesu, she never… she never forgot the promise we made that day.” you said with tears in your eyes. But then Kuesu appeared behind you and leaned against your back with her own. “I never showed my back to anyone until you protected me. But you were always protecting cats and snakes. To be honest, I was disillusioned.” “I was terrible.” “Yes, you were. Do you remember? If you broke your promise, you'd give me all your sweets and desserts...I could ask you for anything morning, afternoon and night...and you'd give me a present and treat me to an expensive dinner on my birthday." “What? That’s quite a heavy punishment.” “I’m kidding. We never promised that. If I kill cats and snakes for the Junguji family, I would undoubtedly become your enemy.” “Is that why you tried to kill me?” “No, I could never kill you. But I did intend to stab you. If I didn’t your power wouldn’t manifest and you would not remember our promise.” “You tried to stab me for that? I was actually scared.” “That is what an idiot like you deserves for forgetting something so important. I suppose I can forgive you though. When I fell out the window, I saw the concerned look on your face. If you can still show me that expression…I can’t let you down either.” “Kuesu…” just then the final element was unlocked and the power of light was yours to command.
1552211111111111111111111111.title: Light and Storm Unlocked

15522111111111111111111111111.content: Kuesu said she would give you a reprieve "Kuesu, thank you." "Don't get the wrong idea. If they get in my way, I will show no mercy. Besides, if you spend more time with me, you will notice that I am better." "Huh?" "You're completely defenseless, ad you're not a little boy any more. I suppose you can't help but fantisize about the cat. But with me around, that will all definitely come to an end." "What are you talking about?" "Instead of relying on those Ayakashi...you can come to me with the urges you've been having!" but she got very embarrassed when she said that. "How dare you make a talented witch say such things!" "I didn't make you say anything!" She then rushed over to you and grabbed your shirt collar. "In any case, you need only keep quiet and protect my back, Yo-chan. That's all I...I..." "Yo-chan? Since when were you tsundere?" Kuesu let go of you and quickly turned around. "H-Himari!" "When did you...? How did you get in here?" "What kind of bodyguard can't find her master? It seems the barrier you put up broke along with that window. I got to hear the embarrassing speeech that came after it, too." "Embarrassing?" "I'm amazed you haven't given up yet. You can't fool the young master. Besides, do you honestly think you can beat me?" "I take back what I said. I will grant you no reprieve. This cat doesn't seem to understand her situation." "I couldn't ask for more. I will let you decide which sword you die by." she said pointing to a woman in a white robe. She then threw up a large amount of weapons which freaked you and Kuesu out. "What is this?" "Put those away!" "This sword will do." "Are you an idiot? Look what you've done to our love nest!" "Are you still blathering on about that?" This went on for a while, but in the end nothing happened. Though you had a bad feeling a true battle woulld soon be upon you all.
15522111111111111111111111111.title: Later

155221111111111111111111111111.content: The next day, you and the entire class were out for a project on art. everyone had to draw something, though your teacher did not care what you all drew. Taizo asked Himari if she would would be his model. "Model?" Taizo explained to her what he meant. "I can already imagine what you'd draw." "I refuse. The only one who can look upon my body is the young master." she said with her arms around you. Taizo got jealous and Rinko was not too pleased. "We havent done anything Taizo!" "What are you so embarrassedd for, master?" "Listen..." "Forget that fool. Let's go, master." she said as she dragged you away and Rinko followed. Later you, Himari and Rinko were alone on a hillside with a large amount of flowers. She used her camera phone to take pictures. "How is this, master?" "Photos and drawings aren't the same thing." "I can understand drinking sake while enjoying the flowers. I've never been able to understand art." Rinko was surprised to see an Ayakashi with a camera phone. Himari then explained how she was always at your side so she had no need to call you. But after she took her next picture she was going to get ready to pose. "Well, master? How woud you like me to pose?" "What are you talking about?" She then lifts up her skirt and shirt and giving a pose of her own. "Modeling for your drawing, of course. What do you think? How does this look?" "W-wait, Himari! What are you doing? I don't..." "Yeah! Cut that out, you dirty cat!" "You're saying this isn't enough?" she says with a grin. "How's this then?" she said revealing her breasts completely. She ran towards you but you got out of the way. But when you turned around, she dropped her skirt and panties. You had a blast nosebleed at the sight of this. "It's for your art master. I can take off more, if you like. After all, the nude is the fundamental drawing of a woman." "Oh, man!" you said looking away. "I will not lose to a cat!" "You do not need to compete with her." "You should listen to the young master." She and Rinko got into an arguement, but as they did this, you spotted a butterfly and walked after that as your art. But as you were walking, you were ambushed by something and you were pulled through the bushes. That tea Kuesu gave you still didn't wear off yet, so you were powerless. But you did manage to cal for Himari but she could not find you.
155221111111111111111111111111.title: The Next Day

1552211111111111111111111111111.content: You were thrown against the fence of a generator. "Ouch..." "How have you been?" "Who are you?" The woman took off her glasses and undid her hair to reveal herslef as Ageha. "Ageha? What are you...?" "I'm glad you remembered me." "How could I forget? What are you doing here?" "What do you think?" she said crawling towards you. "How would I..." "How far have you gone with Himari?" "What?" "Don't give me that. You're her master. You can get her to do whatever abnormal sex play you want." "Don't say that! I'd never ask her for anything like that. We haven't done anything." "You haven't done anything? Really?" "Well we kissed..." "What are you, a middle school student?" "What kind of standards are you using?" "You are just too much of a kid." she said as she threw her jacket off. She took your hands and made you budd her breasts. "Fine. Aren't they soft?" "H-hey! W-what are you..." you were cut off by Ageha kissing you. "Well?" "What do you think you're doing?" "Oh, shut up. This is as far as you have gotten with that cat, right? From here on out, I'll do even more amazing thing to you." "Amazing things?" Just then, you looked into Ageha's eyes and your body felt very weak. You then blacked out. "I'm an air demon. I'm only here to suck your blood. Let' make you feel good." She then bent down and bit your neck and began to suck on your blood. She stopped tobreath and she loved it. Before she could do it again, Himari and Shizuku showed up and woke you up. You expected a fight, but that was not the case. Just then the guy who you saw with Kuesu come and he wanted to talk to you.
1552211111111111111111111111111.title: Ageha Returns

15522111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Kaburagi)

"Yoru Amakawa, I am here to ask for your help." "What do you want with the young master?" "Himari, let's hear him out." "We are having trouble with two powerful androids created by a madman named Dr. Gero." "I've heard of this guy. He was once a part of the Red Ribbon army. My family beat him back in the day, and I thought he was destroyed. But it seems he is back." "Actually, the androids he created killed him. From what we know, the Androids are causing all sorts of destruction. They were created to destroy the Amakawa Family." "Meaning I am the target here?" "Exactly." "I will protect the young master no matter what." "Himari, knowing Gero, he made these things with unlimited energy. Only I can face them." "I hope you are not forgetting about me Yoru-chan." You noticed Kuesu just entering the door. "Kuesu. I am sorry, but this one, you ned to stay out of." "We have to help." "Sorry, but I need al of you to let me handle this." "We do have another problem." "Which is?" "Many people are disappearing but the odd part is their clothes are still there. And whatever is causing all of this is heading for this city." "Where is the source of this now?" "I'd say in Gingertown, why?" "I'l be back." You then began to walking towards th door. All of the girls stopped you and begged you not to go. "Sorry girls, but I need to find out what is going on. Chaos Control!" You then teleported to Gingertown.
15522111111111111111111111111111.title: Approaching Threat

155221111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Cell)

You arrived in Gingertown and noticed many articles of clothing all over the place. You used your power to find the source of all of this. You then heard a branch snap and you turned to see some kind of monster draggin a man. The man begged for your help as you looked at the creature. You ordered it to let go, and surprisingly it did. As the man was crawling towards you, the monster used it's tail and stuck the stinger in his back and began to absorb him. Soon, only the clothes were left. "I will absorb you next. Submit, Yoru." You were surprised that the creature knew your name. Just then, he began to increase his power and the power destroyed all the cars and buildings around him. He charged at you and you managed to dodge his tail everytime. You then went on the attack using th power of chaos. You knew that you still couldn't use your true power due to the fact you haven't figured out how. But you still managed to fight this creature off for a while. But then, he managed to stick his stinger into your left arm and before he could absorb you, you slammed your head into his and got away. But you had to get him to talk somehow, so yo stayed. "Before you add me to your collection, I want to know, who or what are you? You have the energies of so many fighters my family knew, so how is that possible?" "Very well, I will tell you before I feed. I am Cell, and I am an android." "What? Not another one!"
155221111111111111111111111111111.title: The Monster of Gingertown

1552211111111111111111111111111111.content: Cell the began to tell you about his creation and how he is made form the cells of the worlds greatest fighters that are still around today. Such as the Ayakashi known as Piccolo. And the super humans Goku, Vegeta, Krillin and more. He explained as well that he needed to absorb two of Gero's other creations in order to reach his perfect form. Android 17 & 18 are the things he needed. You knew that if he absorbed them, the entire world would be in trouble. He then began to walk towards you and just then, you gained a little knowledge of the extent of your powers. You then tore your left arm off and then in its place, an arm made form the yellow Chaos Emerald appeared. But you knew you needed to have both of your arms the exact same, so you tore your right arm off and grew another one made form the Green Chaos Emerald. "Now then, what do you say we get down to business?" "You sacrificed your arm in order to get me to talk!" "Bingo, now lets finish this." Cell jumped back and before the fight could continue, two fighters arrived and it turned out to be Trunks and Krillin. But as the fight was about to begin, he used a technique known as the solar flare to escape. You had to warn the others. So when Tien and Vegeta arrived on the scene, you told them everyting and you had a tape recorder and you had to get to Himari and the others. Krillin and Trunks decided to spread the word. You used Chaos Control to head back for the cafe.
1552211111111111111111111111111111.title: The Ultimate Android

15522111111111111111111111111111111.content: As you arrived at the cafe, the girls saw your arms and ran up to you. "Master! Are you alright?" "Yeah, I'm fine Himari. Though if we do not find those androids and destroy them, we are all in trouble." "What do you mean?" You then placed the tape recorder on the table and played it letting everyone hear the conversation with Cell. They knew all that you did. Just then, you placed both arms on the ground and yelled "Chaos Wind Clone, Chaos Earth Clone, RISE!" Just then, two clones of yourself appeared. The wind clone had your right arm, while the earth clone had your left arm. "Go and find Cell or the androids. If you spot them, return to me and I will fight them. Now go!" Just then, the two clones disappeared and you fell to the ground. The girls ran up to you and asked if you were alright. "Yeah, these new powers of mine take a large amount of my own energy, that's all." "But how did your arms become the way they are now?" "I had to get Cell to talk, so I ended up sacrificing my left arm in order to do so. I tore off the useless arm and then in its place another grew. I had to keep my power balanced, so I tore my right arm off as well. I had no choice." The girls wanted to scold you for being so foolish, but instead the all embraced you. The greatest battle would soon begin.
15522111111111111111111111111111111.title: New Power

155221111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(17 18)

Over the course of the next several days, you heard nothing from any of the clones. Your upper torso had been combined with the dark blue Chaos Emerald and the lower torso was combined with the light blue Chaos Emerald. That left your head and legs nroma. As you honed your new powers, you then noticed a young man with a scarf around his neck and black hair. There was als a young blond woman with him. "Can I help you two?" "Yes, are you Yoru Amakawa?" "Yes." "We are Androids 17 & 18. We are here for you." You were surprised at how normal they looked, but you knew how powerful they were. "Look, why don't we take this to the islands not too far from the beach? I do not want anyone getting hurt." "Fair enough. Lead the way." You then used your powers to fly to the islands and the androids followed. You then got a call from Kuesu on your cell phone. "Kuesu, this is not a good time.?" "Why is that, Yoru-chan?" "It seems the Androids have found me. Now I need you and the others to stay out of this." "But-" you hung up the phone and landed in on an island.
155221111111111111111111111111111111.title: The Androids Arrive

1552211111111111111111111111111111111.content: As you and the Androids landed, you had decided to make this a one-on-one. 17 stepped forward and you got ready to fight. He charged at ou and you did the same. You threw the first punch and landed a direct hit to his face with your left arm, which was a much more powerful punch. 17 then used his energy attacks ad you deflected them with attacks of your own. There was one great difference between the two of you. 17 had an unlitited supply of energy, while you did not. You decided to combine the powers of water and lighting. "Let me show you what I learned from Shizuku, 17." you then raised your arms into the air and a massive amount of water rose around the island. You then turned all that water into multiple water dragons and attacked 17. He dodged a few of them, but when you caught him in one of them, you used the power of lightning to send a powerful shock into him. But he was still going strong. He was a little banged up, but he was about to attack again. But as he was about to do this, you turned your head and saw Cell. "No, I thought I had more time." "Ah, Yoru, thank you for bringing 17 & 18 to me. I am greatly pleased. Now, prepare to be absorbed."
1552211111111111111111111111111111111.title: Chaos vs. Android 17

15522111111111111111111111111111111111.content: You, 17 and 18 were faced with Cell and this was a huge problem. The odd part was 17 and 18 didn’t know who he even was. He landed on a boulder in front of you and 17 and increased his power greatly. As he walked by you, you just froze up and Cell continued to walk on. “How man thousands of people did you absorb in order for you to get this strong?” “Oh, a few. But I‘d say they should feel honored. I made them one with perfection.” “What?!” As he walked on to absorb the androids, 17 told him to wait until he was done with you. But he managed to slam him into the ground and before he could absorb him, you had no choice but to attack. Combining the powers of water and lightning, you made a devastating attack against Cell. But sadly, that barely slowed him down. He then charged at you and he managed to do some major damage to your legs. He then threw you into the ocean and you were in a situation now. You used the red and purple chaos emeralds to make your legs. But then, all of the colors began to mix together like the northern lights and your power increased even further. You then called upon the white Chaos Emerald to create a helmet around your face. And like the rest of your body, it shined like the northern lights. But you did not have it’s full power, or even 50%, but you had to try and kill Cell before he could absorb 17 & 18. As he had his tail right about him, you landed a powerful punch and sent him flying from him. “What? Yoru? How are you still standing?” “The power of chaos is very powerful 17. I do not wish to destroy you or 18, but Cell is a different story. You both need to leave now!” “Yoru, now I see you’re getting serious. Bring it on!” The two of you charged at each other and you both attacked with lightning speed. Shizuku was also watching from a distance and was very impressed by your power. “Try this Cell. Chaos Ice Needle Barrage!” You shot many ice shards at Cell, which did a little damage by cutting his skin. Then you grabbed him and then sent Cell deep into the ground and charged your energy into your hands. “Chaos Cannon…FIRE!” Just then, a large blast of energy was sent into the crater and the energy was sent all over the island. Seventeen and Eighteen thought he was destroyed.
15522111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Chaos vs Cell

155221111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Tien)

“Why are you still here?! I thought I told you to run.” “Why should I? You squashed the bug.” “That attack was not enough to destroy Cell, I only slowed him down, you must run. You too 17! I cannot allow Cell to absorb you too.” “Listen, Yoru, I appreciate what you did, and I do not want to fight you anymore, but I am going to finish this. You hear that you freak? You still want to absorb me come and get it! I am not leaving this place until I‘ve squashed you like the overgrown cockroach you are!” What he didn’t know is that Cell was right behind him. “17, behind you! Watch out!” 17 turned and saw Cell. “So sorry to keep you waiting!” Just then, his stinger changed and he began to absorb 17 whole. You had no choice b to get 18 out of there now. As his body changed, his power began to skyrocket. Soon, his transformation was complete. You were about to use Chaos Control to get to 18 and get her out of there, but he managed to land a powerful punch before you could even blink. You once again got in front of 18 to keep Cell away from her. But out of nowhere, an old friend appeared in the sky. “Tien!” “Oh please, what do you think you can do?” “This…Tri-Beam, Fire!” Just then a huge blast of energy sent Cell into the ground, giving you the chance to get out of there. You grabbed 18 and called to Shizuku and she ran up to you. You held both of them in your arms and used Chaos Control to escape. Tien used the solar flare to get away as well.
155221111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Seventeen Absorbed

1552211111111111111111111111111111111111.content: As you were transported back to the clanhouse, the girls saw you and ran up to you. They noticed Android 18 with you as well. "Why is she with you master?" "Himari, Eighteen here is the least of our worries. If Cell finds her, we will be dealing with a force like no other. So we need to get to Kami's lookout and plan our next move." "But Yoru-chan, you do not have the energy to do so." Sad fact is that she was right, you used a large part of your power on Cell earlier. "Your-san, you need to rest. Then we can go to Kami's." "You're right girls. Eighteen, you need to stay here and stay hidden from Cell." Eighteen just nodded and you went to rest. You decided to rest in the living room leaning against the wall to keep Eighteen company. What you didn't knoow is that in the middle of the night, Eighteen walked up to you, kissed your cheek, then left to hide from Cell. The next morning, you found the note from Eighteen and told the girls to pack their stuff. In a few moments, they were ready and you used Chaos Control to go to Kami's lookout. There, you were greeted by Yamcha, Tien, Trunks, Goku, Gohan and Piccolo. Vegeta just stood there in the corner again.
1552211111111111111111111111111111111111.title: A New Location

1552211111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Krillin)

As you and the others talked about what should happen next, you knew there was only one option: shut Eighteen down for good. You wanted to avoid it, but it had to be done. You had to split up and search all around the planet. You had a feeling she was hidden on an island somewhere, so you, Vegeta, Trunks, and Krillin split up in groups of two in order to find her. You and Krillin were together and Trunks and Vegeta went another direction. While Goku and Gohan went to train in the time chamber. You used all the speed you could call upon, but you were still pretty drained from the last time you fought Cell. As you were both flying at top speed, you noticed Krillin looked like he had something on his mind. "Kirllin, I know you have emotions for Eighteen. For the time being, we need to shut her down. Once Cell is gone, we can reprogram her to not attack Goku on sight. I promise you." "Thanks Yoru." You then felt a strong energy near-by. "Cell. It seems like he is closing in. I will keep him busy, you shut down Eighteen." He nodded and you tackled Cell as soon as you saw him. But as you thought, he is much stronger than before. The two of you were in a massive battle while Krillin was going to shut her down. But he lost his mind to his emotions and destroyed the switch meant to do so. Cell saw this and landed a powerful punch and sent you into the ground of the island. He used the solar flare to get to Eighteen and he absorbed her. And with that, his power grew by a massive amount. His perfect form had been realized.
1552211111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Eighteen Absorbed

info.brief_description: One of the girls from the anime Omamori Himari fall for you.
info.description:
You are a human male who encounters one of the girls. You can chose to me normal or have the power of chaos.Here are some rules

- No killing of the MC or supporting characters

-i will allow foot fetish and sex.

- the male will be refered to as Yoru (meaning night). No last name

-have fun

-powers can be requested, but they need MY approval first. If you want to see a different power choice, send me the power and the description.
